<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6041</vol>
<tib>bsnyen rdzogs sogs su sgrub tshul gyi cho ga 'khyer bde kun phan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-24b</p>
<col>@024a * zhes sogs smon lam dang bkra shis kyis brgyan par bya'o bsnyen rdzogs sogs su sgrub tshul gyi cho ga 'khyer bde kun phan zhes bya ba 'di ni khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po shar tsong kha pa blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa rin po che shar phyogs kyi nor 'dzin yangs pa'i gzhi chen por dar rgyas su mdzad par smon pa'i 'bras bu legs par grub pa'i skyes chen 'gro ba yongs kyi phan bde'i rtsa lag tu gyur ba'i tho yon hu thog thu blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgya mtshos 'di lta bu zhig gyis zhes bka' bstsal dang du blangs te pan chung snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos cho ga dngos gzhi dus gsum rgyal ba'i dbang po thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i las chog rnam rgyal gser @024a mdog sgra ji bzhin pa dang dus go gdams ngag bshad pa phyag len rnams mdor bsdus te 'khyer bde bar bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge tshul dpal bzang ngo 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6043</vol>
<tib>gcod kyi gdams la zab mo'i 'khrid yig skal ldan 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-73a</p>
<col>@072a * gcod khrid skal ldan 'jug ngog zhes bya ba 'di ni chos 'di la lhag par mos pa'i blo gsal don gnyer ma mang pos nan cher bskul ba'i ngor mang du thos pa'i rnal 'byor ba 'jam dpal bshes gnyen kyis mdo sngags kyi gsung rab spyi dang khyad @072b par du gcod gzhung rnams kyi gong ba'i don la bla ma'i dam pa'i man ngag gis rgyas btab cing rang gis nyams len dang mthun par thub dbang khrungs nas lo gnyis stong lnga brgya 'das pa'i dus kyi lo sna tshogs zhes pa chu pho rta'i lo la mthar 'dod mkhas pa rnams kyi mdun pa chen po brag par byang chub gling gi chos grwa chen por sbyar ba'o '"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6043</vol>
<tib>gcod kyi ngag bsgrigs gces pa'i yang snying zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@011a * (ces gcod kyi ngag bsgrigs gces pa'i yang snying zhes bya ba tshig nyung la cha tshang ba 'di ni rang gi drin gyis chung ngu nas bskyangs pa slob bu blo gsal rtogs ldan sangs rgyas lhun grub dang rgyud ldan gyi slob ma sangs rgyas rnam rgyal la sogs mang pos bskul ba'i ngor byas pa gong ma'i gsung rgyun bzhin byas la khrid chen mo dang zab don stan thog gcig ma rnams dang go bstun nas gnyan khrod pa smon lam mtha' yas rgya mtshos nges med kyi gnyan par sbyar ba nor 'khrul byung na bla ma mkha' 'gros bzod pa gsol 'gro ba mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6043</vol>
<tib>gsang bdag rdo rje gtum po'o sgo nas klu'i gdon 'grol dug dbyung ba'o go lag len bcas nag po bkra shis bkod pa</tib>

<col>@015a * (zhes bsngo smon shis brjod byas la yo byad rnams bsdu'o: go na 'gro la'ang gsal byed khrigs med kyang: rang nyid rmongs pa'i dran thi pa sa bdag ming tsam gyis bkod pa'o</col>

<item>

<p>1a-12a</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6044</vol>
<tib># gcod dbang brgya rtsar grags pa'i dbang gi sta gon blun rmongs mun sel zhes ba ba</tib>
<p>1a-17b</p>
<col>@017b ces mkha' 'gro gsang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud nas phyung ba'i thugs bcud ma rig mun sel lha mo bcu dang bka' brgyud bla ma bcu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcu sogs kyi dbang gi sngon 'gro'i sta gon blun rmongs mun sel zhes bya ba 'di ni me sprel gyi lo rgyal zla ba'i dmar phyogs kyi dus 'khor ba dang dbyangs 'char ba gnyis ka'i rdzogs pa bzhi ba na smin gyi dus dang dus 'khor ba'i 'byung ba na mkha' 'don yon sgra dbyangs 'char gyi dbangs aoo gsal byed tsa 'byung ba n mkha' 'dod yon sgra nag rtsis pa'i gnam sgo spyi yos kyi nyi ma'i snga cha dge ba'i dus su rdza lha chen mnyam med thub pa'i dbang po'i dbang po'i mdun sar ^rwa lo mkhan sprul ngag dbang blo bzang byams pa bstan 'phel dpal bzang pos sbyar ba 'dis kyang 'gro kun sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig dge legs 'phel bkra shis par gyur cig dge'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6044</vol>
<tib>badzra t'akki'i dbang gi nyer mkho beet'urya'i bum bzang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b (zhes badzra t'akki'i dbang gi nyer mkho beet'urya'i bum bzang zhes bya ba 'di ni ^rwa lo mkhan sprul su cug thu chos rjes mdo smad mdzod dge brag me'i sar bgyis ba dza yantu dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6044</vol>
<tib>buddha t'akki'i dbang gi skabs su nyer mkho'i zur 'debs rab dkar dung gi lde mig ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@005b (zhes sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i sgo nas dbang bskur tshul sogs dang kha bsgyur tshul sogs la mkhas blun mang pos ^thad min sna tshogs kyi tshig 'phreng dam dum mang po bsgrigs pa la snying po ma mthong ba sogs kyis rkyen byas te buddha t'akki'i dbang gi skabs su nyer mkho'i zur 'debs rab dkar dung gi lde mig ces bya ba 'di ni `rwa lo mkhan sprul su cug thu chos rjes 'bod pas mdzad dge'i sa'i char bgyis pa dza yantu dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6044</vol>
<tib>gcod dbang brgya rtsar grags pa'i cho ga bsgrub tshul</tib>
<p>1a-14a</p>
<col>@014a * (zhes pa'ang rwa lo mkhan sprul su cug thu chos rjer bod pas bdud mgon trag bshad nag po'i thugs kyi sprul ba gnyan chen lha rtse yid bzhin dung zhal gyi lha zhol ska chu'i rgyud du sbyar ba 'dis kyang gcod yul phyag rgya chen po'i bstan pa phyogs bcur rgyas par gyur cig bkra shis par gyur cig dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6044</vol>
<tib>phung po bzan tu bskyur ba'i rnam par bshad pa thugs bcud ma rig mun sel phyi rgyud chen mo las rdo rje dbyings phyug ma lha mo bcu'i sgrub thabs rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-42a</p>
<col>@042a * zhes ma 'ongs rjes 'jug rnams kyi gcod log bsal ba'i ched du skye dman rje btsun lab sgron ma bdag gis sbyar ba'o yi ge pa ni mon gcod brtson 'grus sengge dang gangs pa smugs sangs so dge'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6044</vol>
<tib>rdo rje dbyings phyug ma lha bcu'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur tshul legs bshad gzi 'od 'bar ba'i nor bu dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-37a</p>
<col>@036a * (ces mkha' 'gro gsang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud las byung ba'i thugs bcud ma rig mun sel gyi rgyud las gsungs pa nag mo thugs kyi sgrub thabs rdo rje dbyings phyug ma lha bcu'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur tshul legs bshad gzi 'od 'bar ba'i nor bu dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'di ni bdag la chos 'di'i bka' drin stsol ba ba rje btsun bla ma dam pa dmigs med thugs rje'i mnga' bdag gcod yul gyi rnal 'byor ba chen po ngag dbang tshul khrims @036b dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas cis kyang yig rnying rnams go rim 'khrugs shing gzhan nas kha 'geng dgos pa sogs su gyur gshis khyod kyis 'di'i dbang dbang cho ga'i gnas 'gyur byed tshul sogs gsal ba zhig phyed dgos kyi bka' spyi bor pheb pa dang gzhan yang 'di'i dbang gnang snabs kyi mchod dpon mdzod dge thos bsam gling gi grwa rigs rang gi slob 'bangs bstan pa grags pa sogs kyis nan cher bskul ba la ldog pa'i thabs ma rnyed pa dang rang nyid kyang chos 'di'i rgyun chad la nye bar 'dug pa ma bzod par phyogs kun tu rtsad bcad bas rgyun dag la khungs btsun pa'i lugs gtsang ma ma rnyed stabs 'dis bstan pa la phan thogs cung zad 'byung ngam snyam pa'i 'dun pas yid bskyangs te 'di'i dbang gi don bsdus mu tig 'phreng ba dang gsal byed rin chen spungs pa rnams gzhir bzung zur bris nor bu'i gter mdzod sogs nas tshad thub nges rnams kyis brgyan dbang rdzas bskyed chog dang slob ma la nang dbang bskur tshul sogs kha 'thor ba'i yig cha dkyus su ma bcugs na chad skyon du 'gyur nges rnams dkyus su bcugs shing dbang gong ma gsum la aa ma gnas 'gyur kyi dbang rgyas pa lag len sogs nas kha bskang tshig phrad dang mtshams sbyor sogs bsgyur dgos pa rnams legs par bsgyur te me sprel pho'i mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i dus chen khyad par can la 'go brtsams te khyu mchog zla ba'i yar tshes dga' ba gnyis pa dbyangs aa gsal byed bha 'byung bas @037a * 'dod yon dri 'char ba'i glang i nyi ma rgyal phur 'dzom pa'i dus tshes phun sum tshogs pa'i snga dro'i char ser byes mkhan po bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyi yang sprul ngag dbang blo bzang byams pa bstan 'phel lamming gzhan ^su cug thu chos rjer 'bod pas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu bo chen po rma klung dag byed kyi 'gram mdzod dge stod kyi sa'i cha jag mi'i gnas srung dpa' po rgod tshang stag sbyang gi lha zhol du sbyar ba 'dis kyang rgyal bstan spyi dang khyad par gcod yul phyag rgya chen po'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6046</vol>
<tib># bstod pa byin rlabs nyer 'jug ma bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sh'akya thub pa la bstod pa byin rlabs nyer 'jug ces bya ba 'di ni sde snod 'dzin pa 'jam dpal rgya mtsho zhes bya ba rang gi slob mas gsol ba btab pa'i don du mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis gangs can khrod kyi gangs ri'i dbang po 'o de gung rgyal gyi lha zhol du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sde snod 'dzin pa bha dra p'a la'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6046</vol>
<tib># dpal ldan sa gsum ma bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@004b (ces rgyal ba thams cad kyi mkhyen brtse gcig tu bsdus pa'i ngo bo lnga brgya pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rje btsun btsong kha pa chen po nyid kyi rnam par thar la mdo tsam zhig brjod pa'i sgo nas gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni ldi god nas dge sbyong sdom brtson mchog bzang pa la sogs pa mang po zhig gis nan cher bskul zhing phyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen nyi ma snying pos yang yang bskul te rnam thar gyi sgo nas gsol ba 'debs pa snyan dngags kyi brdas ma bcings pa'i go bde bar brjod pa zhig gyis zhes gsung ba dang bdag nyid mchog tu dad pas kyang nye bar bskul te rje btsun bla ma de nyid kyi zhabs kyi padmo la nye bar gtugs pa'i bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba mang du thos pa'i btsun pa dge legs dpal bzang pos sbyar ba phyogs dus thams cad du bkra shis par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6046</vol>
<tib># khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho'i 'khrungs rab gsol 'debs bzhugs "</tib>

<item>

<item>

<tib>bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi 'grel pa dang bka' drin gsol 'debs bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006b zhes pa 'di ni bod chos rgyal gyi gdung rgyud dri ma med pa gu ge rgyal sras blo bzang pad+mas 'di lta bu'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor zhig dgos zhes bskul bar slar yang 'grel pa 'di bzhin dgos gsung ba la brten nas sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang ye shes kyis chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i gzims khang rgyal mtshan mthon po'i gzims chung bka' gdams pho brang du sbyar ba'o mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6047</vol>

<tib>bstod pa rnam dag gangs rim</tib>

<tib>theg chen gso sbyong ji ltar bsrung tshul sogs gsal bar bkod pa sdom brtson rna rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-16a</p>
<col>@016a * ces theg chen gso sbyong ji ltar bsrung tshul sogs gsal bar bkod pa sdom brtson rna rgyan zhes bya ba 'di ni tshul 'di la mos shing rnam dpyod phul du byung ba'i ngag dbang shes rab kyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba ltar mang thos rigs smra'i gzugs brnyan ^sprang btsun ngag dbang dpal ldan gyis sug bris su bgyis pa 'dis kyang rang gzhan la phan thogs par gyur cig manggalam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6051</vol>
<tib>sgrol ma'i mandal bzhi pa'i sgo nas dge mtshan phywa ga-yang spel ba'i cho ga bya tshul dus ngan 'tsho pa'i lan cha zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@006b (zhes dge mtshan phywa ga-yang spel ba'i cho ga bya tshul dus ngan 'tsho ba'i lag cha zhes bya ba 'di @018b yang ^rgyal khams smyul ba'i sbrang chung dge sbyong ba ratna kirtis rang gi kun rtog la shar ba ltar ri mor spel ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod dang ldan pa dge slong blo bzang chos ldan gyis bgyis pas dge mtshan 'phel bar gyur cig dge'o bkra shis par gyur cig</col>

<item>

<col>@008a * (ces smon lam shis brjod dang 'brel pa'i bar byang 'di ni blo gros kyi nor dang ldan pa dge slong bde mchog gis kho bo'i ngag thor nas mtshan kha shas par du 'khor ba'i tshe khang gi 'dod mos ltar ^wa g'indra pa tu siddhis bris pa'o mangga lam</col>

<item>

<tib>lha mo dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs rje tsong kha pas mdzad pa dang dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs rjes gnang ba</tib>

<vol>6054</vol>
<tib>sangs rgyas so lnga'i mngon rtogs dang lha dku'i phyag tshad</tib>
<p>1a-25b</p>
<col>@025a * phyag tshad kyi dbye ba 'di ni snyigs dus kyi rgyal ba dpal ldan bla ma dam pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyi zhal snga nas kyis dpal ri bo dge ldan du gsang ba bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor bslang ma rnams dang thub pa chen po'i sku jo bo'i sku tshad sogs yi dam zhi khro du ma bzhengs pa'i dus su rgyal ba'i sku gzugs kyi sgo nas kyang bstan pa dang sems can la phan par dgongs nas tshad yid gi rnam grangs du ma zhig las bde mchog sdom 'byung gi dka' 'grel rgya gar gyi grub chen rakshi tas mdzad pa'i le'u sum cu pa las phyag tshad kyi de nyid rgyas par gsungs pa las legs par gtan la phab cing gangs can gyi rig byed 'dzin pa rnams kyi gtsug rgyan sdom pa gsum la sogs pa'i lung rtogs kyi yon tan du mas thugs rgyud legs par gang ba khyad par bla ma de nyid kyi byin rlabs zhugs pas 'phrin las dang 'gro don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bshes gnyen mkhas pa'i dbang po bsod nams rgyal mtshan dang shes rab rgyal mtshan zhes yongs @025b su grags pa gnyis kyis rje'i bka' bzhin du thig dang go rim rnams ma 'khrugs par ri mo dang 'bur du dong pa la gtan la phab cing dgongs pa yang dag par blangs pa rnams la 'dris shing legs par sbyangs pa dpal ldan bla ma tsong kha pa yab sras sogs bshes gnyen dam pa rnas kyi zhabs rdul spyi bor nod pa'i btsun pa manga la sh'i las phyag tshad kyi srid zhing dus 'khor 'grel chen dang bstun nang chan gyi dbye ba sdom 'byung dang mthun par rang bzo spengs he gtsang rong gi byams chen du yi ger bkod pa'o yi ge pa ni bla ma'i ming can bdag gis bris swasti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bsud can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir dga' ldan theg chen gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel mangga lam</col>

<tib># 'phags pa thugs rje chen po mig 'byed spyan ras gzigs kyi bdag bskyed rjes gnang dang bcas pa'i cho ga byin rlabs bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun</tib>

<col>@008b (zhes 'phags mchog thugs rje chen po mig 'byed spyan ras gzigs kyi bdag bskyed rjes gnang dang bcas pa'i cho ga byin rlabs bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba 'di ni rang nyid kyi dran pa gso ba'i phyir dang bla ma mchog gi bkas chog bsgrigs 'di ltar bgyis ces bka' stsal ba dang du blangs te bla ma gong ma'i gsung las btus na mngon rtogs dang sngags rnams kha bsgyur bas spyan ras gzigs gzhan la'ang sbyan chog pa'i tshul du sngags rams pa'i ming 'dzin pa wag'intra shr'i man karmas bsgrigs pa 'dis kyang 'gro kun mig dbang nyams pa sogs kyi nyer 'tshe las thar te lta mig rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6057</vol>
<tib>bstan bsrung chos skyong dpal ldan dur khrod bdag po yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa la brten pa'i sgo nas glo bur 'phrin las drag bcol ba'i gtor zor gdab las byed tshul dgra dpung srog gcod gnam lcags spu gri zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@018a * zhes dur khrod bdag po'i sgo nas blo bur las bcol gyi man ngag gnad pa 'di ni grub chen nam mkha' rdo rje'i bskul ba'i ngor mdo sngags smras pa'i sdom brtson dam pa chos rje sa skya pan chen kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyis bshad pa'i yi ge pa ni lo ts'a ba dz'a na tsatra bris pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che nag phyogs kyi ga-yul @018b las rnam par rgyal te phyogs thams cad dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  "</col>

<item>

<p>1a-14a</p>
<col>@014a * (ces 'chi med tshe lha rnam gsum dril te sgrub pa'i rjes su gnang ba'i chog 'chi med rtag pa'i thig le zhes bya ba' di ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rje bla ma 'jam dpal dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i zhabs de nyid kyi bka'i rjes su gnang ba thob par brten 'di'i rjes gnang stsal skabs kyi zin tho ji lta bar yig cha rnams mtshams sbyor gyis brgyan te blo gter dbang po gsal bar bkod pa'o ) mangga l'am sidhi bha bam tu "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6057</vol>
<tib>dpal dur khrod bdag po'i sgo nas bzlog pa gnod byed log 'dren thal bar rlog pa'i thog chen zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@006b (zhes pa mchog gsum bden pa bslu ba med pas dbyer med nas thogs med nas bsags pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gi logs sems 'chang bas yun 'tsho bar gyur nan ngan song las grol ba'i skabs mi 'byung bas de dag gi gtan gyi bde ba tha ba thob bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas nying brtse cher bskyed nas 'bad par bya ste gal ta lag len mthong brgyud tsam du byas nas rang dang gzhan @007a * gyi 'di phyi'i don du ma bsam par byas nas rang nyid kyid dmyal ba'i bud shing du 'gyur bas rdo rje theg pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas pa'i ngang nas las rgyu 'bras la yid mchis pa'i dad pa dang bla ma dkon mchog gsum la dang ba'i dad shugs drag po bgyis te 'khor ba ji srid ma stong bar du brtson pas karma siddhis skad gsar chad gyis bcol nas gter gzhung las phye te gtan la phab pa'o gter rgya: gtad rgya: gsang rgya: mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6057</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan dur khrod bdag po yab yum gyi sgo nas glo bur las bcol gdams pa zab mo'i lha bsrung dgra la rbad bskul ba'i 'jigs rung khros pa'i ru mtshon 'phyar tshul dgra sde'i ga-yul las rgyal ba'ii dpa' bo'i nga ro zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * ces pa 'di ni rang gi slob ma sngags rim pa skal ldan rdo rje'i dur khrod kyi las mtha'i man ngag pa'i dmigs rnams yid la bya tshul dang phyag len gyi rim ldan par 'di lta bu zhig bskul ba'i ngor gzu ma ldog par smin grol chos rje'i zhabs drung nas lha 'di lung dang las tshogs be'u 'bum dang khrid man ngag bcas pa thob pa'i ^zhwa nag pa sngags 'chang rig 'dzin rdo rje bsod nams kun sdus gling gi bla brang du bsdebs pa 'dis siddhi ratna badzra so snod min la sbas par rgya: sa ma ya rgya: rgya: rgya:"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6057</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan dur khrod bdag po'i sgo nas blo bur las bcol gyi gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i bsgrub tshul rkun jag dgra bgegs mgo bskor</tib>

<col>@009a * zhes dur khrod bdag po'i 'khor lo 'bar ba lha sprags bsnyen sgrub nyams su blangs tshul gsal bar bkod pa 'di ni mchog dman mang pos bskul ba'i ngor gzu ma ldog par snyigs dus kyi rkun sri 'jigs pa ldang ba phan pa'i zhes grags pas dmigs gnad sogs kyi man ngag shes pa dkon par snang la rkun sri'i gnod pa shin tu 'tshe ba'i dus 'dir gdams pa zab khyad can 'di lta bu bya tshul 'dod pas sa skya kun dga' bsod nams kyis brgyud pa'i zhal gdams brgyan te ^rgyal khams myul ba'i btsun gzugs dam tshig rdo rjes sbyar ba'o snod min la ma spel sa ma ya sbas rgya: zab rgya:"</col>

</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6061</vol>
<tib># dbyu gu'i rnam bzhag dam gtsang rdo rje slob ma bde legs rdo rje'i ngor</tib>
<p>1a-1b</p>
<col>@001b (zhes pa'ang bla ma dkon mchog spyi bor mchod cing dad brtson lhag bsam rnam dag dam gtsang rdo rje slob ma gung bde legs rdo rje rin po ches 'dri bar mdzad pa'i lan du rnal 'byor ba mi bskyod dgyes bzhad rdo rjes phul pa lags na dam can chos kyi rgyal pos bzod par mdzod la dngos grub rnam gnyis kyi char ba dbab tu gsol sa ma ya guhya: :)"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6061</vol>
<tib>dam can chos kyi rgyal po la gser skyems 'bul ba'i tshigs bcad bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003a * (de ltar dam can chos kyi rgyal po la gser skyems 'bul ba'i tshigs bcad 'di lta bu zhig dgos nye gnas dge tshul ratna 'od zer gyis yang yang bskul ba dang 'di lta bu zhig dgos dgos par kun rtog gi gi mor shar te rtsom 'dun yod thog nye char dga' ldan bde ba can gyi bla grwa thun mongs nas grwa tshang la ^pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa chen pos stal ba'i chos syong 'di ba'i zhal thang byin can rnam gnyis la gur khan gsar bzos bgyis te rgyun du gse skyems tshugs rgyu lags pas ci kyang rzom dgos zhes dngul man dar mtshon sna lnga rin gnyis srang gang bcas bskul ba'i ngo mchog chog par kun gzigs ye shes kyi nyi ma pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa chen po dang yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag yongs 'dzin khri chen rdo rje 'chang khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yongs 'dzin no min han rin po che dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag rdo rje 'chang seng chen rin po che snyan rgyud bstan pa'i mdzod 'dzin rdo rje 'chang can rnams kyi zhal gyi bum bzang las chos skyong 'di'i man ngag sogs chos skor tshang ma'i bdud rtsi myong ba'i bskal bzang can sngags smyon mi bskyod dgyis bzhad rdo rje'i mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo'i nyams las 'byung bas blo bzang dge legs 'phel nas bsam don mtha' dag bla ma chos kyi rgyal pos grogs mdzad te grub gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6061</vol>
<tib>dam can chos kyi rgyal po'i tshogs 'khor 'bul tshul dngos grub rnam gnyis kyi char phab zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004b (zhes rgyal ba'i bstan bsrung kun gyi gtso bor gyur ba dam can chos kyi rgyal po la tshogs kyi tshogs kyi gtor ma 'bul tshul dngos grub rnam gnyis kyi char phab zhes bya ba 'di ni ^byang phyogs 'gro ba'i dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor gyur ba'i rdo rje 'chang mchog sprul rin po che snyigs ma'i dus 'dir rgyal ba gnyis pa lta bu rje btsun dam pa blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtsho dpal bzang po dang rigs brgya'i khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang dbang bka' drin gsum ldan rtsa ba'i bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po mkhan chen stag lung ba rje btsun dam pa mchog sprul @005a * de nyid kyi ^yongs 'dzin rin po che ngag dbang 'phrin las bzang po dang rigs brgya'i khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang dbang bka' drin gsum ldan rtsa ba'i bla ma mchog sprul mkhas shing grub pa'i dbang phyug bka' drin mtshungs med chos rje chos rgya mtsho dpal bzang po rnams kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa 'di lnga'i zhal las bdud rtsi cung zad myong ba 'di lnga'i bka' drin gyis chos la phyogs pa'i ^sh'akya'i btsun pa sku skyes blo bzang tshe dbang skyabs mchog gis sbyar ba'o 'di la mkhas rlom 'ga' zhig sogs mi khrel bar zhu 'on kyang 'di la cher khrel na pan chen dpal ldan ye shes kyis mdzad pa'i lcam sring mgon po'i tshogs 'khor gtor ma yod de la 'gre nas bris pa lags pas nongs pa gang 'byung ba mkhas pa rnams bzod par gsol cig 'dis kyang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa phyogs dus kun du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig sa ma rgya: rgya: rgya:)"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6061</vol>
<tib>dam can chos kyi rgyal po'i zhi ba'i rnam 'gyur gyi gtor chog bar chad kun 'joms zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * (ces dam can chso kyi rgyal po zhi ba'i rnam 'gyur gyi gtor chog bar chad kun 'joms bya ba 'di yang gus phran bka' 'bangs tha shal rmongs ban gyi na bas ^srid zhi'i 'gro ba yongs kyi skyabs mgon bla na ma mchis pa rdo rje 'chang pan chen thams cad mkhyen gzigs chen por chos rgyal 'di nyid kyi gtor chog bka' rtsom bskul ma zhus pa'i phyir phebs su khyod kyis rtsom zhig zhes phebs par bka' bzhin bsgrubs pa'i mchod par dmigs nas sug bris su bgyis te phul ba lags na gtor chog 'di nyid bla ma yi dam chos bsrung mnyes pa'i mchod sprin du gyur bar byin gyis brlabs pa dang blo bzang thub dbang rdo rje 'chang dngos skyabs mgon khyed rigs ldan drag po 'khor lo can gyi skur bzhengs pa'i dus phran 'khor gyi thog mar cis kyang rjes su 'dzin pa mdzad du gsol</col>

<vol>6061</vol>
<tib>dam can chos rgyal gyi nyin zhag gcig gi zhi rgyas dbang drag gi drug cu pa'i dmigs rim legs par bshad pa</tib>
<p>1a-8b</p>
<col>@008b ces pa 'di yang rang gi rdo rje slob ma dad ldan gcig gis nan tan du bskul ba ltar chos skyong 'di pa'i chos skor gyi kha bskang du 'gyur ram snyam te dus mthar skyes pa'i sngags btsun mi bskyod dgyes bhzad rdo rjes se ra theg chen gling du bris pas dge ldan bstan pa phyogs dus kun tu 'bar bar gyur cig ` shin tu zab pa'i man ngag 'di nyid chos rgyal phyi nang gsang gsum dug ri nag po 'khor bcas gnyer mdzad la snod min dang dbang ma thob pa rnams kyis dbang zan chos rgyal 'khor bcas shin tu dag po'i 'phrin las kyis zhag bdun tshun la khrag skyug nas 'chi bar gyur ba'i bka' chad phob cig aom k'a la r'u pa sa ma ye stwam "</col>

<item>

<vol>6061</vol>
<tib>dam can chos rgyal nang sgrub kyi gtor chog las bzhi lhun grub dga' ston gyi kha bskongs zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@002b (ces pa'ang dam can chos rgyal nang sgrub kyi gtor chog las bzhi lhun grub dga' ston gyi kha bskong su dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' 'bangs tha shal gyi na pa sprul ming mi bskyod bzhad rdo rjes bris pa'o 'dis kyang blo bzang rgyal pa'i mdo sngags bshad sgrub kyi bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa dang byang chub chen po'i go 'phang ma thob kyi bar du dam can chos kyi rgyal pos mnyes bzhin du grogs mdzad pa'i rgyur gyur cig dpe 'di nyid snod min la bstan na de'i snying khrag dam can chos rgyal 'khor bcas kyis lhag med du 'thung zhig sa ma ya tishtha "</col>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6061</vol>
<tib>dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi'i gtor chog srid gsum rnam rgyal</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@003b (ces rje btsun rwa lo'i thugs kyi zab gnad dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi la brten @004a * pa'i gtor chen gyi rimpa khrigs su bsdebs pa srid gsum rnam rgyal zhes pa 'di yang pho brang gong ri dkar po'i dkon gnyor dpon dge steng bla ma byams pa kun dga' 'byung gnas kyis bskul ba dang rang gi brjid byang du chos kyi rgyal po btsong kha pa chen po'i ring lugs 'dzin pa za hor gyi btsun pa ^ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtshos rwa lugs kyi yig cha dang bla ma'i man ngag la brten nas sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni ngag dbang dge legs so mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6061</vol>
<tib>dpal mnyam med ri bo dge ldan pa'i bstan bsrung kun gyi gtso bo dam can chos kyi rgyal po'i sgo nas zhi ba'i gtor sgrub kyi chog bsgrigs</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007a * ces pa khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po btsong kha pa chen po'i mdo sngags zung 'brel gyi bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa dang de 'dzin pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi zhabs pad 'khor ba ma stong gi bar du brtan par bzhugs te rnam dkar 'phrin las gong nas gong du 'phel bar 'gyur ba sogs kyi ched du dmigs te chos sde chen po dga' ldan bde ldan gling gi rgyud pa grwa tshang du dam can rdo rje chos kyi rgyal po'i sgo nas zhi ba'i gtor sgrub tshugs skabs rdo rje 'chang dngos dpal ldan bla ma du ma'i @007b bka' drin las bod kyi gser chos su grags pa gdams ngag zab zab mos bskrun du med pa'i rmad 'byung dben srad snyan rgyud las 'byung ba'i dam can chos kyi rgyal po'i man ngag rnams thos shing khong du chud pa'i bskal bzang po can rig pa 'dzin pa'i gzugs bsnyan zhwa ser cod pan 'dzin pa dge slong mi bskyod dgyes pa bzhad pa'i rdo rjes mdzub mo ris ston gyi tshul du bod phal skad kyis sbyar ba'i dge ba la brten nas khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po blo bzang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i mdo sngags zung 'brel gyi bstan pa rin po che sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa'i rgyur gyur cig shu bha mastu sarba dza ga tam dpe 'di snod min la mi ston pa'i bya ra gshin rje ya ba tis mdzod cig sa ma ya tishtha gzhyan yang ljongs 'dir nad mtshon mu ge sogs mi mthun rgud pa'i ming yang mi sgrogs shing blo bzang grags bstan phyogs bcur rgyas pa dang 'gro kun bde skyid ldan pa'i bkra shis shig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6061</vol>
<tib>gtor chen drug bcu pa'i rnam bzhag dam nyams kyi srog gcod mtshon cha 'bar ba'i 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba'i zur 'debs 'phrin las drag po'i pho nya zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-28b</p>
<col>@028a * (ces dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i las tshogs gtor chen drug cu pa'i rnam bzhag dam gyis srog gcod mtshon cha 'bar ba'i 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba'i zur 'debs 'phrin las drag po'i pho nya zhes bya ba 'di ni rje shes rab 'byung gnas blo gros spas pa'i gdan sa sha sa na dha ra sa mu dra'i gsung gis nan cher bskul ba dang @028b rang nyid kyang dran pa gso ba'i phyir byang phyogs yul gyur skyes pa'i gyi na ba su ma ti sha sa na pradznyas bod yul byang phyogs stod lung phu'i dgon chu lam sdings gsum du grags pa'i dang po'i gnas su shing byi hor zla bcu pa'i dmar phyogs dga' ba dang por sug bris su grub par bgyis pa bkra shis mdo smad pa brag dkar sngags dams pa blo bzang bstan pa rab rgyas kyi gsung ngo sarba mangga lam bkra shis par gyur cig dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6061</vol>
<tib>gtor chog srid gsum rnam rgyal gyi zur brgyan lag len dan 'don cha'i rim pa khrigs chags su bkod pa bdud dpung dpung sreg byed me'i spu gri zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-14a</p>
<col>@014a * (ces pa 'di ni rwa lo chen po'i man ngag ches zab pa dus gsum rgyal ba'i dbang po ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho'i gtor chog srid gsum rnam rgyal gyi zur brgyan lag len gyi rim pa rnams gsal bar bkod cing 'don cha'i rim pa kha 'gengs dgos pa rnams cung zad kha bskangs te brgyud ldan dam pa'i phyag bzhes ma 'khrul zhing bklag chog khyer bde'i lugs su gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pa sdom brtson ngag dbang 'jam dpal bde legs rgya mtshos pho brang chen po po ta la'i gzim chung rig gnas kun gsal du sug bris su bgyis pa 'di la nongs pa'i tshogs mchis na bla ma lha dang bsrung ma'i tshogs la bzod par gsol zhing slan chad sgrib par mi 'gyur bar mdzod cig bkra shis par gyur cig dge ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6061</vol>
<tib>lcags mkhar 'khrul 'khor gyi zhal shes 'ga' zhig gi zin 'bris</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004b zhes pa 'di rnams khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chen po yongs 'dzin no min han blo bzang bstan 'dzin dpal bzang po'i zhal gyi bum bzang las ji ltar stsal ba dang rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po seng chen rin po che'i gsung las ji ltar stsal ba rnams slad med par ^sngags 'chang mi bskyod rdo rjes zin bris su bgyis pa'o "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6061</vol>
<tib>myur mdzad ye shes mgon po yi gtor chen la la 'jug pa rnams bca' bsgrigs rdo rje'i re kh'a las nam yang 'da' bar ma byed cig "</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * ces pa 'di ni bstan pa spyi dang khyad par du dpal ldan mnyam med ri bo dge ldan pa'i bstan pa bstan 'dzin dang bcas pa'i sku'i rim 'gro kho na dmigs te chos sde chen po dgon lung byams pa gling du myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po'i gtor chen mkhas grub thams cad mkhyen pa'i bzhed pa bslad med brgyud ldan bla ma'i phyag len bzhin 'dzugs 'dun skabs lag len gyi rim pa mi 'chol ba'i khrigs chags su bkod pa zhig gal che bar mthong nas thog mtha'  bar gsum gyi bca' bsgrigs rdo rje'i re kh'a zhes bya ba 'di nyid btsun pa'i gzugs brnyan rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal ba ^blo bzang chos kyi nyi mas bla brang bkra shis 'od 'bar du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson dang ldan pa'i dge slong blo bzang don 'grub po "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6061</vol>
<tib>rgyas mdzad dam can chos kyi rgyal po'i gtor chog dge legs kun 'byung</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@011a * ces dam can chos rgyal phyi nang gsang gsum yang gsang dug ri nag po dang bcas pa'i lha'i grangs sogs chos skor gyi dka' gnad rnams kyi dogs gcod rtsod pa'i bral ri thal par rlog pa'i rdo rje thog mda' stong gi stobs ldan zhes bya ba 'di ni rang nyid kyang 'di 'dra zhig rtsom dgos pa'i rgyu mtshan brtag dang mtshan ma 'ga' zhig 'byung bar brten rdo rje slob ma zhig gis @011b nan tan du bskul ba'i ngor sngon gyi mkhas grub dam pa rnams kyis shin tu sbas par mdzad pa'i bka' rgya dam pos dka' gnad rnams gsal zhing rgyas par 'grel pa dgag bya che zhing dgos pa chung yang ri bo dge ldan pa'i bstan pa'i rgyan du gyur ba'i lhag bsam rnam par dkar bas kun nas bslangs te rang gis lo chung du nas rje yab sras la mi phyed pa'i dad pa thob cing dge ldan bstan pa'i bdag po pa pan chen thams cad mkhyen gzigs chen po dang grub pa'i dbang phyug yongs 'dzin khri chen rdo rje 'chang dang tshad med pa'i thugs rje dang mi 'phrog pa'i mkhyen rab mnga' ba'i rdo rje 'chang dngos rje dam tshig rdo rje dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas dang mdo sngags gzhung brgya smra ba'i dge ba'i bshes dka' bcu rin po che sogs bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las mdo sngags kyi gzhung lugs spyi dang khyad par du yang chos 'di'i skor la ngal ba mang du byas shing rnam dpyod kyis spyangs pa chos skyong 'di nyid mnyes pa'i mtshan ma cung zad thob pa'i dka' bcu smra ba ^blo bzang tshe dbang skyabs mchog gam ming gzhan mi bskyod dgyes bzhad rdo rjes mkhas mang bye ba'i 'byung gnas se ra theg chen gling du thos bsam la sdod skabs chu mo bya lo'i hor zla bdun pa'i yar ngo'i bzang po gnyis par rdzogs par sbyar ba'i dge ba la brten nas skye ba nas tshe rabs thams cad du rgyal ba btsong kha pa'i bstan pa la skye zhing de nyid kyis bstan pa'i lam bzang la brten cing chos kyi rgyal pos mi 'bral bar 'grogs mdzad pa'i rgyur gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6061</vol>
<tib>rje rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan srung kun gyi gtso bo dam can chos rgyal phyi nang gsang gsum gyi lha'i grangs sogs dka' gnad rnams kyi dogs gcod rtsod pa'i brag ri bcom pa'i rdo rje'i thog mda' stong gi stobs ldan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@011a * ces dam can chos rgyal phyi nang gsang gsum yang gsang dug ri nag po dang bcas pa'i lha'i grangs sogs chos skor gyi dka' gnad rnams kyi dogs gcod rtsod pa'i bral ri thal par rlog pa'i rdo rje thog mda' stong gi stobs ldan zhes bya ba 'di ni rang nyid kyang 'di 'dra zhig rtsom dgos pa'i rgyu mtshan brtag dang mtshan ma 'ga' zhig 'byung bar brten rdo rje slob ma zhig gis @011b nan tan du bskul ba'i ngor sngon gyi mkhas grub dam pa rnams kyis shin tu sbas par mdzad pa'i bka' rgya dam pos dka' gnad rnams gsal zhing rgyas par 'grel pa dgag bya che zhing dgos pa chung yang ri bo dge ldan pa'i bstan pa'i rgyan du gyur ba'i lhag bsam rnam par dkar bas kun nas bslangs te rang gis lo chung du nas rje yab sras la mi phyed pa'i dad pa thob cing dge ldan bstan pa'i bdag po pa pan chen thams cad mkhyen gzigs chen po dang grub pa'i dbang phyug yongs 'dzin khri chen rdo rje 'chang dang tshad med pa'i thugs rje dang mi 'phrog pa'i mkhyen rab mnga' ba'i rdo rje 'chang dngos rje dam tshig rdo rje dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas dang mdo sngags gzhung brgya smra ba'i dge ba'i bshes dka' bcu rin po che sogs bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las mdo sngags kyi gzhung lugs spyi dang khyad par du yang chos 'di'i skor la ngal ba mang du byas shing rnam dpyod kyis spyangs pa chos skyong 'di nyid mnyes pa'i mtshan ma cung zad thob pa'i dka' bcu smra ba ^blo bzang tshe dbang skyabs mchog gam ming gzhan mi bskyod dgyes bzhad rdo rjes mkhas mang bye ba'i 'byung gnas se ra theg chen gling du thos bsam la sdod skabs chu mo bya lo'i hor zla bdun pa'i yar ngo'i bzang po gnyis par rdzogs par sbyar ba'i dge ba la brten nas skye ba nas tshe rabs thams cad du rgyal ba btsong kha pa'i bstan pa la skye zhing de nyid kyis bstan pa'i lam bzang la brten cing chos kyi rgyal pos mi 'bral bar 'grogs mdzad pa'i rgyur gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6061</vol>
<tib>skakya btsun blo bzang tshe dbang gi ngag rnams phyogs su bsdebs pa las chos rgyal phyi nang gsang gsum la tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya tshul bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@002b (ces pa dam can chos rgyal phyi nang gsang gsum la tshogs 'khor bya tshul 'di lta bu nges par dgos zhes dge bsgos @003a * dge slong bkra shis kyis bskul ba'i' ngor ^mkhas grub chen po rje blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i gdan sa pa btsun pa su ma ti a'a yu ming can gyis dam pa gong mas mdzad pa'i chos skyong 'di'i tshogs 'khor gyi yig cha med kyang tshogs 'khor gyi yig cha gzhan dang rigs 'gres te smras pa 'di la nongs yod na lha bla ma rnams kyis bzod mdzad du gsol bdag la bstan pa rgyas par byed pa'i nus pa rtsal du gsol dkar cha cung zad yod na khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po'i lung rtogs kyi bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas l yun ring du gnas pa'i rgyu ru bsngo ngo'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6061</vol>
<tib></tib>
<p>11</p>
<col>@011a * (ces rgyas mdzad dam can chos kyi rgyal po'i gtor mchog dge legs kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di yang skyabs mgon gang gi bka' drin kho nas 'tsho ba gus phran rmongs pan slob ma'i tha shal gyi na pas ^lha mi'i gtsug rgyan nyag gcig mkhas grub kun gyi spyi bo na bka' yi 'khor los dbang bsgyur ba skyabs mgon rdo rje 'chang pan chen thams cad mkheyn gzigs chen por rgyas pa'i chos rgyal gyi gtor chog bka' rtsom bskul ma zhus pa'i phyir phebs su khyod kysi rtsom zhes bka' me tog stsal ba spyi bo'i thod du bcings te bka' bzhin bsgrub pa'i mchod par dmigs nas rgyal bas mu stegs stong pa drug pham par mdzad pa'i dus bzang gi nyen sug bris su bgyis te phul ba'i nyid bla ma yi dam chos bsrung gi thugs shin tu mnyes pa'i mchod spyin du 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab cing phran skye ba 'di nas byang chub snying po'i bar du ^skyabs mgon mchog gi zhabs drung du skad cig kyang 'bral ma med par skyes nas gsung gi bdud rtsi la domgs med du longs spyad pa'i skyabs 'jug brtse bas gzigs pa dnag khyad par du rigs ldan drag po 'khor lo can gyi skur bzhengs pa'i dur 'khor gyi thog mar cis kyang rjes su 'dzin par mdzad du gsol zhes snying khor rus pa'i gting nas gsol ba 'debs so 'dis kyang blo bzang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs bcu kun tu 'khor ba ma stong gi bar dri ma med par dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa'i rgyur gyur cig mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6062</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i man ngag thun mong ma yin pa'i sgrub pa'i las rim khrigs chags su sdebs pa</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@011a * (ces dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i man ngag thun mong ma yin pa sgrub pa'i las rim khrigs chags su sdebs pa 'di ni hal ha'i ching wang gi shog nas dam pa'i skye phreng gis mngon par mdzes pa t'a chos rje dbang chen bstan dar gyis lo snga phyir rin po che'i skyes du ma dang bcas nan tan du bskul ba dang dus phyis bkra shis 'khyil nas gzhung brgya smra ba'i dbang po rdo rams pa 'jigs med legs bshad sogs rang gi slob ma mang pos yang yang bskul ba'i ngor bla ma rnams kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos bsten pa'i bka' drin las snyan brgyud kyi man ngag cung zad rna ba'i lam du byas pa'i rigs pa smra ba 'jam dbyangs bstan pa'i nyi mas sngon chad yi ge med pa'i gdams pa zab mo bla ma'i zhal las thos pa bzhin ltag chad dang bral bar yi ger bris pa 'di snod min gyi lag tu mi shor ba'i bya ra dam can chos kyi rgyal po rnam gsum gyis mdzod mdzod</col>

<item>

<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsnyen bsgrub la gsum</tib>

<p>1a-26a</p>
<col>@025b (ces dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsnyen sgrub las gsum gyi nang nas bsnyen pa'i yi ge 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi zhal lung dngos grub rdzogs ldan sprin bzang bklags pas don grub skal ldan 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyan drug mchog gnyis lta bu'i mkhas mang 'ba' zhig gis gang ba'i grwa tshan phan tshun zhes pa'i nang tshan mkhas mang blo gsal gling gi slob dpon rin po che mdo sngags thub bstan yongs la spyangs pa'i mkhas pa spyin pa dang pa` tshul khrims sogs dam pa'i yon tan gyis mdzes pa ye shes mgon po sogs tshe sngon 'grub pa'i rtags mtshan gyis mtho ba sogs yon tan du mas phyug pa de nyid kyis bsod nams kha btags dang zho'i snying po che legs dang phyag bris bcas yang yang bskul ba dang gzhung brgya smra ba mi nyag chos rje nor bu'i mtshan can gyis dngul gyi me tog dang bcas @026a * yang yang bskul ba dang slad nas kyang tshe blos btang gi dga' ldan chos 'phel gyi bla ma dge slong ye shes bzang pos rje rin po che'i gsang ba'i rnam thar khyad 'phags rje legs bzang pas zin bris mdzad nas rje'i spyan lam du phab pa de nyid dang dngul gyi me tog byu ru che ba nyin bde dang bcas drag tu gsol ba btab pa'i ngor lus 'byung bzhi ma snyoms kyang 'phral mar dgon sa ci thon du bsnyen pa'i gnad don gsal bar mang du thos pa'i dge slong 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes dge 'phel gyi ri rtse mkha' spyod gur khang ngu sbyar ba 'dis 'gro ba rnams 'jam dbyangs zhi khros rjes su bzung ste mchog gi dngos grub la longs spyod par gyur cig </col>

<tib># rtags rigs kyi rnam gzhag rje btsun chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i gsung rgyun bye gzhung gi khas len tshul gyi cha shas kyi zur 'ga' zhig lags so "</tib>

<col>@039b (zhes skabs dang po'i stod cha'i spyi mtha' 'di ni dga' ldan byang rtse'i spyor dpon rab 'byams pa ngag dbang rgya mtshos 'dir rje btsun yab sras kyi yig cha'i par med pa dang tshigs tshogs che ba byas rje btsun yab sras kyi yig cha las tshig tshogs nyung zhing go bde ba zhig byung na snyam nas se ra rje btsun pa'i phar phyin mkhas grub byams pa bkra shis kyi phar phyin pan chen bsod nams grags kyi phar phyin legs bshad gser phreng mkhas grub rin po che'i rgyud sde spyi rnam mdo sde rgyan pan chen rtsa tik dpal 'sbyor lhun grub kyi spyi don de rnams la gzhi byas te tshig tshogs mi nyung zhing tshig don bde bar 'god yi ge pa ni dge tshul rnam dpyod yangs la mchod dpon blo bzang mthu stobs so nons pa ci mchi mkhas pa rnams la bshags rnam dkar dge bas pha mas gtso byas 'gro ba ji srnyid ma lus pa yang srid kun tu thos bsam bsgom pa'i rang rgyud gru 'dzings legs bsngam sde rgyal ba sras bcas rnams kyis mdzad pa smon lam ma lus mthar phyin nas 'jig rten ma lus @040a * de nyed rtogs nas myur du bar gshegs sar bgrod shog</col>

<item>

<col>@002b (zhes dam can chos kyi rgyal po la 'dod pa'i don gyis 'phrin las gsol ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni chos sde chen po dga' ldan bkra shis chos 'phel gling gi dbus gzhung grwa tshang dga' @003a * ldan legs bshad gling gi tshogs 'don du 'dzugs rgyur 'di lta bu zhig 'phral du dgos zhes bstan pa'i don la rtse gcig tu gzhol ba'i thugs bskyed phul du byung ba t'a bla ma lha btsun yid bzhin nor bu sogs grwa slob thun mongs nas mandal lha dar gos chen rgyas pa'i gdangs ldan gyi rten dang bcas skul ma mdzad pa ltar snyoms las pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes mos gus gdud shugs drag pos blo la gang shar kha nas gang thon gyi tshul du bsgrigs te phul ba 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal ba'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa dri ma med pa 'di nyid nam yang mi nub cing phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nus par gyur cig dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6067</vol>
<tib>gtor ma brgya rtsa mdor bsdus sku gtong tshul bsod nams chu mig ces bya ba</tib>

<col>@006a * (ces gtor ma brgya rtsa mdor bsdus su gtong tshul bsod nams chu mig ces bya ba 'di ni trwa rigs 'ga' zhig la 'di'i khyrid byed khul skabs kyi kha 'chal du rgyun 'khyer lta bu'i tshe yar mar bar dang ltag ma'i mgron bzhi la tshan pa bzhing byas te btang na rgyas bsdus 'tsham zhing legs tshul gong ma'i gsung rgyun du byung ba bskyar bar brten dad ldan dge slong shes rab don grub kyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos tshul yang yang nan tan bgyis pa'i ngor ^btsun gzugs ngag gi dbang pos skul ba po'i 'dod bstun du sbyar ba 'dis kyang 'gro ba la phan thogs bar gyur cig</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6067</vol>
<tib>lam rim gsol 'debs lam mchog sgo 'byed bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-8b</p>
<col>@008b byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i brgyud pa rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa'i rim pa lam mchog sgo 'byed ces bya ba 'di ni 'dod 'dun can du mas bskul ba'i don du sems dpa' chen po du mas byin gyis brlabs pa'i grub gnas byang rwa sgreng rgyal ba'i dben gnas kyi dgon pa gong du dpal ldan aa ti sha'i sku dngos dang khyad par ma mchis pa'i sku 'drang bu yon ma che bar grags pa'i  spyan sngar yun ring du gsol ba btab nas sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sh'akya'i bzang gis bgyis pa'o "</col>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6067</vol>
<tib>rang la gros 'debs gsal byed lugs 'byung ldog dang sbyar ba</tib>
<p>9a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * (ces pa 'di yang 'khos med kyi btsun pa dharma badzra gyis rang gi gnas tshul skyob gting nas skyes te bla chen dgongs pa rab gsal gyi sku gdung rin po che bzhugs pa'i lha khang gi nye 'ang bzhig tu glur blang ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6067</vol>
<tib>rje bla ma rgyan drug mchog gnyis dang bcas pa la phyag mchod 'bul ba'i tshul lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa byin rlabs nyin byed 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@014b (ces bdag nyid chen po rgyan drug mchog gnyis chos srung ye shes kyi mgon po dang bcas pa la phyag mchod gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa byin rlabs nyin byed 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba'i dbang po rdo rams pa blo bzang rab gsal gyis @015a * bkra shis pa'i lha rdzas dang bcas nan tan chen pos yang yang bskul ba la brten nas sangs rgyas kun 'dus kyi ngo bo bla ma rdo rje 'chang yab sras rnams kyi bka' drin kho nas nye bar 'tsho ba sh'akya'i rjes 'jug blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos chos grwa chen po bkra shis 'khyil gyi rang gshag chos 'byor dga' tshal du bris pa 'dis kyang gser zhun cod pan 'chang ba'i ring lugs phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig bkra shis dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6067</vol>
<tib>rje bla ma rgyan drug mchog gnyis dang bcas pa la phyag mchod 'bul ba'i tshul lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa byin rlabs nyin byed 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@014b (ces bdag nyid chen po rgyan drug mchog gnyis chos srung ye shes kyi mgon po dang bcas pa la phyag mchod gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa byin rlabs nyin byed 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba'i dbang po rdo rams pa blo bzang rab gsal gyis @015a * bkra shis pa'i lha rdzas dang bcas nan tan chen pos yang yang bskul ba la brten nas sangs rgyas kun 'dus kyi ngo bo bla ma rdo rje 'chang yab sras rnams kyi bka' drin kho nas nye bar 'tsho ba sh'akya'i rjes 'jug blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos chos grwa chen po bkra shis 'khyil gyi rang gshag chos 'byor dga' tshal du bris pa 'dis kyang gser zhung cod pan 'chang ba'i ring lugs phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig bkra shis dge'o</col>
</item>

<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod kyi sgrub thabs gsang chen bcud kyi thig pa zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@012a * (ces rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod kyi sgrub thabs gsang chen bcud kyi thig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lam 'di la mos shing byin rlabs dang gdams ngag yongs su rdzogs par thob pa ^dharma badzra gyis man ngag gnad rnams chos kyi rgyal po rol ba'i rdo rje'i zhal lung bzhin rang re'i lugs srol dang mi 'gal zhing cha tshad la 'khyer bde ba nor 'khrul dang bral ba'i lugs su bgyis te rang lo re drug pa bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'khor bskor ba'i dus chen gyi skabs su sgrub par sbyar ba ste bo bos sdad bkod pa'i sgrub thabs bde chen nye lam dang pad+ma r'a ga'i them skas sogs las chog gtor byin brlabs dang dbang bskur rgyas pa dang phyi nang gsang bde kho na nyid kyi mchod pa 'bul ba sogs 'di nas gsungs pa ltar kha bskang ni chos shin tu legs par 'gyur ro</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6083</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod kyi phyi nang gi dkyil 'khor du slob ma la dbang bskur ba'i cho ga byin rlabs char chen ga-yo ba'i sprin sgra zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-34a</p>
<col>@033b (zhes pa 'di ni bla ma mchog sprul rin po che don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te ^ dkon mchog chos ldan gyi zhal snga nas la khu re chen mor dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po du mas rje btsun ma 'di nyid kyi phyi dkyil dang lus dkyil gyi byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa sngon sog pa'i yul 'dir ma byon pas cis kyang gnang dgos par nan gyis zhu bar ^ rje nyid kyis bod gangs can pa'i yul nas khu re chen mor chibs bskyod gnang ba'i lam par chon rkun gyis bcom par byin rlabs 'di gnyis kyi dpe sogs phyag dpe mang tsam chud za ba yin stabs rje nyid nas phyi dkyil @034a * gyi cho ga ni aindra mkha' spyod dang lus dkyil gyi cho ga ni bde mchog dril bu lus dkyil gyi dbang chog dang 'gros mthun pa yin de gnyis la gzhi byas te bskur chog par bshes gnyen chen po de rnams dang gsung gleng mdzad nas de bzhin du gnang dus phran bdag gis mchod ga-yog  pa'i bya bas chos gral du tshud pa la bdag gi bla ma ^ ye shes mtshan can sogs dge bshes gnyen pa rnams kyis bong ba gser gser gzigs kyi tshul du bdag la khyed kyis bla mas ji ltar gnang ba bzhin ma brjed par bgyis te cho ga'i rim par bsgrigs ste bris shig par bka' bstsal bar brten 'bri 'dun yod pa'i khar bdag gi bla ma khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag grub chen ku ku re ba'i sku skyer mkhas pa dang grub pa'i skyes bu rnams la grags shing grub pa'i sprul pa'i skyes mchog ^ ching su tsug thu no mong khang zhes mtshan yongs su grags pa ngag dbang blo bzang tshe ldan dpal 'byor dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis gos dar dmar po rin chen gnyis pa rta rmig pa kha btags chos legs bcas 'di lta bu gyis shig pa'i bka' kung spyi bor pheb pa dang yang 'jam mgon bstan pa'i gsal byed mkhas btsun bzang gsum gyi yon tan gyi tshogs kyis mngon par mtho ba gcig tu bstan pa'i khur bzhes te nyin mtshan 'khor mo yug tu bstan pa'i bya bas brel ba'i mdzad bzang can skar chen chos rje chos 'dzin pa nas dngul gyi dong tse gsum kha btags ches legs bcas yang yang bskul ma gnang bas kyang mtshams sbyar te khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' mi yi gzugs su byon pa'i bshes gnyen du ma'i bka' drin las rje btsun ma 'di nyid man ngag mang du thos pa'i btsun pa blo bzang brtson 'grus kyis bla ma nyid kyi phyag bzhes ltar bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni nye gnas dge slong chos grags rgya mtshos bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang gsang chen bstan pa dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6083</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i bcu cha'i sbyin sreg rgyas pa bya tshul dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@017a * (ces rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i sgo nas bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bya tshul dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen du ma'i zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos reg pa'i skal ba cung zad thob pa bla ma'i zhal shes man ngag ma nub pa'i phyir du zin bris su lha mchog 'di nyid kyi bsnyen sgrub la gcig tu zhol ba'i rgyal khams myul ba'i gnas bskor ba ye shes smon lam gyis yi ger bkod pa'o</col>
</item>

<col>@007a * (zhes pa 'di ni rgyal mkhan po grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis mkha' spyod 'da' kha ma'i mjug tu tshe sgrub su mdzad pa yin gzhan rnams ni rang gi bla ma gsum gyi zhal nas 'di'i khrid lan gsum thob tshar ba'i skabs su bla ma'i man ngag ma nub pa'i phyir du zin bris su rgyal khams myul ba'i gnas bskor ba ye shes smon lam gyis yi ger bkod pa'o dpe 'di mkha' spyod 'di'i 'da' kha ma'i gdams ngag ma thob pa dang bla ma lha la skal med log lta can rnams la dpe tsam yang ston par mi bya bka' rgya sa ma ya ai thi</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6083</vol>
<tib>zab lam n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i slob bshad thun mong ma yin pa'i snyan rgyud kyi khrid yig dmar bcas su bkod pa ^khyab bdag bla ma'i zhal lung kunda dgyes pa'i 'dzum zhal bzhugs so"</tib>
<p>1a-45a</p>
<col>@045a * (ces tshar lugs slob bshad thun mong ma yin pa'i snyan brgyud che ba bzhi ldan gyi gdams pa mkha' spyod skor gsum las n'a ro mkha' spyod kyi khrid yig gces bsdus khyab bdag bla ma'i zhal lung kunda dgyes pa'i 'dzum zhal zhes bya ba 'di ni kho bo cag 'du 'dzin pa'i spros pa las rgyab kyi phyogs pa'i spong ba pa'i 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis 'grub pa'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgya mtsho'i zhal snga nas la ring mo nyid nas gsol ba btab pa las yang dben bde mchog gi nags khrod mkhar rdo bsam gtan gling gzims chung du smin pa byin rlabs kyi mjug pa nas grol byed rim gnyis kyis khrid cha lag dang bcas dpal ldan sa skya pa'i snyan brgyud las gzhan du ma 'dres pa'i man ngag phyag len rnam par dag pas brgyan slob bshad dpyis phyin pa stsal skabs blo dman rnams kyis bsnyel bso dang brgyud pa'i bshad srol khog mi 'phyug pa'i dgos par dgongs te dam pa nyid nas zin thob kyis shig pa'i gnang ba stsal ba dang dam ldan rdo rje dpun 'ga' zhig nas kyang yid rang gi legs so mdzad par brten rang nyid sbyangs skyes kyi shes rab dman yang ^slob dpon gyi bka' mchog pas nyin re'i gsung bshad gang nges rig gzigs tu btab cing slar bla ma nyid kyi spyan lam du phab ste dpyad bzod par mdzad thogs gcig tu sdeb pa 'di nyid dam pa gang gi bran du gyur pa sngags btsun dbu mdzad blo bzang dar rgyas kyis bgyis pa'o yi ge pa ni drung yig bstan 'dzin phun tshogs so sarba siddhi rastu dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>6084</vol>
<tib>ao rgyan mkha' 'gro nor lha'i sgrub thabs tshe ga-yang nyi zla kha spyod zhes bya ba'i dngos grub char 'bebs</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6084</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin khams gsum zil gnon gyi dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba'i cho ga lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa kun phan bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-50a</p>
<col>@049a * (ces bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin khams gsum zil gnon gyi dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba'i cho ga lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa kun phan bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni @049b mkhas btsun bzang gsum gyi sku'i 'phreng ba rim par byon zhing rgyal bstan yongs rdzogs pa 'dzin skyong spel bar mdzad pa'i thugs bskyed phul du byung ba mtshungs med lcags ra mchog sprul rin po che ngag dbang chos kyi dbang phyug dge legs bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po nas rta mgrin 'di nyid kyi dbang chog gi rtsa ba shin tu bsdus shing brling ba 'di la deng sang lag len gsal byed kyi lhan thabs zhig med mi rung bar 'dug pas chog sgrigs bklag chog ma lta bu'i shin tu 'khyer bde ba zhig cis kyang bris shig par bkas bskul ma nan tan du bdzad pa'i thugs bzhed skong ba'i slad du rgyal dbang thams mkhyen pa rang gi rdo rje'i gsung rta zhal yid bzhin rgya can gyi chog sgrigs bsam don lhun grub las byung ba'i dkyil chog nyid rtsa bar bzung gzhung de yang khyad par gyi sgos chos rnam par mtshams rnams su sbyar ba tsam ma gtogs bla chen chos dpal ba'i pad+ma yang gsang gi dkyil tshag ma dag dri ma khru byed kho na gzhir bzhag pa la rgya can chog sgrigs byings dang cha mtshungs phyir tshig tshegs bskyungs te snying po bsdu ba'i tshul du mdzad 'dug par brten kha 'gengs @050a * dgos rnams rtsa ba'i dgongs pa dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir bla chen pa'i dbang chog sogs las blangs shing dbang rgyun tshad ldan gyi rgyun mi nub pa'i rkyen du re ba'i bsam pas slob ma la brda sprod kyi mtshams sbyor rnams yig tshogs kyi ngal ba la ma ltos par bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gsung rgyun dang rang blos gang spobs ji ltar rigs pas legs par brgyan te blo dman pas kyang 'jug pa bde phyir shin tu gsal zhing cha lag tshang bar rta mchog rol ba'i rnal 'byor la mos pas spyod pa'i sngags btsun ^sa ma ya badzra k'irtis thugs rje chen po khri khros byin gyis brlabs pa'i zhing khams khyad par can bod yul dbus kyi sa'i thig le lha ldan sprul ba'i gtsug lag khang chen po'i dbang phyogs kyi dben pa'i ri sul zhig tu zla tshes bzang por sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge slong blo bzang nam mkha' rdo rje'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>6091</vol>
<tib>rgyal po chen po ngal bsos po la mchod gtor 'bul tshul mdor bsdus par bya ba ni "</tib>
<p>3b-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (zhes pa 'di ni gsung rab la blo yi padmo kha phye ba'i dbu mdzad bla ma blo bzang rab brtan pas bskul ba'i ngor lha'i btsun pa ^blo bzang ming 'chang bas sug bris su bgyis pa'o </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6091</vol>
<tib>rje btsun seng ge sgra la brten pa'i klu ang sa bdag gi gdon 'grol gyi cho ga nyer bsdus nad gdon kun sel phan bde'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@017a * (ces rje btsun seng ge sgra la brten pa'i klu dang sa bdag gi gdon 'grol gyi chog nyer bsdus nad gdon kun sel phan bde'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba 'di ni nad pasogs kyi don du 'phral du sgrub dgos pa'i skabs du mar cho ga zor yang 'di lta bu zhig mkho che bar mthong nas rgyal khams pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes ^rje btsun gong ma'i gsung la kha skongs cung zad sbyar te bklag chog nyu bkod pa'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge slong dge 'dun dar rgyas so 'dis kyang 'gro ba mang po la phan thogs gyur cig bkra shis</col>
</item>

<col>@013a * (ces dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i lam rim pa gnyis kyi rnam bzhag bshad pa gsang chen bde lam zhes bya ba 'di ni rig gnas mdo sngags mtha' dag la nang byan tshud pa'i mkhas grub chen po yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dza ya pandi tas 'di lta bu zhig gyis zhes bka' nan chen pos bskul zhing gso rig dang nang rig gnyis ka la legs par sbyangs pa'i rab 'byams smra ba aer dhe ni no min han ngag dbang bstan 'dzin gyis kyang bskul ba ltar snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis mkhas grub thams cad mkhyen pa dang rje blo gros chos skyong yab sras gnyis kyis snga rting du mdzad pa'i 'jigs byed kyi skyed rdzogs chen mo dang pan chen chos kyi rgyal po'i legs bshad sogs la gzhi byas te mtsho bdun gyi lha khang chen mor sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gsung rab kyi don la rnam dpyod yangs pa'i bka' bcu ngag dbang chos ldan gyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig </col>

<item>

<item>

<vol>6094</vol>

<col>@007a * rnam par gsol 'debs thos pa don ldan 'di dad ldan blo dman rnams kyis go sla'i phyir dge slong dpal 'byor bsod nams lhun grub kyis se ra theg chen gling du smras pa dge khams gsum 'gro ba'i mgon po rdo rje 'chang lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rje'i sgyu 'phrul gar se ra rje btsun chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi ngo mtshar rmad byung rnam thar gsol 'debs 'di thub bstan rin chen dar zhing rgyas pa dang 'gro kun bde skyid dpal la spyod pa'i phyir bsod nams kun sdud gling gi bla brang nas gang ci'i mthun rkyen sbyar nas par du bsgrubs dge 'dis tshe rabs phreng bar mgon khyod kyis dgyes bzhin rjes su bzung nas sa lam gyi bgrod pa yongs su rdzogs te lus can kun 'khor ba'i mtsho las myur du 'dren par shog mangga lam "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6095</vol>
<tib>dpal rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa dang 'brel ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor dngos grub dgugs pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * (ces pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa dang 'brel ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor dngos grub 'gug pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa yi dam gyi lhar 'dzin pa'i dad mos dang ldan pa gsol dpon blo bzang tshe ring gis rta mgrin yang gsang dang 'brel ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor gnad tshang snying bsdus zhig dgos zhes bsod nams kha btags bcas bskul ba'i ngor bla ma dam pa'i zhabs drung nas gdams pa du ma'i bka' drin mnos pa'i gyi na pa sngags rams pa bshad sgrub bstan dar gyis aam pan chin wang shog gi dgon sder bris pa dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6095</vol>
<tib>rgyal sras chen po bzhi ba'i lha la ngo mtshar gtam bdun gyi sgo nas bstod pa skal bzang dga' byed ces bya ba</tib>

<col>@002a * (ces bdag nyid chen po rgyal sras zhi ba'i lha la ngo mtshar don ldan gtam bdung yi sgo nas bstod cing gsol ba btab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa skal bzang dga' byed ces bya ba 'di ni btsun gzugs blo bzang chos 'dzin gyis mgon po 'di nyid la dad gus bag tsam gyis mtshams sbyar te rang gi kha 'don du sbyar ba'o dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>

<item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<col>@002b (ces dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed lha bcum gsum ma'i dbang gi brgyud 'debs 'di ni rgyal ba gnyis pa'i rgyal tshab khri thog zhe bdun pa yang sted blo bzang chos 'phel gyi sprul sku ngag dbang blo gros chos 'phel thong ri bshad sgrub gling gra rigs rab 'byams pa blo bzang phun tshogs dang dka' bcu blo bzang dbang po gnyis bcas nas rim bzhin bskul ma byung ba'i thog bi cing nas mer gan rab 'byams pa shes rab bstan 'dzin gyis 'phrin yig @003a * gi bskul ma byung ba'i ngor bka' drin gsum ldan rtsa ba'i bla ma khri chen rdo rje 'chang chen po ngag dbang mchog ldan pa'i zhal snga nas las thob pa'i dbang gi brgyud par mi 'dra ba du ma 'dug kyang mos gus gyi ched pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa dang kun gzigs lnga pa yod pa 'di bzhin dang rdo rje 'chang chu bzang rin po che ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas khri chen la zhus pa'i brgyud par mi bzhugs kyang dos na phra mo'i dus 'jigs byed bcu gsum ma'i dkyil 'khor du dang por smin par mdzad pa'i bka' drin che bas mtshan sgra dngos su thon pa dang bcas sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang skal bzang rgya mtshos sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@011b (ces rje btsun ma phongs pa sel ba'i sgrol ma'i mandal bzhi pa'i chog bde skyed padmo bzhad pa'i nyin byed ces bya ba 'di ni rje btsun ma 'di nyid la mos gus rnyed pa'i don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis tshul 'di lag tu blang bde ba zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor bla ma dam pa rnams kyi zhal kyi bdud rtsi myong zhing dka' bu'i ming 'dzin dge slong ngag dbang dpal ldan 'phrin las kyis sbyar ba'o mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6097</vol>
<tib>skyabs 'gro'i khrid yig</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * (ces pa 'di ni rigs dus stobs 'byor dad 'du brtson pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rin chen skal bzang ae phu dbang gis skyabs 'gor'i dmigs rim rgyas shing go bde ba cig kyis zhes bskul ba ltar ban rgan gyi na ba ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos bod chos lha khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge song dpal bzang ngo</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6097</vol>
<tib>skyabs mgon chen po'i bka' rtsom thog ma bde ldan ma</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces pa 'di ni dam pa'i ming can gyis sems can rnams la bde 'byor shog zhes pa'i bar gsar rtsom dang gzhan rnams kha skongs su bris pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6097</vol>
<tib>` bstan skyong rdo rje grags rgyal mar mchod gtor 'bul tshul mdor bsdus rdo rje'i mnga' gsol zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>2b-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces bstan skyob chen mo rdo rje grags rgyal mar mchod gtor 'bul tshul kgyi rim pa mdor bsdus 'di ni gnam bskoa 'jam dbyangs gong ma chen po'i gser yig pa dza sag bla ma rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang bkra shis kyis bskul bar brten sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos bshad sgrub bstan pa'i 'byung gnas chos sde chen po dpal ldan 'bras spungs su sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni ngag dbang yon tan 'byung gnas so</col>
</item>

<col>@020b ces dga' ldan snyan brgyud kyi gdams pa'i snying po bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga'i zab 'khrid dang 'brel ba'i ngag 'don gyi zur rgyan thun mong ma yin pa zab lam kun 'dus skal ldan snying nor zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gzhan gyi nyams len du sngar nas 'bri 'dun yod thog nye char yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bla ma gushr'i blo gros bzang po sogs don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis kyang nan cher bskul ba la brten nas mkhas shing grub pa'i dbang phyug @021a * rdo rje 'chang dngos dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las 'jam mgon snyan brgyud kyi man ngag mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes tshangs chen lha'i pho brang chen po gangs ri dkar po'i lha zhol du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bikshu ma ti bhadra'o 'dis kyang 'jam mgon bla ma'i bstan pa'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di nyid nam yang mi nub cing phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6098</vol>
<tib>bsnyen yig dngos grub rgya mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@021b ces bsnyen yig dngos grub rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi nye 'khor [???] bcu shes dar ba sogs du ma dang @022a * sngon goms legs sbyang kyi bag chags 'thug po sang cing skyebs thob pa dang sbyangs pa'i rnam dpyod mchog tu yangs pa brgyal dbang dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i gdan sa chen po rgyal me tog thang gi seng ge'i khrir 'khod pa'i mkhan rin po che ches pa bde thang sprul sku blo bzang rin chen tshamgs dbyangs phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba dang nang rigs pa dang gso ba rig pa la rnam dpyod yangs pa'i' rab 'byams smra ba ngag dbang bstan 'dzin mdo sngags rab 'byams la sbyangs pa mi dman zhing rnam dpyod yangs pa'i rab 'byams smra ba bstan 'dzin grags pa skye bas thob pa'i blo gros kyi rtsa lag sung rab la lta ba'i mig dang ldan zhing don gnyer dang bcas pa'i dge slong chos rgya mtsho dang tshul khrims dpal bzang la sogs pa'i don gnyer can mang pos bskul ba'i ngor sbrang ban snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis mtsho bdun gyi lha khang chen mor sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod dang brtson pa mi dman pa'i dge slong grags pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  "</col>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6103</vol>
<tib>phyogs glang gis mdzad pa'i phyogs chos 'khor lo zhes pa'i bstan bcos gsal bar byed pa'i rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * phyogs chos 'khor lo zhes pa'i bstan bcos zhig glegs bam khrod du lus 'dug pa de'i don gsal bar bya 'dod snying la chags te aa lag sha lha rams pa ngag dbang bstan dar zhes bgyi bas brgya la man gzhan la phan pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du re ste bkod pa'o bkra shis 'dir 'bar dge bas bdag sogs 'gro ba kun rig smra mchog gyur kun mkhyen myur thob shog  spar 'di dang blo rigs rtags rig gnyis kyi sdom tshig dang bcas pa dga' ldan theg chen gling gi chos grwa chen po kun dga' chog gling grwa tshang gi spar khang du bzhugs dge'o "</col>

<item>

<item>

<item>

<col>@010a * ces sgo mang gra rigs har chen ja sag gung ga gshogs rab 'byams pa blo bzang legs ldan nas sbar gyi sbyar byad dgos tshul ltar ra snying aa chi thu no mon han gyis sbyar ba'o bkra shis par gyur cig "</col>

<tib>thugs rje chen po rgyal ba rgya mtshho lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhugs "</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6103</vol>
<tib>thugs rje chen po rgyal ba rgya mtsho lha dgu'i sgrub thabs bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-11b</p>
<col>@011b zhes pa 'di ni dad stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa dpon aer te ni sbo shog thus thugs rje chen po rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i sgrub thabs shig dgos zhes yang yang bskul ba la brten nas sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang ye shes kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po'i lam gyi rim par ma rgyud spyi'i chings gsungs pa gzhir byas te 'phar ba zhes pa'i lo bka' gdams pho brang du bgyis pa'o pa ri pri tstsha "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6103</vol>
<tib>thugs rje chen po rgyal ba rgya mtsho lha dgu'i zhi rgyas kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-14a</p>
<col>@013b zhes thugs rje chen po gsang sgrub lha dgu'i zhi rgyas kyi sbyin sreg ji ltar bya ba'i cho ga 'di yang dpon aer te ne sbo shog thus bskul @014a * ba ltar sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang ye shes kyis grub chen nyid kyis mdzad pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'phrin las 'phreng ba dang rje yab sras rnams kyi gsung la brtags nas bgyis pa dge legs 'phel pa ri pri tstsha"</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6104</vol>
<tib>dbu ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>198b-216a</p>
<col>@216a * dbu ma la 'jug pa zab pa dang rgya che ba'i tshul gsal bar byed pa slob dpon zla ba grags pa theg pa mchog la thugs gzhol ba mi 'phrgs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje mnga' ba ri mor bris pa'i bdrus las 'o ma bzhos pas bden par zhen pa bzlog par mdzad pas sbyar ba rdzogs so kha che'i yul gyi grong khyer dpe med kyi dpud rin chen sbas pa'i gtsug lag khang du kha che'i rgyal po dpal 'phags pa lha'i sku ring la rgya gar gyi mkhan po ti la ka dang bod kyi lotstsha ba bande pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis kha che'i dpe dad mthun par bsgyur phyis [???] rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka warma dang lotstsha ba de nyid kyid nyi 'og shar phyogs pa'i dpe dang gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o 'dir 'grel pa'i mdzad byang dad 'gyur byang byang gi sted nas thun mong ba rnams bkod pa ni rtsa ba logs su bsgyur ba dang 'grel pa'i nang gi rtsa ba gnyis sbyar nas zhus dag byas pa'i dbang du byas pa yin no "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6104</vol>
<tib>dbu ma la 'jug pa'i bshad pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>217b-349b</p>
<col>@349a * dbu ma la 'jug pa'i bshad pa zab pa dang rgya che ba'i tshul gsdal bar byed pa slob dpon zla ba'i grags pa theg pa mchog thugs gzhol ba mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje mnga' ba ri mor bris pa'i bdrus ma las 'o ma bzhos pas bden par zhen pa bzlog par mdzad pas sbyar ba rdzogs so khungs rnams phal cher mdo bzhin bris phyin chad skad gnyis 'byung srid na rtsa 'grel sgra don bzhin bsgyur la gzu bor byos la dpyad par gyis kha che'i yul gyi grong khyer dpe med kyi dbus rin chen sbas pa'i gtsug lag khang du kha che'i rgyal po dpal 'phags pa lha'i sku ring la rgya gar gyi mkhan po ti @349b la ka kal sha dang bod kyi lotstsha ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis kha che'i dpe dang mthun pa ltar bsgyur phyis ra sa ra mo cher rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka warma dang bod kyi lotstsha ba de nyid kyis nyi 'og shar phyogs pa'i dpe dang gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o gzhung 'di'i tshad ni bam po bcu gcig dang bam po sum gnyis so "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6104</vol>
<tib>dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel ba tshig gsal ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-197a</p>
<col>@197a * bstan bcos dbu ma rtsa ba' 'grel pa tshig gsal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba grags pa theg pa mchog la thugs gzhol ba mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje mnga' ba ri mor bris pa'i drus las 'o ma ba zhos pas bden bar zhin ba bzlog par mdzad pas sbyar ba yongs su rdzogs so gsung rab rgya mtsho bsru bas byung de nyid bdud rtsi'i snod shes rab ces bya snang byed tshig gsal rin chen sgron bsgyur las dge ba gang bsags de yis nyi ma grags lta thibs sbangs te spros bral mkha' la 'gro bar shog kha che'i grong khyer dpe med kyi dbus rin chen sbas pa'i gtsug lag khang gi 'dabs su rgya gar gyi mkhan po rtog ge kha chen po ma h'a su ma ti'i zhal snga nas dang bod kyi lo ts'a ba tshab nyi ma grags kyis kha che'i dpe dang mthun pa ltar bsgyur phyis ras mo che'i gtsug lag khang du kha che'i mkhan po ka na ka bar ma dang bod kyi lo ts'a ba bde nyid kyis nyi 'og shar phyogs kyi dpe dang gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o [???] rnams ji ltar grags bzhin bris phyin chad skang gnyis 'byung srid na 'grel ba sgra don bzhin bsgyur la gzu bor byos la dpyad par rigs mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>

<col>@009b ces pa 'di ni deng sang snyigs ma'i mthar song bar brten gsung rab kyi brjod bya'i don zab cing brling ba lta ci rjod byed tshig tsam la'ang klog dag pa dang brjod gzhi yi ge'i grangs nges dang ngos 'dzin ma nor ba zhig byung na ngo mtshar ba las de'ang cal col 'ba' zhig tu gyur bar mthod pas 'di lta bu zhig 'bri 'dun snga mo nas yod pa'i thog rigs dang dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag bdag gi bla ma mtshan brjod pa dkar ba ^ngag dbang grags pa dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis gsung gi cod pan spyi bor bcings pas 'bri bar brtsams pa'i skabs bla ma nyid sku gshegs pas re zhig bzhag kyang dgongs rdzogs su bsngo ba dang byang phyogs zhwa ser bstan pa'i gsal byed po ri yad kyi pandi ta mkhan po rin po che bskal bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan pa nas gsung gi rol mo 'khrol ba dang nyid kyi 'phrin las kyi kha long chos rgyan pa dang don gnyer bsod nams shes rab lags nas kyang bskul zhing gzhan yang snga phyi bar gsum du blo gros can du ma nas nan bskul du ma byung ba dang gsung rab rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag bdag gi bla ma mtshan brjod par dka' ba ^dharma rakshi ta'i zhal snga nas kyang dbu tsam bris pa gtsigs pas 'di'i 'phro bskang dgos zhes gsung gis rting bskul gnang bar brten tshe rabs kun tu bla ma bka' bzhin sgrub pa'i mchod pas mnyes pa dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i grogs rnams legs par bshad pa'i dga' ston gyis tshim par byed pa'i rgyur smon te shar phyogs rgya mtsho'i mtha' dang nye ba'i sa'i cha hor chen gyi yul grur skyes pa'i sprang btsun @016a * shes rab rab rgas kyis rab byung bco lnga pa'i me yos lo'i hor zla gnyis pa'i tshes bzhi'i gnyin khal kha ga-yon ru ja sag dga' 'phel rdo rje yab sras kyi dgon sde bshad sgrub dar rgyas gling gi nye 'dabs su bgyis pa bstan 'gro'i gsol 'debs su gyur cig  "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6107</vol>
<tib>rten 'brel bstod pa'i 'grel pa legs bshad nor bu'i bang mdzod zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-57a</p>
<col>@056a * ces rgyal ba gnyis pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal zhes snyan pa'i ba dan dkar po sa gsum na rnam par g-yo ba de nyid kyis ston pa mnyam med thub pa'i dbang po la zab mo rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gsung pa'i sgo nas bstod pa legs par bshad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa legs bshad nor bu'i bang mdzod 'di nyid kho bo cag gangs ljongs su byin skabs dpal ldan bkra shis sgo mang gi chos grar dge 'dun 'dus pa'i tshogs la gzhung 'di'i zhi ba bshad lung rig gis brgyan te phul bar brten gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba la spobs pa mchog tu gyur pa sgo mang dpon slob chos grags mtshan can dang dge ldan mdo sngags bstan pa'i mnga' bdag khri chen dge 'dun phun tshogs @056b pa'i sprul sku gnyis kyis so so nas dngul gyi mandal kha btags bcas bskul ba dang gzhan yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du mas nan cher bskul ba skabs khas blangs nas 'go brtsams na'ang chos brgyad g-yeng ba'i dra bar chud pas rtsom 'phror lus pa slar mjug grub par byas te phul chog ces smras pa bzhin mat'a tsi na'i yul gru ^'jam dpal dbyangs mi rje'i tshul du rol pa gong ma chen po'i pho brang du ltar bcas 'gro ba'i skyabs gnas zhwa ser bstan pa'i bdag po rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi khyab bdag blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtsho'i zhal snga nas sogs bka' drin mtshungs pa med pa'i dam pa du ma'i drin las mdo sngags gzhung lugs spyi dang khyad par klu sgrub yab sras kyi gzhung la blo sgros kyi 'jug pa mi dman pa sh'akya'i dge slong ye shes bstan pa'i sgron me ming gzhan lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rje zhes bya bas rdzogs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge slong bsod nams phun tshogs so 'dis kyang thub bstan spyi dang khyad par rgyal ba gnyis pa blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6107</vol>
<tib>rten 'brel snying po'i 'grel pa legs bshad nor bu'i bang mdzod bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-38a</p>
<col>@037b ces rgyal ba gnyis pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal zhes snyan pa'i ba dan dkar pos gsum na rnam par ga-yo ba de nyid kyis ston pa mnyam med thub pa'i dbang po la zab mo rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gsungs pa'i sgo nas bstod pa legs par bshad @038a * pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i 'grel ba legs bshad nor bu'i bang mdzod 'di nyid kho bo cag gangs ljongs su phyin skabs dpal ldan bkra shis sgo mang gi chos grwar dge 'dun 'dus pa'i tshogs la gzhung 'di'i zhib bshad lung rig gis brgyan te phul bar brten gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba la spobs pa mchog tu gyur ba sgo mang dpon slob chos grags mtshan can dang dge ldan mdo sngags bstan pa'i mnga' bdag khri chen dge 'dun phun tshogs pa'i sprul sku gnyis kyis so so nas dngul gyi mandal kha btags bcas bskul ba dang gzhan yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du mas nan cher bskul ba de skabs khas blangs nas 'go brtsams na'ang chos brgyad ga-yeng ba'i dra bar chud pas rtsom 'phror lus pa slar mjug grub par byas te phul chog ces smras pa bzhin mah'a ci na ri yul gru 'jam dpal dbyangs mi rje'i tshul du rol ba gong ma chen po'i pho brang du lhar bcas 'gro ba'i skyabs gnas zhwa ser bstan pa'i bdag po rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi khyab bdag ^blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtsho'i zhal snga nas sogs bka' drin mtshungs pa med pa'i dam pa du ma'i drin las mdo sngags gzhung lugs spyi dang khyad par klu sgrub yab sras kyi gzhung la blo gros kyi 'jug pa mi dman pa sh'akya'i dge slong ye shes bstan pa'i sgron me ming gzhan lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rje zhes bya bas rdzogs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge slong bsod nams phun tshogs so 'dis kyang thub bstan spyi dang khyad par rgyal ba gnyis pa blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la phun ring du gnas par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6107</vol>
<tib>rtsa rlung thig le'i rnam bzhag</tib>
<p>1a-16b</p>
<col>@016b de ltar rdzogs rim spyi la mkho ba'i rtsa rlung thig le'i rnam bzhag dang rdzogs rim gyi gtso bo rnams dri ma med pa'i gzhung las 'byung ba btus te bkod pa po ni gyi na pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan no 'dis kyang rje btsun tsong kha pa chen po'i bstan pa rgyas par gyur cig bkra shis par gyur cig dge'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6107</vol>
<tib>yum don gsal ba'i sgron me'i bsam gzugs kyi zur rgyan mu tig 'phreng mdzes zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * (zhes pa 'di ni rang dang skal ba mnyam pa'i rigs smra pa 'ga' zhig gis bskul ba'i ngo ma bzlog pa dang rang nyid kyis kyang brjed byang gi tshul dus mthar skyes pa'i dge sbyong gi gzugs brnyan kyang dge slong su ma ti aa yu shes sbyar ba dge legs su gyur cig) swa sti par 'di kun dga' chos gling grwa tshang la  gra rigs dpal ldan sogs kyis rgyu yon sbyar bskrun pa'i dge bas tshe rabs thams cad du bla ma lha yis 'bral med rjes 'dzin shog mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6108</vol>
<tib># gcig tu bral gyi yig cha'i dka' gnas kha skang dang bcas pa gsal bar bshad pa'i rnam gzhag blo gsar dga' skyed beed'urya'i mgul rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>*</p>
<col>@017b (ces pa 'di ni ^rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs rje rin po che @018a * la zhal gzigs te man ngag gnang skabs he ru ka lhun po'i rtse mor dngos su zhugs te 'dzam gling spyan ladn 'dug pas byin rlabs ha cang myur du 'dzug pa'i dbang gis rgya gar na he ru ka'i rnal 'byor bas yi rdul lyar mang du byung zhes gsung po'i he ru ka de nyid dpal ldan chos grags la zhal gzigs te ci 'dod gsung bar phyogs las rnam rgyal zhus pas ha ha he zhes gsung byin pa tsam gyis chos grags nyid phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams mu med par btsal khyang rnyed rgyu med pa rigs pa smra ba'i seng ge'i ngar skad sgrog pas phas rgol gyi ri dwags ngan pa yod tshad kyi thod bum dral byed kyi 'gran zla med pa'i pan chen zhig tu gyur ba sogs dran pa tsam gyis byin rlabs mchog stsol zhing sgrub 'brel med par dngos grub mchog stsol ba'i yi dam gyi lha'i gtso bo de nyid bsam bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshul bzung ste byang phyogs khal khar byon zhes snang mtha'i pan chen gyis dngos su lung bstan pa'i skyes chen dam pa mtshan brjod par dka' bdon gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te ^rje btsun blo bzang tshul khrims 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes rgya bod hor gsum na yongs su grags pa'i bdan dkar po rnam par bsgreng bde nyid ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling ci rigs su lo bcu phrag gnyis tsam zhal zhugs pa'i ring la mdo sngags zung 'brel dang thun mong gi rigs gnas rgya bod hor gsum na yod tshad dang bod na yang nub la khad pa'i sgra rigs par mkhas pa'i blo gsal mkhas mang klong brdol du byung zhing rje nyid kyi byin rlabs kyis 'chad rtsod rtson gsum gyi bya ba me ltar 'bar ba'i sgo nas dpal @018b ldan 'bras spungs bkra shis sgo mang gnyis par song ba'i chos grwa chen po dga' ldan theg chen gling pa'i rigs smra'i char gtogs shes brgya zhes pas gcig tu bral gyi dka' gnas skor la snga nas sems la phral phral du byung ba'i mos mno'i tho re ba rnams lung rigs kyis brgyan te bsam kyin yod skabs dpyid chos phyi ma'i dam dam bcar khad nye ba'i tsho gzhung gser gong 'og gi grwa rigs rigs smra'i ser phrug rnams la phan snyam pas rkyen byas te shog bur bris pa 'di yang ^bla ma he ru ka de nyid rmad byung bas kyang rmad byung ngo mtshar bas kyang ngo mtshar ba'i gser zhal bskal brgyad zhugs te sa mtha'i 'gro ba kun gyi ma rig mun pa sel bar mdzad pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6108</vol>
<tib># gcig tu bral gyi yig cha'i dka' gnas kha skang dang bcas pa gsal bar bshad pa'i rnam gzhag blo gsar dga' skyed beed'urya'i mgul rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-19a</p>
<col>@017b (ces pa 'di ni ^rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs rje rin po che @018a * la zhal gzigs te man ngag gnang skabs he ru ka lhun po'i rtse mor dngos su zhugs te 'dzam gling spyan ladn 'dug pas byin
