<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6108</vol>
<tib>'phrin las thams cad 'byung ba'i sgrol ma 'dus pa don dam pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po</tib>
<p>266a-277a</p>
<col>@276b de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dam tshig mchod pa'i sprin phyung rab 'byams dang bstod dbyangs rgya mtshos mngon par bstod byas nas` `lag na rdo rje 'chang la rgyud 'di gtad 'phrin las thams cad 'byung ba'i sgrol ma 'dus pa don dam pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las ji snyed pa rtsa ba'i rtog pa rdzogs so @277a * rgya gar gyi lho phyogs su sku 'khrungs pa grub chen buddha na tha'i zhabs las mnos nas slad rgya gar gyi mkhan po ni rb'a na shri'i zhal snga nas dang rgyal khams pa t'a ra na th'as phyis byung gi pandi ta mi'i nyi ma'i dka' grel dang bstun te ga-yar khral du bsgyur ba'o yang slad kyi bhang ga lar 'khrungs pa'i pandi ta bur na badzra'i drung du slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad dpal ye shes kysi mdzad pa'i rgyas 'grel chen po dang bstun nas cung zad bcos shing thams cad du grub chen zhi ba'i zhabs kyi zhal lung gi rig gzigs so so'i rnams dang khyad par gu ru lto phyogs pa chen po'i man ngag dang bstun nas legs par bcos te dag par bgyis pa'o zhus dag bkra shis "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6108</vol>
<tib>rgyal tshab chos rjes rje'i drung du gsan pa'i tshad ma'i brjed byang chen mo</tib>
<p>1a-48a</p>
<col>@047b sngar bshad pa'i rigs pa'i sgo phyogs tsam bstan pa 'di ni rnam dpyod kyi blo'i mthu chung ba gang dag shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa'i gnas rnams la rigs pas rnam par 'byed pa'i tshul la rmongs shing lung tsam skyabs su gyur nas slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yab sras kyi dri ma med pa'i rigs pa'i tshul lugs ches cher nyams par byed pa rnams kyi ngan rtogs bsal bar bya ba'i phyir du bdag gi bla ma mi'i seng ge shes bya'i gnas lugs mtha' dag dri ma med par rigs pa'i sgo nas gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan zhing khyad par du'ang phyi  dang nang gi rten 'brel gyi chos @048a * rnams snang dus nyid nas chu nang gi zla ba gzugs brnyan lta bur thugs su chud pa'i skyes bu chen po blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyi zhal snga nas kyi gsung gi cha rags pa blo la des pa rnams rigs pa smra ba dar ma rin chen gyis brjed byang du bris pa'o 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  aom swasti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri ba bsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam 'grel sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir dga' ldan theg chen gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel mangga lam "</col>

<tib>` 'jam mgon bla ma la bstod pa mkhas mchog shes rab rin chen gyis mdzad pa</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6109</vol>
<tib># gcig tu bral gyi yig cha'i dka' gnas kha skang dang bcas pa gsal bar bshad pa'i rnam gzhag blo gsar dga' skyed beed'urya'i mgul rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-19a</p>
<col>@017b (ces pa 'di ni ^rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs rje rin po che @018a * la zhal gzigs te man ngag gnang skabs he ru ka lhun po'i rtse mor dngos su zhugs te 'dzam gling spyan ladn 'dug pas byin rlabs ha cang myur du 'dzug pa'i dbang gis rgya gar na he ru ka'i rnal 'byor bas yi rdul lyar mang du byung zhes gsung po'i he ru ka de nyid dpal ldan chos grags la zhal gzigs te ci 'dod gsung bar phyogs las rnam rgyal zhus pas ha ha he zhes gsung byin pa tsam gyis chos grags nyid phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams mu med par btsal khyang rnyed rgyu med pa rigs pa smra ba'i seng ge'i ngar skad sgrog pas phas rgol gyi ri dwags ngan pa yod tshad kyi thod bum dral byed kyi 'gran zla med pa'i pan chen zhig tu gyur ba sogs dran pa tsam gyis byin rlabs mchog stsol zhing sgrub 'brel med par dngos grub mchog stsol ba'i yi dam gyi lha'i gtso bo de nyid bsam bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshul bzung ste byang phyogs khal khar byon zhes snang mtha'i pan chen gyis dngos su lung bstan pa'i skyes chen dam pa mtshan brjod par dka' bdon gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te ^rje btsun blo bzang tshul khrims 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes rgya bod hor gsum na yongs su grags pa'i bdan dkar po rnam par bsgreng bde nyid ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling ci rigs su lo bcu phrag gnyis tsam zhal zhugs pa'i ring la mdo sngags zung 'brel dang thun mong gi rigs gnas rgya bod hor gsum na yod tshad dang bod na yang nub la khad pa'i sgra rigs par mkhas pa'i blo gsal mkhas mang klong brdol du byung zhing rje nyid kyi byin rlabs kyis 'chad rtsod rtson gsum gyi bya ba me ltar 'bar ba'i sgo nas dpal @018b ldan 'bras spungs bkra shis sgo mang gnyis par song ba'i chos grwa chen po dga' ldan theg chen gling pa'i rigs smra'i char gtogs shes brgya zhes pas gcig tu bral gyi dka' gnas skor la snga nas sems la phral phral du byung ba'i mos mno'i tho re ba rnams lung rigs kyis brgyan te bsam kyin yod skabs dpyid chos phyi ma'i dam dam bcar khad nye ba'i tsho gzhung gser gong 'og gi grwa rigs rigs smra'i ser phrug rnams la phan snyam pas rkyen byas te shog bur bris pa 'di yang ^bla ma he ru ka de nyid rmad byung bas kyang rmad byung ngo mtshar bas kyang ngo mtshar ba'i gser zhal bskal brgyad zhugs te sa mtha'i 'gro ba kun gyi ma rig mun pa sel bar mdzad pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6109</vol>

<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@027a * de ltar gsung rab ma lus gcig car du ma 'dras gsal bar shar ba'i me long 'di chos kyi 'byung gnas chos rgyal chen po de'i gsung gi bdud rtsi'i me long ngos su shar ae na phul byung ngo mtshar gnas 'di la dang ba'i sems kyi yang yang 'bad pa byos 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig mangga lam "</col>

<col>@008b (zhes dpal ldan lha mo 'dod @009a * khams dbang phyug ma'i thugs dam bskangs pa dang 'ga' rkyen gyi 'tshub lhong sogs zhi ngal mchog tu bsngags pa srog chags rgyu skongs dang bam skongs kyi cho ga nyes pa kun sel zhes bya ba 'di ni spyir yang snyigs mar spyod pa'i dbang gis ma mo mkha' 'gro 'khyags pa'i 'tshub lhongs gyis bskyed pa'i nad gdon shin tu mang ba dang lhag par la snga phyir nye bskor du nad rims rigs mi 'dra ba mang du ched cing mi shes pa'i ltas mtshan sna tshogs byung ba bsrung ma'i khu ldog gi rnam pa yin pa dang bskangs bshags mang du btang na legs pa'i mtshan ma kun rtogs kyi ri mor shar pa bzhin lag len du bstar skabs btsun gzugs dharma badzra gyis bam skongs kyi cho ga lho brag grub chen las kyi rdo rje'i gsung la tshigs phrad cung zad bsgyur cing lag len gsal bar bgyis te dben gnas bde chen chos gling du klag chog chu 'babs su bkod pa 'dis kyang mi mthun nyer 'tshe thams cad zhi zhing 'dod khams dbang mo dgyes pas 'phrin las rnam bzhi lhun gyis grub par gyur cig 'di gnyan bas @009b gar thod thod du bya mi rung gsung bas snod min la gsang shing skabs shes par bya'o ` swasti tshul 'di dge slong thabs mkhas rgya mtsho yis chos sde bde chen lhun grub gling mchog tu rgyu rkyen sbyar te dpar du bzhengs pa'i dges 'gro kun bla med byang chen myur thob shog ces sh'a sa dha ras sug bris su bgyis pa dza yantu</col>

<item>

<vol>6111</vol>
<tib>rgyal po chen po sde lnga la gsol mchod 'bul tshul 'phrin las 'gag med rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-30a</p>
<col>@030a * (ces sprul pa'i chos rgyal chen po 'khor dang bcas pa dgyes dgur spyod pa'i 'phrin las 'gag med rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs zhes pa 'di yang sa chen po bde bar skyong ba'i phyag mdzod bsod nams rab brtan gyis tshang la 'khyer bde ba zhig dgos zhes bskul ba la brten nas bla ma'i las byang thugs sgrub yang snying 'dus pa las bsdus shing gsol mchod kyi rim pa rnams mnga' bdag gter byon gyi 'phrin las bcu ma dang sgrub bskor la gzhi byas thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos gnang ba las legs blangs shing tshig sbyor gsar du dgos pa rnams bsgrigs te gnod sbyin chen pos stong grogs tshul bzhin mdzad pa'i za hor gyi rigs las byung ba'i bande ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho bla med rdo rje rtsal gyis rgyal po chen pos 'phral du sgrub dgos pa'i mtshan ma byung ba ltar nyin gcig la grub par bgyis pa'i yi ge pa ni ngag dbang dge legs so sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6111</vol>
<tib>rta lha a'arya re manta'i mchod chog rgyas pa cang shes yid bzhin 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@009a * (ces rta lha a'arya re manta zhes grags pa 'di la bskang bshags bzlog pa sogs tshang ba'i mchod chog rgyas pa zhig dgos zhes ^gnam gyi lha 'jam dbyangs gong ma bdag po chen po'i rta'i su reg pa tsha har aa do chin ha ya gri wa'i dgon pa'i der ri bla ma blo bzang mthu stobs badzra gyis rin chen gnyis pa srang gi skyes dngar bcas yang yang nan gyis bskul ngor ^btsun gzugs ngag dbang thub bstan rgya mtshos shar mar spel ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge tshul blo bzang rdo rje'o  swasti tshul 'di dge slong thabs mkhas rgya mtsho yis chos sde bde chen lhun grub gling mchog tu rgyu rkyen sbyar te dpar du bzhengs pa'i dges 'gro kun bla med byang chen myur thob shog</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6113</vol>
<tib>ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sengge'i gdong pa can gtso rkyang dang gtso 'khor gsum ci rigs kyi bzlog bsgyur bya tshul 'phrog byed khros pa'i bzhad sgra zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@007b (ces ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong pa can gtso rkyang dang gtso 'khor gsum ci rigs kyi sgo nas bzlog pa bsgyur dang 'phang sbyor byed tshul 'khyer bde ba 'phrog byed khros pa'i bzhad sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni ^ btsun gzugs ngag gi dbang pos rigs mthun gyi mkha' 'gro'i man ngag la skabs thob kyi bsgyur la cung zad ma gtogs mkha' 'gro'i gsang lam la mnga' brnyes pa'i dam pa'i @008a * gsung bcos med du bsdebs pa 'dis mi mthun pa'i phyogs las rgyal bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<col>@005b (zhes tshe dpag med bdud rtsi mchog sbyin gyi zhi ba'i sbyin sreg dngos grub 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba 'di yang rang nyid yi dam 'di'i bsnyen sgrub las gsum nyams su mjug gi kha skong du nye bar mkho bas mtshams sbyar skal mnyam gzhan la'ang phan du re bas nye bar bskul te rig pa 'dzin pa gar gyi dbang pos thun bsrub tu bris pa dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6114</vol>
<tib>bsdus sbyor gyi snying po kun bsdus rigs pa'i mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10b</p>
<col>@010a * dal 'byor skyon med dbang po @010b tshang blo gsal gzhon nu shes 'dod rnams rigs tshul 'di la bslab par rigs 'di mi shes na mi yi lus lug gi go 'phang can du des slob dpon smra ba'i sengge zhes thub bstan bzhad ri bskyed tshal dang sku phyogs 'og min gling gi grwar tha snyad tshul la legs par sbyangs rigs pas rtsod par smra ba la gangs can tsam na phul byung ba de yi legs bshad rigs pa'i chos blo gros cung zad gsal byas pa rab 'byams gzhung lugs smra ba yi chos kyi dbang phyug ces bya 'am dge slong 'jam dbyangs bzhad pas bkod gzhon nu blo gsal shes 'dod rnams tshur shog ci 'dod dgos dgu longs rdo bcal sngon mo'i steng du sbyongs kun yangs phyogs med grwas 'grims kun la grogs kyi dam par ltos sdang tshul ma ston nyam dga' skyongs rgyal ba mnyes pa'i mchod sprin yin bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen yin grwa sa mdzes pa'i rgyan 'phreng yin grogs bshes dga' ba'i dga' ston yin mkhas pa rnams la skyes bzang yin blun po mkhas par sbyor byed yin kun mkhyen thob pa'i dngos rgyu yin bstan 'bar ma'i sngags  zla ba'i snying po mdo las tadya tha aab m'u ka bi m'u ke bi ra dza m'u ke ba ra m'u ke tsa la ba ti aa hi ma hi dwa pa ti ma h'a dre dhe sum bha ra bi dza ka li ma dzju le autstsha mu she ga me dzwa le dzwa la ma ni ni ba sa sw'a h'a"</col>

<p>35b-36b</p>

</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<tib>rje btsun ma ku ru kulle'i sgrub thabs autpa la'i 'phreng zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@009a * (ces khams gsum dbang bsdud lha mo ku ru kulle'i sgrub thabs autpa la'i phreng ba ces bya ba 'di ni lugs gnyis rnam par dpyod pa'i to ke ra rang mnyam gyi dregs ldan kun gyi gtsug tor las mngon par 'phags pa'i mi yi dbang po har ching ching wang ratna siddhis snga mo nas bskul zhing dus phyis rang gi slob ma 'ga' zhig dang sbyin bdag tu gyur ba'i dpon po che phra 'gas kyang nan tan du bskul ba la brten nas btsun gzugs dharma badzra gyis sbyin pa'i bdag po thu med be'i zi tshe brtan bkra shis kyi bsti gnas su sbyar ba dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<tib>'jam dpal gyi bstod pa ye shes yon tan bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6128</vol>
<tib>rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la mchod gtor 'bul ba'i rim pa mngon rtogs bskang bshags bstod pa dngos grub kyi bang mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@026b (ces rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la mchod gtor 'bul ba'i rim pa lag tu blang bde bar brjod pa 'di ni gnas brtan sdom brtson dam pa blo gros rgya mtshos bskul ba'i ngor chos smra ba dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa'i yig cha gzhir byas med mi rung rnams kha bkang ste chos 'khor rgyal gyi gtsug lag khang gi bka' gdams pho brang du nye bar sbyar ba 'dis kyang skye 'gro thams cad dbul phongs kyi sdug bsngal las thar par gyur cig bkra shis) bee bdud dpung ga-yul las rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan dang 'dod dgu'i nor gyis mchog stsol @027a * ne'u le 'di rgyal chen rnam sras mnyes pa'i rten du 'bul rten las ma 'das 'bem las ma g-yel bar  'phrin las rnam bzhi'i dngos grub char chen gsol gnas 'dir bshad sgrub dpal 'byor rgyas par mdzod (ces pa 'di ni dpon pa che'i dbang chos jo ma rgyal mo'i bka'i bskul ba la brten nas sh'akya'i btsun pa bsod nams ye shes dbang pos pho brang chen po ngo ma kha stag cer sbyar ba'o ) mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6128</vol>
<tib>rje btsun gsang ba'i bdag po la bstod pa bdun rnam dag smon lam dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>19a-20b</p>
<col>@020b (ces rje btsun gsang ba'i bdag po la bstod pa bdun rnam dag smon lam dang bcas pa 'di ni nye gnas nam mkha' rdo rjes nan cher bskul ba'i don du mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis stong ri nyi shar gyi dben gnas su sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>

<vol>6128</vol>
<tib>sangs rgyas sum cu so lnga'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga ltung ba'i mun sel zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10b</p>
<col>@010a * (ces sangs rgyas sum cu so lnga'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga ltung ba'i mun sel zhes bya ba 'di ni dad brtson ldan pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis bskul ba'i ngor grub chen las kyi rdo rje'i gsung la gzhi byas kha 'gengs 'os cung zad rnams gzhan nas kyang bsnan te ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes rang dang skal mnyam rnams la phan du re bas chos grwa chen po bkra shis 'khyil du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson ldan pa dge slong dkon mchog kun dga'o )dngos brgyud bla ma yi dam bskal bzang gi rnam 'dren rgyal ba stong dang bde gshegs brgyad sangs rgyas so lnga nye sras brgyad la sogs rgyal ba sras bcas thugs bskyed bden ba'i mthus bdag gis dus gsum dge ba ci bgyis pa mi mthun rgyen gyis nam yang mi gzhom zhing dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis bsngags pa yi 'bras bzang mtha' dag 'grub pa'i rgyur gyur cig ga-yeng zhing bsam sbyor dman pas bgyis rnams kyang phul byung dge ba'i dngos por bsgyur byas te de yi mthu las sngon bsags sdig ltung kun lhag med byang zhing dag bar byin gyis rlobs @010b 'di snang 'gag tshe nye ba'i sras rnams kyis dbugs dbyung bde ba can du 'khrid pa dang der ni 'od dpag med pa'i zhal mthong ste gsung gi bdud rtsi'i dga' ston myong bar shog skye zhing skye bar bshes gnyen dam pa yis 'bral med rjes bzung bka' bzhin sgrub pa dang phyi nang nyer 'tshe'i rkyen gyis mi g-yo bar sa lam bgrod pa myur du mthar phyin shog (ces pa 'di ni dad brtson blo dang ldan pa rab 'byams pa 'jigs med yar 'phel gyis bskul ngor ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sngags ram pa dkon mchog kun dga' 'o</col>

<item>

<tib>skyabs 'gro sems bskyed kyi nyams len gsal byed legs tshogs kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<item>

</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6129</vol>
<tib>rje btsun n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bya tshul dngos grub 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10b</p>
<col>@010a * (ces rje btsun @010b rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bya tshul dngos grub 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba 'di ni sa skya pa'i bla ma rnams kyis mdzad pa'i yig cha mang po 'dug kyang rang de'i lugs srol gyi 'gros dang mthun pa zhig byung na lag tu blang bde ba 'dug pas ci'i kyang yi ger 'gong dgos zhes don gnyer ba du mas snga phyir yang yang bskul ba la brten nas 'jam mgon sa skya pa rjes 'brang dang bcas pa'i yig cha gang yod dang khyad par du gsang chen slob bshad pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan gyis mdzad pa'i mkha' spyod sgrub pa'i dga' ston gyi steng nas phyag len mdzad kyi na 'dug pas de nyid kyi dgongs don gtso bor bzung dgongs pa mi 'gal yang cho ga'i go rim dang tshig ris cung zad mi mthun pa rnams rje rgyal ba gnyis pa yab sras kyi bzhed pa dang mthun par bgyis te btsun gzugs blo bzang chos kyi nyi mas dben gnas bde chen chos gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su gu shr'i dge slong blo bzang bzod pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6129</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod kiy sgrub thabs gsang chen bcud kyi thigs pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13b</p>
<col>@013a * (ces rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod kyi sgrub thabs gsang chen bcud kyi thig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lam 'di la mos shing byin rlabs dang gdams ngag yongs su rdzogs par thob pa ^ dharma badzra gyis man ngag gi gnad rnams chos kyi rgyal po rol pa'i rdo rje'i zhal lung bzhin rang re'i lugs srol dang mi 'gal zhing cha tshang la 'khyer bde ba nor 'khrul dang bral ba'i lugs su bgyis te @013b rang lo re drug pa bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'khor bskor ba'i dus chen gyi skabs su sgrub par sbyar ba ste kho bos sngar bkod pa'i sgrub thabs bde chen nye lam dang pad+ma r'a ga'i them skas sogs la la mchod gtor byin rlabs dang dbang bskur rgyas gdab phyi nang gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa 'bul ba sogs 'di nas gsungs pa ltar kha bskang na ches shing tu legs par 'gyur ro sarba mangga lam dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6129</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma na ro mkha' spyod ma'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa pad+ma ra ga'i them skas zhes bya ba bzhugs so  "</tib>
<p>1a-28a</p>
<col>@027b (ces rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod du grags pa'i sgrub thabs rgyas par bkod pa pad+ma r'a ga'i them skas zhes bya ba 'di ni khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po rgyal dbang lcang skya rin po che rol pa'i rdo rje'i zhal snga nas sogs yongs 'dzin dam pa du ma'i bka' drin las lhag pa'i lha 'di nyid kyi byin rlabs dang man ngag gi rim pa ma tshangs ba med pa 'jam mgon chos kyi rgyal po btsong kha pa'i legs bshad kyis brgyan te lan grangs du mar thob pa'i btsun gzugs blo bzang chos kyi nyi ma 'am ming gzhan dharma badzra zhes bgyi bas rang bzos ma slad par bla ma'i zhal gyi man ngag ji lta bu bzhin du sgrub pa'i gnas @028a * mchog bde chen chos gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su dge tshul rgyal mtshan grags pas bgyis pa dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6130</vol>
<tib>gsol 'debs thugs rje myur 'jug ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang dbang snyigs ma'i dus su ngur smrig 'dzin pa'i zlos gar bsgyur ba rdo rje 'chang chen po dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i gsol 'debs thugs rje myur 'jugs ces bya ba 'di ni rje nyid kyi sras mchog bstan pa'i gsal byed mkhan chen chos kyi rgyal po blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i lha dang sa le sbram zho bzhi'i gnang rten dang bcas bkas bskul ba dang rang nyid kyang ^rje bla ma la bstod pa ni rdo rje 'chang la bskal brgyar bstod pa las kyang phan yon che bar gsungs pa'i don yid la bsams te rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid kyi slob bu'i tha shal dza ya pandi ta sku skye blo bzang 'phrin las kyis sug bris su bgyis pa 'dis dpal ldan bla ma dam pas tshe rabs thams cad du rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig  bkra shis dge legs 'phel bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6130</vol>
<tib>gtsug tor dkar mo'i bzlog bsgyur mi mthun ga-yul las rnam rgyal zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@010a * (ces 'phags ma gtsug tor dkar mo'i bzlog bsgyur mi mthun ga-yul las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba @010b 'di ni bla pa dkon mchog gsum la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa dge slong nom che nang so ngag dbang sbyin pas bskul ba'i ngo bsrung ba'i ched du rdo rje 'chang snyigs ma'i dus su ngur smrig 'dzin pa'i zlos gar bsgyur ba rje btsun rdo rje 'chang dza ya pandi ta zhes mtshan yongs su grags pa de nyid kyi zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos len pa bka' drin gyis cung zad myong ba'i byang phyogs sog pa'i yul 'dir byams pa'i phyogs med blo zhi ming can gyis sngon gyi mkhas pa'i gsung rgyun la rten nas bgyis pas 'dis kyang bdag sogs sems can thams cad kyis mi mthun pa'i ga-yul las rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig  bkra shis </col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>ma ha tsi na'i byang mtha' rgyal khab chen po p'e kying gtso bor gyur ba'i byang phyogs kyi yul 'khor la 'os pa'i dus sbyor gyi rnam bzhag dus sbyor padmo'i tshal rab 'byed pa'i nyi ma gzhon nu zhes bya ba lags dge legs 'phel "</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@009a * (ces pa 'di ni rgyal ba gnyis pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid la mnga' bsgyur ba'i rgyal tshab dam pa khri chen mchog gi sprul pa'i sku rin po che'i gcud rgya chen rigs pa'i gnas kyi do shal 'dzin pa'i mkhas pa chen po pandi ta mkhan rin po che'i gsung gis bskul ba ltar rje btsun bla ma chos kyi spyan ldan du ma'i zhabs pad yun ring du bsten pa'i mang thos kyi btsun pa aaky'a blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dus kyi 'khor lo dad dbyangs 'char gyi rgyud 'grel dang spyi don sogs sngon rabs kyi gzhung che ba du ma dang rtsis phran gyi yi ge 'ga' zhig gi dgongs pa brtags ste sbyar ba dge legs su gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6130</vol>

<item>

<item>

<tib>rgyal po'i gsol mchod dregs pa'i re ba skong byed zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@009b (ces pa 'di ni blo gros kyi 'jug pa mchog tu yangs pa'i dge slong dkon mchog tshul khrims kyis grong chog pa rnams kyi thugs bzhed bskong ba'i slad du bris dgos su bskul bar rten snyig dus kyi mtha' la sleb pas rgyal po'i gnod pa bdo ba'i dus 'dir 'ga' zhig la phan pa'ang srid dam snyam pas rgyal po'i mdos gzhung sogs khungs thub rnams kyi don dang mi 'gal bar bsgrigs pa po ni dharma swa mi wa gindra pa tu siddhi ming can no 'dis kyang 'gro ba rnams nga rgyal dang zhe sdang gis bskul ba'i gnod byed kyi 'char sgo sna tshogs las thar bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6131</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma la brten pa'i 'chi blu ba'i gdams pa tshe srog skyo ba byed zhes bya ba bzhugs so * ltung bshags kyi sgo nas 'chi bslu bya tshul dang bzang spyod kyi 'chi bslu byed tshul go bde blag chog tu bkod pa bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b (ces pa'ang rdo rje 'grogs mched rgyud pa slob dpon pa chos brtson dpal sogs don gnyer can 'ga' zhig bskul ba'i ngor ^ rgyal khams pa dam tshig rdo rjes bris pa'o</col>

<item>

<vol>6131</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgrub thabs dregs pa kun 'dul zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004b (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgrub thabs tshig nyung la don cha tshang ba tshigs bcad du sdebs pa 'di 'dra zhig dgos zhes dkon mchog bla mar 'dzin cing dad pa dang gtong ba la sogs pa dam pas bsngags pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dur bed wang phun tshogs bsam grub kyi dpon mo nor bu r'a gas nan gyis bskul ngor ku s'a li ^dharma badzra gyis aor du su wang gi ho ro'i sgar thog tu thun gcig la mgyogs par sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>srog glud bya tshul srog gi chad 'thud ces bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6131</vol>
<tib>ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong pa can gyi sgo nas byad grol dang byabs khrus bya tshul rkyen ngan sel byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (zhes mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong pa can gyi sgo nas byad grol dang byabs khrus bya tshul rkyen ngan sel byed ces bya ba 'di ni rab 'byams smra ba dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bskul ba'i bka' ma bcag par tha shal pranydza'i ming can bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'gro kun mi mthun g-yul las shin tu rgyal zhing mkha' spyod bde chen gnas su rol bar gyur cig dge'o</col>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6134</vol>
<tib>brtan bzhugs gsol 'debs bsam don lhun grub drang srong grub pa'i bden tshig ces bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@003b (ces pa 'di ni byang phyogs hal ha'i yul du chen por thub bstan spyi dang khyad par du yang 'jam mgon bla ma khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyi ring lugs ches chir gsal bar mdzad pa po rje btsun dam pa sku phreng brgyad pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos kyi nyi ma bstan 'dzin dbang phyug dpal bzang po gnas kyi lha 'jam @004a * dpal dbyangs ^ gong ma bdag po chen po'i bka' lung bzhin gser gyi bum bzang las gsal 'thon 'khrul bral nges rnyed thog gangs can 'gro ba'i lha gcig phyag na pad dkar 'chang ba ngur smrig gar gyis rnam par rol pa ^ rgyal mchog thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nas dbu phud mtshan gso ba bcas legs par grub bstun khu ral chen po'i mkhan po no mon han aer te ni phyag mdzad rgyal khag bzhi bcas tsho ba bdun nas ched du mngags pa'i mi sna`  t'a bla ma blo bzang ye shes gsol dpon karma dza'i sang tshe ring don grub gzims 'gag chos bkra shis dge slong bstan pa dar rgyas sogs thun mong nas brtan bzhugs smon tshig 'di lta bu zhig dgos pa zhes bskul ba'i ngor ^ 'od gsal lha las babs pa'i rgyal rigs kyi bande rig sngags 'chang ba su ma ti shri ma na dharma sya kirti sh'a sa ra sye shar ra 'bod pas pho brang rgyal mtshan mthon po'i gzims chung bka' gdams pho brang du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<p>4a-5b inc [* missing page from 6a *]</p>
<col>@004b (ces pa 'di ni gser khang rdo rje 'chang gis skyabs mgon pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa la zhus pa deng sang mdo smad du dgra jag dang phyugs nad sogs nyer 'tshe sna tshogs 'byung 'dug pas de zlog thabs gang la 'bad dgos zhus pas lan la dgra jag phyugs nad ma zad me chu sogs kyi 'jigs pa'i ngo yod pas de zlog thabs la sho lo ka gnyis po 'di thams cad kyis rgyun 'don la 'bad na rim gyis zhi 'gro gsungs</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6135</vol>
<tib>jo bo sh'akya mu ni dang lha mo rnams kyi sgo nas rims nad drag po'i me dpung gzhil zhing 'chi med dpal ster bdud rtsi char 'bebs zhes pa 'am kha 'bar ma'i gtor chog bsdus pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-23a</p>
<col>@022b (zhes jo bo sh'akya mu ni dang lha mo rnams kyi sgo nas rims nad drag po'i me dpung gzhil zhing 'chi med dpal ster bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs zhes pa 'am 'bar ma'i gtor chog bsdus pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nad rims gdon gyis nyin zhing rim gro rgyas pa ma lcogs pa dbul 'phongs mi rnams la rang rang gi 'byor tshang bstun chog pa dang 'byor ba yod na'ang 'brel ba'i dus su 'phral du phan 'dod kyi rab dkar bsam pas kun nas bslangs te shin tu bsdus pa'i tshul du ri khrod pa dge slong blo bzang dar rgyas kyis rgyal ba yab sras dang rje t'a ra na tha sogs dam pa du ma'i gsung rgyun las byung ba ltar phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs te spre'u zhes pa me mo @023a * lug gi lo'i mchu zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes bcu la sgrub gnas khyad par can dga' tshal rdo rje'i brag rdzong ae wam gling du sbyar ba'o long yod cing 'byor ba che ba rnams kyis 'di rnams kyi 'gros dang mthun pa'i rim gro rgyas pa rnams la rang rang gi gzhung bzhin du 'bad par rigs yi ge pa ni bsod nams dbang phyug gis bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'gro ba mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<tib>` rje btsun so sor 'brang ma'i sgrub thabs dang gzhan yang sgrub thabs kyi rim pa</tib>

<col>@004b (ces bcom ldan 'das so sor 'brang ma'i sgrub thabs 'di ni hor ching thu she thu dbang gi thu sa lag che tha'i ji bsod nams dbang rgyal gyi dpon mo dad gus dang ldan pa sgrol ma skyabs kyis nan cher bskul ba'i ched du @005a * ^ rje bla ma dam pa'i slob bu'i tha shal sa'i mthar skyes pa'i snyoms las kyi rnal 'byor pa shri ke thu'i ming can gyis sug bris su bgyis pa'i dge ba 'dis sems can thams cad la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig  dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6138</vol>
<tib>bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga</tib>
<p>1a-69a</p>
<col>@068b (ces khams gsum 'gro ba'i 'dren mchog pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa chen po blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i mdo rgyud kun gyi snying por gyur ba bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga lhan thabs su byas pa'i rim pa rtsa ba'i bla ma thub dbang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thun mong ma yin pa'i bdag bum dkyil 'khor mchod tshul dbang chog skal ldan thar lam gsal ba'i rta bdun zhes bya ba 'di ni bka' drin mtshungs med 'gran zla ma mchis rigs dang dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag mkhan chen rdo rje 'chang dngos ngag dbang blo bzang dpal ldan don gnyis lhun grub rin po che'i zhal gyi bum bzang las 'jam mgon snyan brgyud lugs kyi chos bskor rnams kyi lung dbang rjes gnang la sogs pa gsung gi bdud rtsi'i lo bcu gsum 'khor bar mnos shing de tsam yang lto gos dge 'dun tshogs pa'i dgung tshig gi lhag ma rnying gtor lhag dang rnyang rnying hrul ba'i gos bgo ba sogs nyung zad dka' sbyang myong bas sdig pa sbyangs pa'i mtshan tsam thob nas zhabs kyi padmo'i spyi bor byon la bsten cing ^ dpal ldan bla ma'i bran gyur ba tha chung bya bral ba bikshu su ma ti @069a * wag'indra dhi ka badzra siddhis gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud sogs rgyud grub chen gyi gzhung rnams kyis gtso bor byas la rang gis kyang bcos dgos pa ni mchams sbyar te sa ga zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshe la rdzogs par sbyar ba'i bris pa ni yongs grags ming gzhan mi bskyod rdo rjer 'bod pa'o 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa spyi dang khyad par rje btsun bla ma dam pa'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa'i snying po ring lugs dri ma med pa phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig sarba mangga lam shu bham</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6164</vol>
<tib>rje bla ma bdag nyid chen po'i gsang sgrub rigs gsum spyi sgrub kyi rnal 'byor dang 'brel bar dmigs brtse ma'i byin rlabs ril bu sgrub tshul byin rlabs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@009b (ces rje bla ma bdag nyid chen po'i gsang sgrub rigs gsum spyi sgrub kyi rnal 'byor dang 'brel bar dmigs brtse ma'i byin rlabs ril bu bsgrub tshul byin rlabs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni yon tan du mas rgyud phyug pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos rje blo bzang rgya mtsho slob dpon blo bzang sangs rgyas sogs don @010a * gnyer can mang pos snga phyir yang yang bskul ba la brten nas tshad ldan mkhas grub dam pa'i chog sgrigs la gzhi byas dgon sde chen po 'ga' zhig gi phyag bzhes dang yang sgo bstun te bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las ^'jam mgon snyan brgyud kyi man ngag mang du thob pa'i snyom las pa bhikshu dh'irgh'a yu: badzra k'irt'i'am ming gzhan dam tshig rdo rjes sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge slong bstan 'dzin bzang pos bgyis pa 'dis kyang bstan 'gro yongs la phan rgya chen po thogs par gyur cig dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<col>@017a * ces mdo sngags kyi lam thams cad kyi gzhi rten kho nar gyur ba skyabs 'gro sems bskyed kyi nyamslen gsal byed legs tshogs kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhung lugs du ma la blo mig yangs pa gu shri blo bzang tshul khrims dang dpyod ldan dge slong tshul khrims rgya mtsho gnyis kysi snga phyir nan tan du bskul zhing blo dman gzhan dag la'ang phan re'i bsam pas kun nas bslangs te mkhas shing grub pa'i bla ma dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i btsun gzugs snyom las pa ^dam tshig rdo rje sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni  dge ba'i bshes gnyen rgyud pa rdo rje slob dpon pa dha rma bi rya shris bgyis pa 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che nam yang mi nub cing phyogs dus kun tu dar rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig"</col>

<col>@007a * (ces sogs mkha' 'gro'i yi ge brgya ba brjod cing yid smon gdung ba drag pos bshags pa'i rjes su bshags yul bshags bya thams cad rang bzhin med par mnyam nyid dang du bzhag bskyed rdzogs gnyis las pha rgyud bskyed rim gtso che ma rgyud la stong nyid gtso che'o` `mkha' 'gro bdud 'dul drag mo'i bskang gsol 'phrin las myur mgyogs zhes bya ba 'di ni t'akki seng ge gdong ba can dang aorgyan mkhan po'i gsungs bzhin pan chen b'ee ro tsa na sbyar ba'o las can bu dang 'phrad par shog: sa ma ya: rgya rgya rgya: gtad rgya: spos rgya: zab rgya: bkra shis par gyur cig</col>

<item>

<vol>6168</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mchog rol pa gsang sgrub kyi rnal 'byor la brten nas rdzogs rim gyi zab 'khrid bsgom tshul mdor bsdus su bstan pa zab lam sgo 'byed rin chen lde mig ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15a inc [*missing page from 10a-10b*]</p>
<col>@014b de ltar bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mchog rol ba gsang sgrub kyi rnal 'byor la brten nas rdzogs rim kyi zab 'khrid bsgom tshul mdor bsdus su bstan pa zab lam sgo 'byed rin chen lde mig ces bya ba 'di ni lug rtogs yon tan du mas mngon par mtho ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen kushr'i bla ma ngag dbang don grub dpal bzang po nas lha ldan sprul ba'i gtsug lag khang du nged dang lhan cig chos kyi dga' ston la 'dzom pa'i tshe 'di lta bu zhig cis kyang dgos zhes nan tan chen pos bskul ma mdzad pa rim 'gyangs su song ba nye char chen po hor gyi yul gru nas 'phrin yig gi lam brgyud de dran bskul nan cher byung ba la brten nas mtshan ldan yongs 'dzin du ma'i bka' drin gyis nye bar 'tsho ba btsun gzugs ^dam tshig rdo rjes gangs can bod kyi rdo rje gdan chen po'i nye 'dabs kyi dben nas brag ri byang chub gling du sug bris su bgyis pa dar rgyas 'phel "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6168</vol>
<tib>bka' rdzogs pa chen po yang zab dkon mchog spyi 'dus kyi khrid yig gu ru dgongs rgyan las sngon 'gro'i don cha zur bkol thar ba'i bde lam zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (ces pa'ang zab mo'i gnas la 'dun pa bla ma karma bkra shis dge legs dang karma bsod nams zung gis bskul ngor pad+ma'i sngags rig 'dzin pa pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rtsal gyis ts'a 'dwa rin chen brag gi sgrub gnas su sbyar ba dge legs 'phel mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6168</vol>
<tib>dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi rigs gsum gcig tu 'dus pa 'jam mgon tsong kha pa chen po'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi sgo nas las bzhi'i 'khor lo'i rnam bzhag lag tu blang ba man ngag nor bu'i gan mdzod zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-29a</p>

</item>

<tib>srad brgyud lugs kyi bla ma'i rnal 'byor dga' ldan lha brgya ma dang 'brel bar dmgis brtse ma'i las rim gyi cho ga zla ba'i 'khri shing zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6170</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub chog bum chog bdag 'jug dang bcas pa bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-42a</p>
<col>@041b (ces dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub cing mchod de @042a * bdag 'jug blang ba'i tshul las bsgrub mchod bya ba'i tshul yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po shar tsong kha pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis mdzad pa'i dkyil chog rin chen 'phreng ba nas bshad pa bzhin za ma tog lhan thabs su gsung ba ltar dang bum mchog kyang dkyil chog de nyid nas bshad pa ji lta ba bzhin rab gnas bkra shis snye ma'i lhan thabs su gsung ba ltar la bdag 'jug gi ngag 'don pan chen chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung bzhin 'jug pa bde ba'i phyir phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs shing gal che ba'i dmigs pa rnams mchan gyis gsal bar byas pa 'di nyid gsung rab kyi tshig don la blo gros kyi 'jug pa yangs shing nyams len dang rnam par dkar ba'i phyogs la brtson pa'i lhag bsam dge ba can t'a bla ma ngag dbang bsam gtan dar rgyas kyi nan gyis bskul ba la brten nas btsun gzugs snyoms las pa ngag dbang chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bgyi bas 'jam dbyangs gong ma chen po'i rgyal khab pe'i cing gi tsan dan jo bo'i lha khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dka' bcu ngag dbang chos 'byor ro 'dis kyang 'jam mgon chos kyi rgyal ba tsong kha pa chen po'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6170</vol>
<tib>rab gnas bkra shis snye ma'i lhan thabs dang bsres te nag 'gros su bkod pa 'khyer bde kun phan ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-70a</p>
<col>@070a * (ces pa 'di ni 'du gsum snyoms las mkhan bhiksha bi dza'i ming can gyis bkra shis snyi ma dang de'i lhan thabs gnyis lhan cig tu bsres shing rab gnas chen mo sogs la'ang zhib tu brtags nas rang gis brjed byang dang skal mnyam 'ga' la'ang phan 'dod kyi bsam pas phyogs gcig tu bris pa'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6246</vol>
<tib>grub mtha'i rnam par bzhag pa 'khrul spong gdong lnga'i sgra dbyangs kun mkhyen lam bzang gsal ba'i rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-14a</p>
<col>@013b ces grub pa'i mtha' rnam par bzhag pa 'khrul spong gdong lnga'i sgra dbyangs thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam bzang gsal ba'i rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas mang thos gser khang chos rje gu na ma tis snyan tshig me tog gsar bas bskul zhing dus phyis yongs kyi bshes gnyen chen po @014a * mkhas mchog lcang rwa slob dpon pa 'phags pa rin chen gyis khams chab mdo nas rda ga-yu kha 'thag gi rten bcas nas chab shog chigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas stag lo'i dgag lan 'jam rgyas dgos zhes bskul ba'i bka' ngo dang khyad par rang blo goms pa'i slad du mkhan chen rgyal ba thams cad kyi bdag po rin po che las sdom gsum sogs chos kyi bka' drin thob cing 'jam dbyangs bla ma khri rin po che yab sras bzhi dang pan chen bka' 'gyur ba rdo rje 'chang smin grol chos kyi rgyal po sre rdo rje 'chang dang sems dpa' chen po ngag dbang blo gros sogs dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len cing rje bla ma'i mdo sngags rnams la nges shes rnyed cing 'phags bod kyi grub mtha'i gzhung dang khyad par sher sgron tshad chen rtsa 'grel dus 'khor sogs gzhung lugs chen po rnams la brten gsung rab dang grub mtha' rab 'byams smra ba 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes tshig nyung rgyas 'grel du dkar po zhes pa sa mo sprul gyi lo cho 'phrul zla ba dkar phyogs rdzogs pa gsum pa'i nyin gangs can gyi bya rgod phung po gnyis pa dpa' po mkh'a 'gro'i 'du gnas ri bod dge 'phel gyi gar 'dug theg mchog rol mtsho gsang sngags bde ba chen po'i pho brang nas sbyar ba la slar yang 'bri bsnon nyung zad byas pa 'dis rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6246</vol>
<tib>grub mtha'i rnam par bzhag pa 'khrul spong gdong lnga'i sgra dbyangs kun mkhyen lam bzang gsal ba'i rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-14a</p>
<col>@013b ces grub pa'i mtha' rnam par bzhag pa 'khrul spong gdong lnga'i sgra dbyangs thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam bzang gsal ba'i rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas mang thos gser khang chos rje gu na ma tis snyan tshig me tog gsar bas bskul zhing dus phyis yongs kyi bshes gnyen chen po @014a * mkhas mchog lcang rwa slob dpon pa 'phags pa rin chen gyis khams chab mdo nas rda ga-yu kha 'thag gi rten bcas nas chab shog chigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas stag lo'i dgag lan 'jam rgyas dgos zhes bskul ba'i bka' ngo dang khyad par rang blo goms pa'i slad du mkhan chen rgyal ba thams cad kyi bdag po rin po che las sdom gsum sogs chos kyi bka' drin thob cing 'jam dbyangs bla ma khri rin po che yab sras bzhi dang pan chen bka' 'gyur ba rdo rje 'chang smin grol chos kyi rgyal po sre rdo rje 'chang dang sems dpa' chen po ngag dbang blo gros sogs dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len cing rje bla ma'i mdo sngags rnams la nges shes rnyed cing 'phags bod kyi grub mtha'i gzhung dang khyad par sher sgron tshad chen rtsa 'grel dus 'khor sogs gzhung lugs chen po rnams la brten gsung rab dang grub mtha' rab 'byams smra ba 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes tshig nyung rgyas 'grel du dkar po zhes pa sa mo sprul gyi lo cho 'phrul zla ba dkar phyogs rdzogs pa gsum pa'i nyin gangs can gyi bya rgod phung po gnyis pa dpa' po mkh'a 'gro'i 'du gnas ri bod dge 'phel gyi gar 'dug theg mchog rol mtsho gsang sngags bde ba chen po'i pho brang nas sbyar ba la slar yang 'bri bsnon nyung zad byas pa 'dis rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6246</vol>
<tib>grub mtha'i rnam par bzhag pa 'khrul spong gdong lnga'i sgra dbyangs kun mkhyen lam bzang gsal ba'i rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@013b ces grub pa'i mtha' rnam par bzhag pa 'khrul spong gdong lnga'i sgra dbyangs thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam bzang gsal ba'i rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas mang thos gser khang chos rje gu na ma tis snyan tshig me tog gsar bas bskul zhing dus phyis yongs kyi bshes gnyen chen po @014a * mkhas mchog lcang rwa slob dpon pa 'phags pa rin chen gyis khams chab mdo nas rda ga-yu kha 'thag gi rten bcas nas chab shog chigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas stag lo'i dgag lan 'jam rgyas dgos zhes bskul ba'i bka' ngo dang khyad par rang blo goms pa'i slad du mkhan chen rgyal ba thams cad kyi bdag po rin po che las sdom gsum sogs chos kyi bka' drin thob cing 'jam dbyangs bla ma khri rin po che yab sras bzhi dang pan chen bka' 'gyur ba rdo rje 'chang smin grol chos kyi rgyal po sre rdo rje 'chang dang sems dpa' chen po ngag dbang blo gros sogs dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len cing rje bla ma'i mdo sngags rnams la nges shes rnyed cing 'phags bod kyi grub mtha'i gzhung dang khyad par sher sgron tshad chen rtsa 'grel dus 'khor sogs gzhung lugs chen po rnams la brten gsung rab dang grub mtha' rab 'byams smra ba 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes tshig nyung rgyas 'grel du dkar po zhes pa sa mo sprul gyi lo cho 'phrul zla ba dkar phyogs rdzogs pa gsum pa'i nyin gangs can gyi bya rgod phung po gnyis pa dpa' po mkh'a 'gro'i 'du gnas ri bod dge 'phel gyi gar 'dug theg mchog rol mtsho gsang sngags bde ba chen po'i pho brang nas sbyar ba la slar yang 'bri bsnon nyung zad byas pa 'dis rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6254</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa lha dgu'i dkyil chog mngon dga'i zhing du bgrod pa'i them skas zhes bya ba bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-2a</p>
<col>@002a * (ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa'i bla rgyud kyi gsol 'debs 'di yang mkha' spyod mdo sngags rab 'byams pa blo bzang bkra shis nan gyis bskul ba la brten nas dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6254</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa lha dgu'i dkyil chog mngon dga'i zhing du bgrod pa'i them skas zhes bya ba bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-31a</p>
<col>@031a * (ces jo bo rje nas brgyud pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa lha dgu'i dkyil chog mngon dga'i zhing du bgrod pa'i them skas zhes bya ba 'di ni rab [???] smra ba'i dbang po t'a bla ma ngag dbang dar rgyas dang dad ldan thu sa lag chi ba da rang gu'i gnysi kyis bskul ba la brten nas rig pa 'dzin pa lcang sbya rol pa'i rdo rjes dpal ldan jo bo aa ti shas mdzad pa'i mi 'khrugs pa'i bsgrub thabs dkyil chog sbyin bsreg gsum dang dze ta ri dang dbang bo rdo rje'i gzhung dang pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang kun gzigs lnga pa chen po sogs kyi gsung rab rnams la legs par dpyad de dam pa'i dgongs pa ang mi 'gal zhing lag tu blang bde bar bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod phun sum tshogs pa nye gnas dge slong dge legs nam mkhas bgyis pa'i sa kyang 'gro ba mang po la phan 'dogs par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6254</vol>
<tib>chos rgyal bdun gyi bstod pa ni "</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * ces byang phyogs shambha la'i yul gyi rigs ldan rnams la bstod cing gsol ba 'debs pa'i rab tu phye ba dngos grub rnam par 'byung ba'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di ni pan chen phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba dpal ldan dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas khyab bdag 'khor bo'i mgon po rje btsun blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas thugs brtse ba chen po'i sgo nas dgyes bzhin du stsal ba'o"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6254</vol>
<tib>dpal bde mchog gi sgo nas tshogs mchod bya tshul kun bzang mchod sprin zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@009b ces dpal bde mchog gi sgo nas tshogs mchod bya tshul kun bzang mchod sprin zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba aerte ni no min han zhes bgyi bas snga mo nas yang dang yang du bskul ba sems la 'chang zhing nye lam rang gi zla bo sdom brtson rnam dpyod dang ldan pa ka bcu ngag dbang chos ldan zhes bya bas bde mchog gi bsnyen 'tshams byed skabs 'jug tu tshogs mchod byed tshul snga ma cung zad rgyas pa de rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa dge 'dun bkra shis kyis rdo rje 'phreng ba'i dkyil 'khor thams @010a * cad la tshogs mchod bya tshul mdor bsdus shig bkod pa ltar dang rjes ma shin tu bsdus pa de rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa lnga pa don gyis slad du mtshan nas smos te mkhan rin po che ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i tshogs mchod 'dod dgu'i mchod sbyin ltar la 'jam dbyangs sa skya pandi tas mdzad pa'i tshogs 'khor las kyang cung zad kha bskangs te zung gru zi zhes pa'i lha khang chen mor sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson chos la 'dun pa'i ka bcu ngag dbang chos sbyor ro 'dis kyang rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  dge'o par 'di ni khu re chen mo'i rgyud grwa tshang du bzhugs "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6254</vol>
<tib>dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i tshogs mchod</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (zhes pa 'di ni dge 'phel ri khrod kyi sngags rams pa ngag dbang 'jam dbyangs kyis dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i tshogs mchod 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba ltar dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pa ^sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis sbyar ba'o hu re chen mo rgyud grwa tshang 'dir dge slong bzod pas par bsgrubs nas byon sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6254</vol>
<tib>dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i lag mchod bde chen gsal bdag 'don du bsgrigs pa dge legs 'dod dgu'i char 'bebs bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b ces 'khor lo sdom pa'i lag mchod bya tshul gyi ngag 'don 'di yang dgon gnas 'di nyid kyi sgrub mchod skabs su tshegs 'don du bya rgyud rgyal sras ming can gyis bris "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6255</vol>
<tib># rab gnas mdor bsdus kyi 'don cha</tib>
<p>1a-23a</p>
<col>@023a * zhes pa 'di slob dpon aa bhya ka ra'i gsung ltar bkod pa'o  'das ma 'das kyi bsreg rdzas 'bul ba'i sngags kyi spel tshig ni bdag cag dpon slob yon mchod 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshe dang bsod nams dpal 'byor gzi bdzid dang sde snod gsum dang rgyud sde bzhi'i bshad sgrub kyi bya ba dang khyad par du yang rab tu gnas bya'i lha rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi mdzad pa 'phrin las mchod pa'i sprin tshogs thams cad bu shtim ku ru aom zhes te gzhan kyi ltar rdzas so so la kha bsgyur dgos so "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6255</vol>
<tib># rgyal ba byams pa'i sgrub thabs dang 'brel ba'i mchod chog dga' ldan pad mtshor 'jug pa'i gru gzings zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@017a * (^ces rgyal ba byams pa'i mchod chog dga' ldan pad mtshor 'jug pa'i gru gzings zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhung lugs lta ba'i blo mig yangs shing dad pa nang tshul khrims kyi nor dang ldan pa lha bris pa dge slong blo bzang chos 'byor nas 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i don du ^btsun pa wa gindra pa tu siddhis rgyud sde gang gi lugs su byed kyang 'gal med khal kha hu re chen mor sbyar ba'i 'dis kyang bdag gzhan thams cad rgyal ba byams pa mgon pos rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6255</vol>

<col>@013a (dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i zhi rgyas kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i ngag 'don tsam zhig bzung bde ba khon don du gnyer ba'i las dang po pa dag gi ngor ^ sh'akya'i dge slong dge legs dpal bzang pos dpal ri bo mdangs can gyi dgon par sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6255</vol>
<tib>dpal jo bo chen po'i lugs kyi sgrol ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sgrub thabs man ngag dang bcas pa dngos grub 'dod dgu'i mchog sbyin zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-16a</p>
<col>@015b (ces dpal lha gcig jo bo chen po nas nye bar brgyud pa'i rje btsun sgrol ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sgrub thabs man ngag dang bcas pa dngos grub 'dod dgu'i mchog sbyin zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi slob ma don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis kyang bskul zhing tshul 'di nyid rang phyogs su byin rlabs kyi bka' babs gzhan las che zhing nyi bar mkho ba'i gad mas pa khyad par can zhig yin na'ang las tshogs kyi rigs mang tsam las 'phral tu dgos pa'i bsnyen sgrub mchod chog gi rim pa lag tu blang bde ba zhig mi snang bas rang gzhan mang po'i nyams len tu phan 'dod kyi bsam bas kyang kun nas bslangs te rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dge 'dun bkra shis kyi sgrub thabs dang pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa'i las tshogs sogs la gzhi byas bla ma dam pa'i phyag bzhes gsung rgyun gyis brgyan nas mkhas grub yongs 'dzin du ma'i bka' drin la brten nas lhag pa'i lha mo 'di nyid kyi chos skor mang du thob pa'i rgyal khams pa ^dam tshig rdo rjess ri bo dge mtho'i nags khrod bdud rtsi sman chu'i 'gram sdings su rgyal bas chos 'khor bskor ba'i dus chen gyi nyin grub par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos 'dun slob bu dge slong bstan 'dzin bzang po'o 'dis kyang bka' gdams gsar snying gi bstan pa rin po che nam yang mi nub cing phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun rin tu gnas pa dang bdag gzhan thams cad rje btsun sgrol mas   @016a * dus rtag tu dgyes bzhin rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyun gyur cig ) "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6255</vol>
<tib>dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo rgyal pa blo bzang grags pa la gsol 'debs smon tshig bsam pa lhun gyis grub pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (ces dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos po rgyal ba ^blo bzang grags pa la gsol 'debs pa'i smon tshig bsam pa lhun gyis 'grub pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ^rgyal mkhan po grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang chos 'phel lo dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6255</vol>
<tib>gdung shugs drag pos smre sngags gsol 'debs bya tshul</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * zhes pa 'di ni dpyod ldan dge slong mgon po bkra shis dang spar dpon tshe dpag gnyis kyi 'dod mos ltar ^pa t'u siddhis bris pa skal mnyam la phan thogs par gyur cig   mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6255</vol>
<tib>grub chen nyi ma sbas pa'i lugs kyi seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs dang 'brel bar mandal bzhi pa'i cho ga bya tshul mi 'jigs dga' bde'i dpal ster zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15b</p>
<col>@015b (ces grub brnyes slob dpon  nyi ma spas pa'i lugs kyi seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs dang 'brel bar mandal bzhi pa'i cho ga ji ltar bya tshul gsal bar bkod pa mi 'jigs dga' bde'i dpal ster zhes bya ba 'di ni drin can bla ma rnams kyi zhabs brtan gyi rim gror cho ga 'di nyid yang yang lag tu bstar ba'i skabs dam ldan rdo rje'i mched grogs rnams nas rgya bsdus 'tshem zhing lag len gsal ba'i yi ge gsar bris zhig dgos tshul gyis bskul ma byung bar brten mdo chos dang bya rgyud ci rigs pa'i 'gros sbyar ba'i chog sgrigs dam pa gong ma rnams kyis mdzad pa ches mang bas de dag gi skyor slos? kyi ngag rtsom la dgos pa ma mchis rung rnal 'byor bla med kyi lugs dang 'brel ba'i tshul 'di lta bu zhig byung na grub chen nyi spas kyi dgongs bar 'gro des shing 'brel shin tu chags la rang gzhan gyi lag len du'ang phan pa'i lam du 'gyur bar mthong nas mkhas grub tshad ldan du ma'i yig cha rnams la zhib tu brtags shing don gyi snying po rnams legs par bsdus te 'jug pa shin tu bde bar yongs 'dzin dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las lha mchog 'di'i dbang dang gdams dag sogs kyi chos skor mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes lta ldan sprul ba'i gtsug lag khang chen po'i nye 'dabs zhig tu nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson dge slong blo bzang nam mkha' rdo rjes so 'dis kyang bstan 'gro yongs la phan par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<vol>6255</vol>
<tib>rje btsun byams mgon gyi bstod pa</tib>
<p>1a-2a</p>
<col>@002a * ces rje btsun byams mgon gyi bstod pa 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes thub bstan yongs rdzogs kyi mda' bdag byang phyogs shing rta'i srol 'byed khal kha ^rje btsun dam pa rin po che'i bkas bskul ma mdzad pa bzhin ^ sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan bstan pa'i nyi ma phyogs las rnam rgyal dpal bzang pos dang pa chen pos sbyar ba'o "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6255</vol>
<tib>tshe dpag med lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog nags 'gros su bkod pa</tib>
<p>1a-23a</p>
<col>@022a * (ces bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dpag med dkyil 'khor gyi chog bdag 'jug tshang ba 'di bkra shis lhun po'i rgyud grwa ba rnams kyi phyag len ltar bris pa 'di la nongs pa'i cha yod pa rnams bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro chos skyong bsrung ma rnams kyis sgrib pa mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol legs byas thams cad mar gyur sems can rnams spyir 'khor ba dang  dgos ngan song gi sdug bsngal las grol te zhing mchog bde ba can du skye ba'i rgyu ru bsngo'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6255</vol>
<tib>yi ge'i thob thang nyer mkho rab gsal me long</tib>

<col>@002b (ces pa 'di'ang shes rab rab rgyas kyis rab byung bco lnga pa'i dpal 'dong zhes pa chu mo bya lo'i hor zla drug pa'i gnam gang la bris pa dge legs 'phel par 'di hal ha khu re chen mo'i chos grwa che ba bkra shis chos 'phel grwa tshang gi par khang du bzhugs su gsol lags</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6256</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa lha dgu'i dkyil chog mngon dga'i zhing du bgrod pa'i them skas zhes bya ba bzhugs s+ho "</tib>

<p>1a-31a</p>
<col>@031a * (ces jo bo rje nas brgyud pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa lha dgu'i dkyil chog mngon dga'i zhing du bgrod pa'i them skas zhes bya ba 'di ni rab 'byams smra ba'i dbang po t'a bla ma ngag dbang dar rgyas dang dad ldan thu sa lag chi ba da rang gu'i gnyis kyis bskul ba la brten nas rig pa 'dzin pa lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rjes dpal ldan jo bo aa ti shas mdzad pa'i mi 'khrugs pa'i bsgrub thabs dkyil chog sbyin bsreg gsum dang dze ta ri dang dpa' bo rdo rje'i gzhung dang pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang kun gzigs lnga pa chen po sogs kyi gsung rab rnams la legs par dpyad de dam pa'i dgongs pa dang mi 'gal zhing lag tu blang bde bar bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod phun sum tshogs pa nye gnas dge slong dge legs nam mkhas bgyis pa'i sa kyang 'gro ba mang po la phan 'dogs par gyur cig</col>

<item>

<tib>dpal ldan dmag zor rgyal mo'i bsnyen sgrub la 'jug pa'i man ngag khrag 'thung dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8b</p>
<col>@008b ces dpal ldan dmag zor rgyal mo'i bsnyen sgrub la 'jug pa'i man ngag khrag 'thung dga' ston zhes bya ba 'di ni bstan pa'i gsal byed mkhan sngon chos skyabs ti yan ch'i sprul ba'i sku dkon mchog bstan 'dzin rgya mtsho dang aor du su hang gin pee li'i dog gi dad brtson lhag bsam dad ldan pa dge slong dkon mchog dpal bzang bcas kysi bskul ba'i ngor ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes 'phral du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sngags ram pa dkon mchog kun dga'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6258</vol>
<tib>grub chen las kyi rdo rje'i bstod pa bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-2a</p>
<col>@002a * chos dang bkra shis 'phel bar mdzad du gsol "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6258</vol>
<tib>gtor ma chags ma lag len</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * de ltar na cha gsum gyi gtor cho ga mdor bsdus 'di yang slod ma byams pa kun dga' la sogs pas bskul ba'i ngor t'a ra n'a thas nags rgyal gyi dben gnas su smras pa'o bkra shis dge'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6258</vol>

<col>@001b ces rje btsun dam pa 'jam dbyangs sprul ba'i skus gsol 'debs brtan bzhugs dang bcas pa 'di ni kun dga' bkra shis kyis sprul pa ltar chos smra ba'i btsun pa blo bzang ye shes kyis gzims khang rgyal mtshan mthon po nyi ma'i 'od la byil bar sbyar ba dge legs 'phel "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6258</vol>
<tib>rje btsun dam pa 'jam dbyangs sprul pa'i skus gsol 'debs kyi brtan bzhugs</tib>

</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6258</vol>
<tib>rje btsun 'jam dbyangs kyi bstod pa shes rab gsal byed ma bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-2a</p>
<col>@002a * (ces pa 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa legs pas rgyal mtshan gyis nan char bskul ba la brten nas blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis shangs mdo gong tshang gi ri thod du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6258</vol>
<tib>rje btsun mi ga-yo mgon po la bstod pa byin rlabs kyi chu gter zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * rigs rus phun tshogs dpal gyis rab mtho zhing  rnam thos bu yi 'byor ba'ang gzil gnon pa lhag bsam bzang po can des bskul ba'i ngor dka' bzhi smra ba blo bzang grags pas sbyar "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6258</vol>
<tib>thub pa'i dbang po'i mdzad pa bsdoms bcu'i bstod pa bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col>@002b zhes pa 'di ni gzims khang gong nas mchog gi sprul pa'i grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi bkas bskul ba la brten nas ston pa bla na med pa de'i zhabs phyir bsnyegs par 'dod pa sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal tshab dam pas rgyud bla mar mdzad bcu'i bsdoms lta bu gsungs pa ji bzhin du mgyogs par bris pa'i yi ge pa ni mdo sngags rab 'byams pa dge slong blo bzang bstan pa dar rgyas so "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6258</vol>
<tib>thugs rje chen po phyag bzhi pa'i bstod bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col>@002b (ces pa 'di bkra shis sgang chos nang so chos mdzad pas bskul ba'i ngor chos smra ba'i btsun pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6259</vol>
<tib>bar do'i 'phrang sgrol gyi gsol 'debs 'jigs grol gyi dpa' bo zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa gtan bde'i bsil ba ster byed zla zer zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@010b ces mkhas grub bye ba'i gtsug rgyan pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gysi mdzad pa'i bar do'i 'phrang sgrol gyi gsol 'debs 'jigs sgrol gyi dpa' bo @011a * zhes bya ba 'di'i don rnams mdor bsdus shing go sla bar bshad pa zhig gyis zhes aos rod nas gsar du yongs shing zab mo'i nyams len la blo gros gzhol ba'i su la bla ma dge slong btes po chos rje blo bzang sangs rgyas kyis bskul ba'i ngor mang du thos pa lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rjes sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba su la bla ma dge bshes tshul khrims dar rgyas kyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang blo bzang rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6259</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa'i cho ga dang 'brel ba'i smon lam shis brjod phun tshogs char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * ces bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa'i cho ga dang 'brel ba'i smon lam shis brjod phun tshogs char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni kan chen dgon pa'i 'dus spyi nas tshogs 'don du byas chog pa zhig gyis zhes bskul ma 'byung ba ltar rgyal khams myul ba'ik rig pa 'dzin pa ^lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rjes sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan chos rje thub bstan dar rgyas kyis bgyis pa kun tu bkra shis par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6259</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma gdugs dkar po can gyi sgo nas drag po'i sbyin sreg bya tshul 'jigs rung me'i 'phrul 'khor rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-19b</p>
<col>@019a * ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma gdugs dkar po can gyi sgo nas drag po'i sbyin sreg bya tshul 'jigs rung me'i 'phrul 'khor rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba 'di ni yab rje rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa'i sbyin bdag chen po bsod nams stobs kyi mngon par mtho ba khal kha ga-yon ru can jun se chen b'e li tshe ring bsam grub nyid nas rang shog chos grwa ga-yas pa'i chos skyong chen mo rdo rje grags ldan nas bstan srid spyi sgos kyi zhabs brtan du gdugs dkar gyi drag sreg byed dgos kyi lung bstan stsal ba'i don bzhin bshul ring yi ge'i lam nas srid na ring ba'i lha rdzas @019b skyes dang bcas bsul ba'i ngor sum bha mkhan chen gyis mdzad pa'i drag sreg nyung bsdus sa bon lta bu yod par thos kyang lgag tu dpe ma 'byro rung 'jam mgon bla ma'i gsung sbyin sreg dngos grub rgya mtsho la brten nas bya rgyud dang mthun par byas te bla ma yi dam rang sems dbyer med pa'i rnal 'byor la mos blor spyod par rlom pa'i sngags 'chang rgan po blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos sbyin sreg gi khrid thob skabs kyi bla ma'i gsung gsang man ngag gis brgyan te gser teg dgon dga' ldan 'gro phan gling gi rtse bla brang gi gzims gsar ae wam dga' 'khyil du sug bris su bgyis pa'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6259</vol>
<tib>'jigs med rdo rje'i dris lan</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@006b zhes pa 'di ni dar khan aem chi'i shes brgya zhes pas smras pa'o  aom swa sti rigs tshul spobs dag tsha reg 'bar ba'i khams skal ldan yid dbang padmo 'byed pa'i gnyen nges don mkhas pa bstan 'gro'i dpal mgon du rab grub nyin byed yid mkhar rtag tu rol snang shas sgyu ma brtsun pa'i bslu brid la bden par zhen pas ga-yengs pa'i bar zhig nas stes kyis bshes gsung gces spras dad gus kyis par bskrun rnam dkar bstan 'gror phan thogs shog 'di la 'brel thogs kun kyang tshe rabs kun 'di 'dra'i dam pa'i bshes kyis rjes 'dzin cing 'dis mtshon chos kun thos bsam mthar phyin nas 'di ltar chos sbyin stob pa'i gtsor gyur cig  (ces pa 'di'ang hor chen gyi yul grur skyes pa'i snyom las pa @007a * shes rab rab rgyas kyis rab byung bco lnga pa'i lcags rta lo'i sa ga zla bar ho ri po ri yad kyi aos pon thu bya ba'i sa char bsdad skabs mthun rkyen sbyar te par du brkos pa'i dge ba sngo tshig tu bgyis pa dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6259</vol>
<tib>mkhas mchog chos kyi spyan ldan bla ma rin po che la blo rig gi yig cha'i dogs gnas 'ga' zhig zhus pa'i dri be</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (ces pa 'di'ang hor chen gyi yul grur skyes pa'i snyom las pa shes rab rab rgyas kyis rab byung bco lnga pa'i rab myos zhes pa lcags rta lo'i sa ga zla bar ho ri po ri yad kyi sa'i cha aos pon bru bya bar bsdad skabs mthun rkyen sbyar te par du bzhengs pa'i dge ba sngo tshig tu bgyis pa dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6259</vol>
<tib>mkhas mchog chos kyi spyan ldan bla ma rin po che la blo rig gi yig cha'i dogs gnas 'ga' zhig zhus pa'i dri be</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (ces pa 'di'ang hor chen gyi yul grur skyes pa'i snyom las pa shes rab rab rgyas kyis rab byung bco lnga pa'i rab myos zhes pa lcags rta lo'i sa ga zla bar ho ri po ri yad kyi sa'i cha aos pon bru bya bar bsdad skabs mthun rkyen sbyar te par du bzhengs pa'i dge ba sngo tshig tu bgyis pa dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6259</vol>
<tib>rab gnas dge legs char 'bebs kyi phyag len mtha' dag gsal bar bshad pa legs byas sprin gyi sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-19b</p>
<col>@019b (ces rab gnas dge legs char 'bebs kyi phyag len mtha' dag gsal bar bshad pa legs byas sprin gyi sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di ni ^skyabs mgon mchog sprul rin po che blo bzang thub bstan 'jigs med rgya mtshos dbu mdzad de gser khang chen po nye sras rnams rab gnas mdzad skabs lag len zhib thigs su bgyis pa bde bzhin yi ger 'khod pa zhig dgos tshul tshogs chen dbu mdzad sngags ram pa blo bzang dkon mchog sogs kysi bskul ngir ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron me sbyar ba''i yi ge pa ni dge slong dkon mchog kun dga' bgyis pa 'di yang bstan 'gro yongs la phan bde'i dge mtshan bla nas bblar spel ba'i rgyur gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6259</vol>
<tib>rab gnas rgyas pa'i ngag 'don bkra shis bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs kyi lhan thabs dang gsang 'dus la brten pa'i tshul sa bon dang bcas brjod pa dge mtshan dbyar rnga ldir ba'i chu 'dzin dbang po zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-38a</p>
<col>@037b (ces rab gnas rgyas pa'i ngag 'don bkra shis bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs kyi lhan thabs dang gsang 'dus la brten pa'i tshul sa bon dang bcas brjod pa @038a * dge mtshan dbyar rnga ldir ba'i chu 'dzin dbang po zhes bya ba 'di ni byang phyogs khal kha se chen rgyal khag can jun se chen p'e li'i shog gi tshogs chen 'du khang gsar bzhengs kyi rab gnas rgyas pa byas skabs su gong gsal bstan pa'i sbyin bdag chen po sa'i tshangs pa gnyis pa nyid nas phyis su lo star bzhin rab gnas rgyas pa chag med re byed rgyu'i phyag bzhes kyi rgyun la phan pa'i lhan thabs shig dgos zhes bka' stsal pa dang du blangs te 'jigs byed kyi sgo nas bya tshul rgyas pa dang gsang 'dus la brten pa'i tshul sa bon gyi tshul du bka' drin mtshungs pa med pa'i drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma du ma la brten nas sbyin sreg sogs man ngag gsum dang rab gnas sogs yan lag drug gi khrim man ngag rnams legs par thob pa'i ban rgan snyom las pa gser tog no mon han blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos mi dbang nyid kyi gur sgar steng du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6259</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sengge sgra la brten pa'i klu dang sa bdag gi gdon grol gyi cho ga nyer bsdus nad gdon kun sel phan bde'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@017a * (ces rje btsun sengge sgra la brten pa'i klu dang sa bdag gi gdon grol gyi cho ga nyer bsdus nad gdon kun sel phan bde'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba 'di ni nad pa sogs kyi don du 'phral du sgrub dgos pa'i skabs du mar chog zor yang ba 'di lta bu zhig mkho che bar mthong nas rgyal khams pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes ^rje btsun gong ma'i gsung la kha skangs cung zad sbyar te bklag chog tu bkod pa'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge slong dge 'dun dar rgyas so 'dis kyang 'gro pa mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig  bkra shis</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>sdom pa gsum ldan pa'i tshul ni "</tib>

<item>

<vol>6259</vol>

<col>@004a * ces 'phags ma sos sor 'brang ma'i mngon rtogs mdor bsdus 'di ni @004b don gnyer pa rnams la phan pa'i ched du sgrub thabs rgya mtsho nas logs su bkol te ^lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rjes sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan chos rje thub bstan dar rgyas so 'dis kyang 'gro ba mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig  "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6259</vol>
<tib>theg chen gso sbyong gi cho ga'i tshig 'grel</tib>

<col>@003b (theg chen gso sbyong len pa'i cho ga'i tshig don go bde bar bkrol ba zhig gyis zhes bzhes hor gyi sa'i cha gnam bskos rgyal po'i pho brang skyed tshal gyi nye 'dab gtsug lag khang chen po rgya nag skad du ph'u ny'id zi zhes bya ba'i t'a bla ma mang thos tshul ldan dge slong rin chen bsam grub kyis bskul ba la brten nas chos smra ba'i btsun pa ^aaky'a blo bzang bstan rgyan gyis tshul 'di sbyar ba dge legs su gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6260</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje drag po gsum dril gyi gtor chog bsang gser skyems dang bcas pa 'dod dgu'i mchod sbyin zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8b</p>
<col>@008a * (ces bcom ldan 'das dpal @008b phyag na rdo rje drag po gsum dril gyi gtor chog bsang gser skyems dang bcas pa 'dod dgu'i mchod sbyin zhes bya ba 'di ni chos srid la 'dren byed yangs pa mchod dpon dge slong bshes gnyen 'od zer gyis lha rdzas dang cen khru bcas pas bskul ba'i ngor ^sngags 'chang rgan po blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos khal kha se chen jun wang gi shog tse'un tsho ra'i gur sgar du sbyar ba'o tshul 'di khal kha se chen rgyal khag gi bstan pa'i sbyin bdag chen po t'a can jun se chen jun wang tshe ring bsam grub dang ga-yung drung rdo rje yid bzhin 'khor lo bcas mthun rkyen sbyar te dpar du bsgrubs pa'i dges skye ba'i phreng bar dal 'byor rten bzang thob drin can bla ma mchog dang mi 'bral zhing sa lam yon tan yongs su mthar phyin shog  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6260</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das sman pa'i rgyal po lha lnga bcu rtsa gcig gi zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya tshul ye shes byin za rang 'bar zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * (ces bcom ldan 'das sman pa'i rgyal po lha lnga bcu rtsa gcig gi zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya tshul ye shes byin za rang 'bar zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam dpyod dang ldan pa'i dge slong ngag dbang rgya mtshos bskul ngor ^sngags 'chang rgan po blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos gzim chung nor bu'i gter mdzod du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6260</vol>
<tib>bstan srung gtso mo srid gsum bdag mo la brten pa'i glo bur las bcol bya tshul rdo rje sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@004b (ces bstan bsrung gtso mo srid gsum bdag mo la brten pa'i glo bur las bya tshul rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di yang @005a * mdo smad bstan pa'i rgyan gyur rong po dgon chen phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i sde'i thos bsam gling ba'i 'dus spyi nas lha rdzas dang bcas 'phrin yig gi lam nas bskul ma byung ba ltar ^ sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang rgyal mtshan sengges ming gzhan dpal mi bskyod bzhad pa'i rdo rjes bsgrigs pa'i thog ma'i yi ge pa ni mdzod pa chos rje'i tsha bo bstan pa rgyal mtshan gyis bgyis pa dza yantu)"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6260</vol>
<tib>'byung ba chu la satstsha btab pa'i tshul ni "</tib>
<p>2a-2b</p>
<col>@003b ('di yang ^dharma badzra gyis bris</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6260</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan lha mo'i gtor chog yongs 'dus snye ma ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * ces dpal ldan lha mo dmag zor ma'i gtor chog yongs 'dus snye ma zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas bya khyung ba lu ri zhabs drung sogs don gnyer can mang pos bskul ma yod thog nye char 'thon po'i rigs shing snga la pa lta bu'i rgyud du 'khrungs shing bla ma dkon mchog la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa aor du su hang gin t'a pe'i zi bkra shis dar rgyas kyi rigs sras dad brtson rnam dpyod phul du byung ba ho sho chi bkra shis rgya mtshos 'di lta bu'i tshig nyung don 'dus zhig dgos zhes dngul man lha rdzas dang bcas bskul ba'i ngor ku s'a li ^dharma badzra gyis bskang ba rgyal dbang lnga pa chen po'i gsung dang gzhan rnams kyi tshig sbyor gsar du spel te sbyin pa'i bdag po ao thog pe'i le'i sngags grwa 'du khang gi yang thog tu mgyogs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang dar ma'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6260</vol>
<tib>dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sgo nas gtor zor bya tshul dgra srog 'joms pa'i mtshon cha zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15b</p>
<col>@015a * (ces dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sgo nas gtor zor bya tshul dgra srog 'joms pa'i mtshon cha zhes bya 'di ni bstan pa'i sbyin bdag sa dbang chen po khal kha se chen jun wang tshe ring bsam grub nyid nas bskul ma mdzad pa'i don bzhin ^sh'akya'i rjes su zhugs pa'i sngags 'chang rgan po blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos rang lo nga drug par slebs pa'i dus mi dbang nyid kyi gur sgar steng du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6260</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bla brgyud gsol 'debs bstod pa shis brjod yan lag bdun pa rnams</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6260</vol>
<tib>n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i sgo nas bka' bsgo rgyas pa byed tshul</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col>@002b tshul 'di yang tshe gcig nyid la 'ja' lus rdo rje'i sku brnyis pa'i grub dbang 'phrin las rgya mtsho'i slob ma'i khyu rgyan chos skyobs dres yan chi'i sprul pa'i sku rin po che nas bskul ma mdzad bzhin dge slong blo bzang chos kyi nyi mas bris pa'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6260</vol>
<tib>'phags pa klu 'dul 'jam dpal n'a ga raksha'i sgrub thabs rjes gnang bya tshul klu nag po'i srog snying 'byin pa'i drag sngags khyung chen lding ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9b</p>
<col>@009b (ces 'phags pa klu 'dul 'jam dpal n'a ga raksha'i sgrub thabs rjes gnang bya tshul klu nag po'i srog snying 'byin pa'i drag sngags khyung chen lding ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rig 'dzin gter chen chos rgyal gyis mdzad pa'i 'dod 'jo bum bzang las gsungs pas gzhi byas te yab rje rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa la mi phyed pa'i dad pa thob pa'i sngags 'chang rgan po blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos gzims chung bkra shis ga-yang 'khyil kyi yang rtser sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6260</vol>
<tib>rgyal po sde lnga'i tshogs mchod kyi khrigs rim siddhi 'kugs pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@004b (ces sprul ba'i chos rgyal sde lnga 'khor dang bcas pa'i dgyes dgur spyod pa'i 'phrin las 'gag med rdo rje sgra dbyangs la nye bar mkho ba tshogs kyi khrigs rim siddhi 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba 'di yang sku 'bum chos sde chen po'i btsan khan pho brang dmar po'i nang ma shin tu gnyan cing 'phrin las kyi tshogs mchod shin tu bsdus pa'i go rim rnams rtogs par dka' zhing rang cag lta bu gsar ma pa rnams snga 'gyur gyi gzhung la 'bris pa chung bas 'khrig rim 'di lta bu zhig byung na las dang po pa rnams yul gnyan pa'i mdun sar tshogs mchod gyerkyang chos bsrung thugs 'khrl gyi gnas su mi 'gyur ram snyam pa'i bsam pas bskul ba la gzhi byas btsang khang rang ma'i bsang mchod pa 'bgres pa rnams dang skabs kyis tshogs chen dbu mdzad chen mo lcang ra rab 'byams pa byams pa stobs ldan gyis kyang mtshams sbyar ba la brten nas drin can bla ma rnams gtsug phud rtse mor brten nas ^gzhung bod gang la'ang blo gros kyi gzugs 'dzin cung zad gsal ba gser tog @005a * sprul ming 'chang ba sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos yi dam rjes su bzung ba'i gsang mtshan pad+ma bzhad drag che mchog rtsal du 'bod pa'i ldom bu bas rang lo nyer gcig thog snga 'gyur rang gzhung gtsang ma la gsar ma'i rgyas gab sogs kyi skyon bral byas te rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams ngang gis 'du ba'i sku tshe gong ma'i gzims khang byin rlabs gzi 'od 'bar ba'i gandho lar dkar phyogs tshes bzhi'i snga dro'i dus su sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6260</vol>
<tib>rje btsun 'jam dbyangs dkar po la brten pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg 'dod 'jo'i bum bzang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@008a * (ces bcom ldan 'das gsung gi dbang phyug rje btsun 'jam dbyangs dkar po la brten pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg 'dod 'jo'i bum bzang zhes bya ba' di ni rgyal ba gnyis pa'i rgyal tshab dam pa khri chen dpal ldan grags pa'i sprul ba'i sku rin po che rnam dpyod phul du byung ba 'jigs med rig pa'i seng ge dang dpyod ldan dge slong 'jam dbyangs dkon mchog bcas kyis bskul ngor mang thos rig pa 'ddzin pa dge slong dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po'am ming gzhan mi pham dbyangs can dga' ba'i rdo rjes chos sde chen bkra shis 'khyil gyis bla brang du sbyar ba'o sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6260</vol>
<tib>rje btsun n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i bskyed rdzogs kyi snying po mkha' spyod nye lam zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@004b ces rje btsun n'a ro mkha' spyod kyi bskyed rim rnal 'byor bcu gcig nyams su len tshul khrid yig rnams dang mngon rtogs rgyun 'khyer du gab dkrugs 'thor ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa rnams nyams su blangs bde bar go rim mthar chags su bkod cing rdzogs pa'i rim pa yig rnying gi dgongs pa dang mi 'gal zhing rang re'i bka' brgyud 'di pa'i lam gyi 'gros dang mthun par sbyar ba'i tho chung 'di lta bu zhig dran gso'i ched du dgos zhes rang gi slob ma dpyod ldan ngag dbang chos 'byor gyis bskul ba ltar @005a * lam 'di la mos pa thob pa'i btsun gzugs blo bzang chos kyi nyi mas cho 'phrul gyi dus chen la dpal ldan 'bras spungs su bris pa'o sarba mangga lam"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6260</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod kyi bsnyen yig pad+ma r'a ga'i 'phreng mdzes zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@021b ces rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod kyi bsnyen pa bya tshul pad+ma r'a ga'i phreng mdzes zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam @022a * ga-yengs kyi khol por gyi nar 'khyams pa'i btsun gzugs dharm'a badzra ram blo bzang chos kyi nyi ma zhes bgyi bas ha cang spros pa dor nas don gyi ngo bo tsam go bde bar dben pa'i ri sul bde chen chos gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul rgyal mtshan grags pa'o 'dis kyang bdag gzhan sems can thams cad he ru ka yab yum gyis rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig  "</col>

<item>

<item>

<col>@011b rig 'dzin pad+ma 'phrin las kyis mdzad pa'i rta mgrin gsang sgrub la brten pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sregye shes 'od 'bar gyi lag len gsal bar brjod pa zur rgyan 'od 'bar snang ba zhes bya ba 'di nyid stong 'khor manydzu shri lnga ma ngag dbang bsod nams rgya mtshos zin tho lta bur mdzad nas sbyar byang sogs ma gnang 'dug pas dpe rgyun kyang ma 'phel shing thog ma'i zin bris kyi dpe la yang yig mkhan gyi skyon gyis lhag chad [???] nor mang du 'dug pas dbyad bzod pa rnams cung zad bcos te ye shes 'od 'bar gyi steng nas lag len byed 'dod pa rnams la phan pa'i bsam pas dharma badzra gyis bar du sgrub pa dge legs 'phel "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6260</vol>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6260</vol>

<item>

<col>@018b (ces bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'khor lo chen po'i sgrub thabs ngag 'don du bsdus te brjod pa ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba 'di ni zhwa ser bstan pa'i sgron me dam pa smon lam ho thog thu rje btsun blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan rin po che nas srid na ring ba'i lha rdzas go chen yug gcig dngul srang nyi shu'i skyes dang bcas bskul ma mdzad pa'i don ltar yab rje 'jam dpal snying po'i snyan brgyud kyi gdams pa mang du thos pa ^sh'akya'i dge slong gi gzugs brnyan blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos 'phral du srug bris su bgyis pa'o</col>

<item>

<item>

<tib>'phags pa thugs rje chen po rgyal po lugs 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dbang gi byang bu dngos grub pad dkar bzhad pa'i dri bzang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * (ces 'phags pa thugs rje chen po rgyal po lugs 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dbang gi byang bu dngos grub pad dkar bzhad pa'i dri bzang zhes bya ba 'di ni chos rgyal gter bdag gling bas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs 'dod bum la gzhi byas shing kun gzigs lnga pa chen pos gnang ba'i las byang nyi ma'i 'od zer na bskyed lung rdzogs gsum dang mthun pa mdzad kyang chos rgyal nyid kysi kri au yog gsum las yo ga dang mthun pa'i sgrub chog gnang ba bka' 'bum dang mthun pas dngos gtsang ba dang gter chos yin phyin theg pa gong ma'i gong ma gsum las ggang rung yin mi dgos pas na sgrub chog kyang yo ga ltar du spel ba po ni sngags 'chang rgan po blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos rang shag nor bu'i gter mdzod du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@002b (ces pa 'di ni khal kha'i mi sna no min han wang pakshi chos rje pi si t'a bla ma sprul pa'i sku'i kho bo dge slong ye shes dge legs dgon gsar byang chub chos gling gi bla ma ye shes snyan grags ma ma blo bzang sgrol ma ja sag gsol dpon mgron gnyer sogs ma sna dpon @003a * khag ser skya rnams nas bskul ba'i ngor ^sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan bstan pa'i nyi ma phyogs las rnam rgyal dpal bzang pos sbyar ba'o  gsol 'debs rin chen dbang gis 'phreng ba 'di mi 'dzad par du bskrun pa'i legs byas mthus rgyu sbyor dge slong blo bzang bsam 'phel sogs 'gro kun dam pa'i mgon gyi rjes 'dzin shog  sarba mangga lam)"</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6261</vol>
<tib>thugs sgrub la ma gsang 'dus thod phreng rtsal gyi sgos sgrub dang 'brel ba'i zlum po bzhi'i dbang byang skal ldan re skong byin rlabs 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@019a * (ces thugs sgrub bla ma gsang 'dus thod phreng rtsal gyi sgos sgrub dang 'brel ba'i zlum po bzhi'i dbang byang skal ldan re skong byin rlabs 'dod 'jo zhes ba 'di ni rig 'dzin gter chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs 'dod 'jo bum bzanglas gsungs pas gzhi byas rdzogs chen gyi lam 'bras dang mthun pa'i dbang don mthong thos su gyur ba tshad thub du mas brgyan tshogs 'khor gyi skor rnams bla ma gsang 'dus nas byung ba ltar gyis gsar brtsams byas te spel ba'i byed pa po ni drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma grub dbang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bka' drin gyis nye bar bskyangs pas drin las gsar rnying gi chos tshul du ma'i gnad la thos bsam cung zad bgyis pa'i sngags 'chang rgan po blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtsho'am gsang mtshan pad+ma bzhad drag rtsal du 'bod pas sku 'bum gser tog bla brang gi gzims chung bkra shis ga-yang 'khyil gyi yang rtser sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6262</vol>
<tib>'phags pa byams pas zhus pa chos brgyad pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * sho lo ka brgyadcu rtsa gsum mchis rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mitra dang d'a na sh'i la dang zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te snyad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6262</vol>
<tib>'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>

<col>@003a 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dny'a de ba dang zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa "</col>

<item>
