<vol>6265</vol>
<tib>dngos gzhi 'ong gsal snying po'i don khrid</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * dngos gzhi 'od gsal snying po'i don khrid ces bya ba rang bzhan rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa klong chen rab 'byams kyis gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul dpal lha las babs pa'i ri ngogs su legs par bkod pa rdzogs so dpal sngags kyi bdag mo dang gza'i rgyal po r'a hu la dang dam can rdo rje legs pas bka' 'di srungs shig. yi ge la 'dra min 'chos pa byung na chad pas chod cig snod min lam bstan cig skal ldan la bka' 'di khrol la byin cig sa ma ya: sa ma ya: dge'o dge'o dge'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6265</vol>
<tib>dpal sngags kyi bdag mo'i sgrub thabs snying gi dum bu</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * dpal sngags kyi bdag mo'i sgrub thabs snying gi dum bu zhes bya ba theg pa mchog gi rnal 'byor pa klong chen rab 'byams kyis rgyud dang man ngag dang bla ma dam pa'i zhal gdams rnams gcig tu bsdos te gsal bar bkod pa rdzogs so "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6265</vol>
<tib>dpe don gsal byed sgron ma</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006b rang gnad gsang ba yang gsang rmad du byung ba las dpe don gsal byed sgron me zhes bya ba theg pa mchog gi rnal 'byor pa klong chen rab 'byams kyis bkod pa rdzogs so dpal sngags kyi bdag mo dang gza'i dge bsnyen chen po dang dam can rdo rje legs pas bka' 'di srungs shing 'dra min gyi yi ge 'chos pa byung na kha nas khrag skyugs mig 'bras thang la phrul cig sa ma ya: rgya rgya rgya dge'o dge'o dge'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<tib>gnang gsum chos nyid kyi 'khor lo</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6266</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa'i bla brgyud gsol 'debs cho ga'i kha bskong smon lam shis brjod dang bcas pa</tib>

</item>

<tib>rgyal sras sems dpa' chen po rje blo bzang lung rtogs nyi ma dpal bzang po'i rtogs brjod utpal 'khri shing</tib>
<p>1a-25a</p>
<col>@024b (ces rgyal sras sems dpa' chen po ^rje btsun blo bzang lung rtogs nyi ma dpal bzang po'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i gtam du bya ba autpal 'khri shing zhes bya ba 'di ni sa skyong mi'i dbang po ja sag bkra shis don grub sku mched ye shes sras mgon po dbang rgyal rnams kyi gtsos 'khrungs yul mda' tshan shog dpon 'bangs rnams dang sngags ram pa ngag dbang rgya mtsho rab 'byams 'jigs med rgya mtsho sogs de ka'i grwa rgyun spyi dang hal ha ja sag thu han gyi shog nas dka' bcu shes rab rgya mtsho dang dge slong aa pa ra mi ta sogs grwa rgyun bgres gzhon thun mong bcas so so'i spyi thog nas sku gsung thugs rten gyi skyes bcas bskul zhing khyad par rje nyid kyi sku dpon rab 'byams pa dkong mchog dpal 'dzin gyis tshe lha'i snang brnyan @025a * gdung rus cha shas aam yig rang byon can bcas rtogs brjod tshigs bcas snyan dngags kyis brgyan pa zhig 'phral du dgos zhes nan che bar de ltar rtsom pa'i spob pa zhan rung gus zhen gyis` sangs rgyas kun 'dus kyi ngo bo kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje yab sras nyi zla lta bu rnams kyi zhabs rdul gtsug tu bsten pa bkra shis 'khyil khri thog zhe dgu pa chos smra ba'i dge slong dkon mchog bstan pa rab rgyas kyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rig pa'i gnas la blo gros kyi mig rnam par yangs pa nye gnas rgyal mtshan bstan pas bris pa'i dge bas rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i bstan 'gror sman pa'i thugs bzhed mtha' dag lhun gyis grub par gyur cig  aom swasti thub bstan 'dzin mar skal bzang zhing pa'i tshogs phan bde'i lo tog longs su spyod pa'i phyir bkra shis ga-yas su 'khyil ba'i grwa las chos sbyin bdud rtsi'i gra char 'di phab po sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<tib>rab gnas bkra shis snye ma'i lhan thabs</tib>
<p>1a-14a</p>
<col>@014a * ces pa 'di ni yi dam rdo rje 'jigs byed la brten nas bkra shis snye ma ltar rab gnas 'bring po byed tshul ngag 'don dang phyag len byed tshul 'dul 'dzin pa'i rab gnas kyi yig cha che chung gnyis nas kha bskang ste rang dang skal pa mnyam pa dag la phan pa'i phyir gyi na pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis bkod pa ste dgag bzhag sogs rgyas par gzhan du 'chang 'dod pas 'dir ma spros shing rab gnas byed pa mchod yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs rlab po che sog pa'i don du yin pas bla ma dang yon bdag gnyis ka'i ngos nas byas lo tsam ma yin par bsod nams sog pa'i thabs su 'gyur pa cig bya 'tshal lo zhes gsol ba 'debs so  'dis kyang bstan pa dang sems can la phan par gyur cig bkra shis dge legs 'phel bar gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6268</vol>
<tib>rab gnas dge legs rgya mtsho'i char 'bebs kyi zur 'debs zhes bya ba bzhugs legs so "</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * ces rab gnas dge legs rgya mtsho'i char 'bebs zhes bya ba'i zur 'debs 'di ni 'jam dbyangs mi'i tshul 'dzin gong ma chen po nyid kyis thig tshad dang ljags bkod mdzad nas bzhengs pa'i rje btsun 'jam dbyangs thugs rje chen po kun tu bzang po gsum gyi sku brnyan ye shes pa dngos su byon pa lta bu'i khyad mtshar mthong bas yid 'phrog ^gong ma chen po khang shi khrir bzhugs nas dgung lo so dgu pa lcags 'brug zla 2 tshes 12 la rab gnas bgyid skabs pho brang shar gyi ja sag bla ma phun tshogs rgya mtsho dang rang gi zla bo don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis gzhung rang na rdzas dang yo byad phyag len thams cad mchan bu dang sdom tshig gis gsal bar mdzad snang na'ang 'don cha'i cho ga dang spel mar song shing kha 'thor ba lta bus blo dman rnams kyis go dka' bar 'dug pas thams cad phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa 'di lta bu zhig gyis zhes bskul ba ltar gyi na pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan ming gzhan lcang skya hu thog thur 'bod pas 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi gnas mchog ri bo rtse lnga'i tha'i lo zi zhes pa'i gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni smon lam rin chen no 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing sems can la bde skyid 'phel bar gyur cig bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling brgyan du byon "</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>pan chen blo bzang thub bstan chos kyi nyi ma'i gsol 'debs</tib>

<col>@003b (ces pa 'di ni mdo smad bya khyung dgon gyi khri ba blo bzang snyan grags rgya mtsho nas ^ngos ring 'tsho'i brtan bzhugs gsol 'debs tshogs 'don du byas chog pa zhig dgos zhes bskul ma byung ba bzhin ^sh'akya'i dge sbyong blo bzang thub bstan chos kyi nyi ma dge legs rnam rgyal dpal bzang pos zhing chen lan khyu'i pho brang lu zhi than du 'phral mar bris pa dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6270</vol>
<tib>rgyal po chen po sde lnga la gsol mchod 'bul tshul 'phrin las 'gag med rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs</tib>

<col>@026a * ces sprul pa'i chos rgyal chen po 'khor dang bcas dgyes dgur spyod pa'i 'phrin las 'ga' med rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di yang sa chen po bde bar skyong ba'i phyag 'tshal ba bsod nams rab brtan gyis tshang la 'khyer bde ba zhig dgongs zhes bskul ba rten bla ma'i las rgyang thugs sgrub yang snying 'dus pa las bsdus shing gsol mchod kyi rim pa rnams mda' bdag gi gtegs gyi 'phrin las don bcu ma dang sgrub skor la gzhi byas pa thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos gnang ba las legs cha byas shing tshig sbyor gsang du dgos pa rnams bsgrigs te gang gi tshon ston grogs tshul bzhin mdzad pa'i za hor gyi bande la rgyu'i bgre dag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho bla med rdo rje chos kyi rgyal po chen po nas dgos pa'i mtshan la byung ba ltar nyin gcig la grub par 'gyes pa'i yi ge pa ni ngag dbang dge legs so sarba mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6270</vol>
<tib>rje bla ma rgyan drug mchog gnyis dang bcas pa la phyag mchod 'bul ba'i tshul lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa byin rlabs nyin byed 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@014b (ces bdag nyid chen po rgyan drug mchog gnyis chos srung ye shes kyi mgon po dang bcas pa la phyag mchod gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa byin rlabs nyin byed 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba'i dbang po rdo rams blo bzang rab gsal gyis @015a * bkra shis pa'i lha rdzas dang bcas nan tan chen pos yang yang bskul ba la brten nas sangs rgyas kun 'dus kyi ngo bo bla ma rdo rje 'chang yab sras rnams kyi bka' drin kho nas nye bar 'tsho ba sh'akya'i rjes 'jug blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos chos grwa chen po bkra shis 'khyil gyi rang gshag chos 'byor dga' tshal du bris pa 'dis kyang gser zhun cod pan 'chang ba'i ring lugs phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig bkra shis dge'o)"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6270</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas sku brnyan rab gnas byed tshul byin brlab rol mtsho las zur du phyung ba</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (tho'u bkwan dharma badzras mdzad pa'i rab gnas byed tshul byin rlabs rol mtsho zhes bya ba las zur du bkol ba'i sku brnyan rab gnas 'di ni ngag dbang blo bzang bskal bzang sbyin pas yadgir zhes pa'i chu pho sbrel lo'i dbo zla'i tshes dgur par du bsgrubs so swasti tshul 'di dge slong blo bzang grags pa yis chos sde bde chen lhun grub gling mchog tu rgyu rkyen sbyar te dpar du bzhengs pa'i dges 'gro kun bla med byang chen myur thob shog ces sh'a sa dha ras sug bris su bgyis pa'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>chos skyong dregs pa lcam sring la mdor bsdus pa'i tshul gyis mchod gor 'bul ni"</tib>

<col>@028a * tshad ma rigs pa'i gter zhes bya ba'i bstan bcos 'di ni yul byang phyogs kyi rgyud du byung ba sgra dang tshad ma dang sde brgyad dang snyan ngag dang tshig gi rgyan dang ming gi mngon brjod dang tha snyad kyi gtsug lag rnams legs par shes pas 'chang ba dang rtsom pa dang rtsod  pa'i tshul la spobs pa dge ba can kun las btus dang sde bdun phyin ci ma log par khong du chud cing lung dang rigs pa dang man ngag gi tshul mtha' dag la blo'i snang ba thob pa sh'akya'i dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes bya bas sde ba sbyor sbangs nas go bde bar bkrol te dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'o "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6306</vol>
<tib>gtan tshigs rig pa'i dka' gnas 'ga' zhig la dogs dpyod kyi tshul mdor bsdus pa mkhas pa'i yid 'phrog ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-50a</p>
<col>@050a * (ces gtam tshigs pig pa'i dka' gnas 'ga' zhig la dogs dpyod kyi tshul mdor bsdus pa mkhas pa'i yid 'phrog ces bya ba 'di ni gzhung lung smra ba'i bshes gnyen chen po ^ ye shes rgyal mtsho'i zhal snga nas bka' lung spyi bor phebs pa gyi na tu ldog ma nus par stong 'khor skyes ming pa ^ blo bzang 'jigs med tshul khrims rgya mtshos rang lo bcwo lnga pa la rab byung bco lnga pa'i khro mo zhes pa shing pho 'brug gi lor rdzogs par sbyar ba'o dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6306</vol>
<tib>tshad 'bras kyi dogs dpyod blo gsal mgul rgyan lung rigs rin chen bang mdzod ces bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6307</vol>
<tib>chos sde chen po dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling gi lam rim grwa tshang thub bstan dar rgyas gling gi dge 'dun rnams kyi khrims su bca' ba'i yi ge bshad sgrub bstan pa'i gzhi 'dzin ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-23b</p>
<col>@023a * (ces chos sde chen po dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling gi lam rim grwa tshang thub bstan dar rgyas gling gi dge 'dun rnams kyi khrims su bca' ba'i yi ge bshad sgrub bstan pa'i gzhi @023b 'dzin ces bya ba 'di ni zhwa ser cod pan 'dzin pa'i ring lugs la snying nas gus shing lugs gnyis mkhyen pa'i spyan dang ldan pa bsod nams stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa'i sa skyong mi rje dam pa aer teni mer ging aer khe das ching dza sag no yon tshe brtan 'phel rgyas kyi mtshan can dang shog de ka'i las sna sogs skya ser thun mong nas rang re'i mtshan nyid grwa tshang 'di la bca' yig 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes rin chen gnyis pa'i mandal lha rdzas dri ma med pa dang bcas nan tan du bskul ma mdzad pa'i ngo mchog par rang nyid gyis kyang spro bas mtshams sbyar te ^ 'jam dbyangs gong ma'i lung gis chos rjer 'bod pa'i ban rgan snyom las pa ^ dam tshig rdo rjes rje bla ma'i bca' yig rnam gnyis gzhir bzhag rang re'i dam pa gong ma rnams kyis mdzad pa'i bca' yig rnams las ci rigs par btus te rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i nang tshan lcags mo phag lo'i snron zla ba'i dkar ba'i phyogs kyi bzang po gnyis pa'i gral tshes dge bar nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge'i grogs dan byed pa po ni dge slong skal bzang dpal 'byor dang dge slong blo bzang tshe ring gnyis kyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che nyes pa'i dri mas nam yang mi gos par phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6307</vol>
<tib>nye brgyud lugs kyi rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma yid bzhin 'khor lo gtso 'khor gsum gyi sgrub thabs dang rjes gnang bya tshul gyi cho ga 'chi med bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'babs zhes bya ba bzhugs so"</tib>
<p>1a-23a</p>
<col>@022b (ces nye brgyud lugs kyi rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma yid bzhin 'khor lo gtso 'khor gsum gyi sgrub thabs dang rjes gnang bya tshul gyi cho ga 'chi med bdud rtsi'i rgyun pas ces bya ba 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma dam pa dharma'i mtshan can gyis 'di lta bu zhig bgyis zhes pa'i bka' bstsal ba spyi bor blangs shing don gnyer can gzhan 'ga' zhig gis kyang bskul ba la brten nas dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las yi dam gyi lha 'di nyid kyi rjes gnang dang dmar 'khrid man ngag bklag lung sogs mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa myul ba'i btsun gzugs ^ dam tgig rdo rje'am dirgh'a yu: badzra kirti zhes bgyis pas rtsa ba'i chog bsgrigs nyid gzhir bzung tshad ldan dam pa'i gsung rnams dang rang gi bla ma'i man ngag gis kyang nye bar brgyan nas shin tu gsal zhing lag tu blang bde bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos 'dun zhing rnam dpyod dang brtson 'grus phul du byung ba'i slob bu dge slong blo bzang bstan dar gyis bgyis pa tshe dpal 'phel 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la @023a * yun ring du gnas pa dang de 'dzin gyi skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi zhabs pad brtan cing mdzad 'phrin bzang po mi nyams par gong nas gong du 'phel zhing rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6307</vol>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6307</vol>
<tib>rnam thar sgo gsum gyi rnam par bzhag pa legs bshad rgya mtsho rba rlabs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * ces rnam thar sgo gsum gyi rnam par bzhag pa legs bshad rgya mtsho'i rwa rlabs zhes bya ba 'di ni snga sor dpal ldan 'bras spungs su don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis bskul ngor cung zad bris pa'i thog thos bsam gling gi gzhung gsar 'dzin gra'i dge 'dun rnams nas 'di lta bu zhig dgos tshul gyi bskul ma byung bar brten kun mkhyen bla ma'i legs bshad bee d'urya dkar po'i gan mdzod gyi kha skongs su dmigs te chos smra ba'i btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes rang lo nyer bdun pa la chos grwa chen po bkra shis 'khyil du bris pa 'dis kyang 'jam mgon bstan pa'i snying po phyogs dus kun du rgyas par gyur cig  rigs lam dri med tsha zer gyis 'gro blo'i mun pa kun sel ba mkhas rnam dga' byed rta bdun bdag mchod sbyin sbyar gyi lha lam ngos 'char byed rgyu sbyor dang stobs ldan blo bzang legs ldan la sogs pa'i 'gro kun ma rigs mun pa las rgyal te thar pa'i gro mchog tu ring min stobs bcu'i rgyal ba cher 'khod te 'gro kun sgrol ba la mi pham mgon dang 'jam dbyangs kyi rnam thar bdag gir byed par shog  ces sgo mang gra rigs har chen ja sag gung gi gshogs rab 'byams pa blo bzang legs ldan nas spar gyi sbyar byang dgos tshul ltar ra sgreng aa chi thu no mon han gyis sbyar ba'o bkra shis par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6307</vol>
<tib>rnam thar sgo gsum gyi rnam par bzhag pa legs bshad rgya mtsho rba rlabs zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@010a * ces rnam thar sgo gsum gyi rnam par bzhag pa legs bshad rgya mtsho'i rwa rlabs zhes bya ba 'di ni snga sor dpal ldan 'bras spungs su don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis bskul ngor cung zad bris pa'i thog thos bsam gling gi gzhung gsar 'dzin gra'i dge 'dun rnams nas 'di lta bu zhig dgos tshul gyi bskul ma byung bar brten kun mkhyen bla ma'i legs bshad bee d'urya dkar po'i gan mdzod gyi kha skongs su dmigs te chos smra ba'i btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes rang lo nyer bdun pa la chos grwa chen po bkra shis 'khyil du bris pa 'dis kyang 'jam mgon bstan pa'i snying po phyogs dus kun du rgyas par gyur cig  rigs lam dri med tsha zer gyis 'gro blo'i mun pa kun sel ba mkhas rnam dga' byed rta bdun bdag mchod sbyin sbyar gyi lha lam ngos 'char byed rgyu sbyor dang stobs ldan blo bzang legs ldan la sogs pa'i 'gro kun ma rigs mun pa las rgyal te thar pa'i gro mchog tu ring min stobs bcu'i rgyal ba cher 'khod te 'gro kun sgrol ba la mi pham mgon dang 'jam dbyangs kyi rnam thar bdag gir byed par shog  ces sgo mang gra rigs har chen ja sag gung gi gshogs rab 'byams pa blo bzang legs ldan nas spar gyi sbyar byang dgos tshul ltar ra sgreng aa chi thu no mon han gyis sbyar ba'o bkra shis par gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6307</vol>
<tib>yum don gsal ba'i sgron me'i bsam gzugs kyi zur rgyan mu tig 'phreng mdzes zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * (zhes pa 'di ni rang dang skal ba mnyam pa'i rigs smra ba 'ga' zhig gis bskul ba'i ngo ma bzlog pa dang rang nyid kyis kyang brjed byang gi tshul dus mthar skyes pa'i dge sbyong gi gzugs brnyan kyang dge slong su ma ti aa yu shes sbyar ba dge legs su gyur cig  ) aom swa sti par 'di kun dga' chos gling grwa tshang la gra rigs dpal ldan sogs kyis rgyu yon sbyar bskrun pa'i dge bas tshe rabs tha mas cad du bla ma lha yis 'bral med rjes 'dzin shog  mangga lam "</col>

<tib>skyabs 'gro'i khrid yig zhes bya ba bzhugs so  "</tib>

<col>@003b (zhes pa 'di n t'a bla ma chos rgya mtshos gtso byas dge 'dun rnams skyabs 'gro khrid pa'i tshe khrid dmigs ye shes bsho bgos zhes bskul ba ltar smon lam rab 'byams pa bstan 'dzin grags pa'i sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong shes rab rgya mtsho dge slong brtson 'grus rgya mtsho dge slong bkra shis tshogs rnams so dge'o bkra shis par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>

<p>1a-24a</p>
<col>@023a * (ces tshe gcig gi nyams len rnams nyin zhag phrugs gcig la sbyar te lag tu bstang ba'i tshul chos spyod gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyal ba'i gsung rab la thos bsam tshul bzhin du byas pa rdo ram pa tshangs dbyangs rgyal mtshan gyis thos don sgrub pa la sbyar ba'i ched du dben pa'i ri khrod du 'gro bar chas pa'i tshe 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes nan tan du bskul ba'i brten thun drug gi rnal 'byor dang sdom pa gsum gyhi bsngo bgrang sogs la nyams len gyi mthil du byed pa ni rgyal ba'i dgongs pa mthar thug pa dang mnyam med ri bo dge ldan pa'i khyad chos bla na med pa yin pas de rnams gtso bor bzung byin rlabs kyi khyad nas rje yab sras dang pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung gi tshig ris rnams rang sor bzhag par mtshams su tshig spyod cung zad snon dgos pa rnams bsnang te @023b btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes dpal ldan bkra shis 'khyil gyi 'du khang chen mo'i yang rtser sbyar ba 'dis kyang 'jam mgon bstan pa'i snying po phyogs dus kun tu rgyas par gyur cig   rnyed dka' dal 'byor tshang ba'i rten bzang po don ldan dgyid pa'i thabs kyi rtser son pa dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa'i mthil nyams len zab mo'i gnad bsdus thun drug gi rnal 'byor gzhir byas chos spyod rim pa 'di mi zang par du bskrun pa'i legs byas mthus tshang la ma nor bstan pa'i snying po 'di phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas gyur cig  bdag sogs kun kyang skye ba'i phreng ba ru bshes gnyen dam pas 'bral med rjes 'dzin zhing yang dag lam bzang bgrod mthar phyin nas zung 'jug go 'phang bde blag thob gyur cig  ces pa 'di ni dang brtson lhag bsam mchog tu dge ba rab 'byams pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis @024a * 'di nyid par du bsgrubs pa'i tshe smon tshig cig dgos tshul ltar ^ btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes bris pa'o bkra shis par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>

<col>@050a * (dpal 'khor lo bde mchog l'u ai pa'i lugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug cing dbang byung ba'i cho ga bde chen rol mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni 'dus pa dang bde mchog gi thun mong gi bshad rgyud rdo rje 'phreng ba las dbang bcu bzhi'i rnam bzhag gsungs pa'i rjes su 'brangs shing l'u dril gnyis thun mong gis chog pa rnams rje btsun chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po rang nyid kyis mdzad pa'i l'u ai gu pa'i dkyil chog gzhir bzhag cing l'u dril gyi mi 'dra ba'i khyad par dbye dgos pa rnams d'a rig pa dang lang ka rgyal bzang dang dkyil chog rdo rje 'phreng ba dang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i lam gyi rim par gsungs bdag las gong 'jug pa bde ba dang skabs su ji ltar bab pa byin bkod de dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkhyen brtse gcig tu bsdus pa'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang dang dbyer me mchis pa'i rje btsun bla ma tsong kha pa chen po nyid kyi zhabs kyi padmo la spyi bos reg pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa dge legs dpal bzang pos gtsangs nyang stod rig pa'i 'byung gnas kyis 'chi dpal ri bo mdangs can gyi gsol bar sbyar ba'o swa sti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bzung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sprang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir sku 'bum byams pa gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6313</vol>
<tib>gsang ldan dkyil chog snying po nyer bsags zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-65a</p>
<col>@064a * 'jam dbyangs bla ma'i rnam dag dgongs pa bkang phyir dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis theg mchog bshes gnyen mdzad phyir dang 'jam dbyangs la gus skal ldan slob ma rjes bzung phyir 'jam dbyangs sras bo sgeg rdor gzhung bzhin 'dir sbyar ro grub chen gzhung ni shin tu gting zab cing  bdag blo byis pa'i ngang tshul brtson pa zhan de phyir 'di la nongs pa ci mchis pa bla ma mchog dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs la 'chags lhag bsam dag pas tshul 'dir 'bad pa las thob pa'i dge ba rab tu dkar ba'i mthus tshe rabs kun tu 'jam mgon bla ma yis rjes su bzung nas chos tshul kun 'dzin shog (bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las gsungs pa gsang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rigs bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thabs dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa bshad pa snying po bsags pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rje thams cad mkhyen pa tsong kha pa chen po rang nyid kyis lugs 'di la sgeg rdor gyi gzhung rnams gung bsgrigs pa na lugs snga ma dag las skabs gang du mi 'dra ba'i khyad par gang 'byung ba rnams sgrub thabs la zin bris nyung ngu rdzogs par mdzad pa dang dkyil chog @064b la'ang thig la sogs pa cho ga'i 'gros 'di lta bu zhig dgos pa yin zhes sogs gzer 'debs kyi gsung cung zad tsam stsal pa rnams gzhir bzhag nas sgeg rdor gyi chos lnga la sogs pa grub chen gyi gzhung la zhib par dpyad cing gzhan yang lugs 'di la stod lungs kyi bye ma lung pa chos yas mnga' ris kyi pu hrangs su sh'antim garbha'i slob ma pandi ta nyi ma'i dngos grub la zhus nas byon pa las brgyud pa la gsang ldan stod lugs su grags pa dang mdo khams su smri ti'i slob ma tshogs te ngag gi dbang phyug la kham pa shes rab rdo rjes zhus te dbus gtsang du zhus pa las brgyud pa la gsang ldan smad lugs su grags pa dang rdog chos rdor gyis bye ma lung pa dang kham pa shes rdor gnyis ka la bslabs nas spa sba ba can dang rgya'am can gnyis ka la nang ba nas brgyud pa la gsang ldan rdog lugs su grags pa dang spa la rdog mdo sdes zhus te de la gtsang gi rong lha stengs su byung ba'i gtsang smra seng gis zhus de la nyang stod sre'u chung pa lce blo ldan sanggas zhus nas de las rgya cher 'phel ba la sre'u chung ba'i lugs zhes zer te de ltar llugs so so'i bzhed pa mi 'dra ba so so dag kyang khong du chud par byas nas rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bo rje tsong kha pa chen po'i zhal snga nas mtshan brjod 'grel pa bar pa'i lugs 'di la cho ga dang rgyud kyi bshad pa sngar bod 'dir shin tu dar ba la da lta shin tu nyams pa 'di bso ba'i ched du cho ga dang bshad pa cung zad 'dzugs pa la 'bad dgos pa yin zhes bka' stsal ba'i khur yun ring du yid la lci bar yod pa dang rang nyid kyang rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi chos tshul 'di la mi phyed pa'i dad pas rgyu byas shing lugs 'di la 'dun pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du mas bskul bas rkyen byas te rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang tha mi dad pa'i dpal ldan bla ma rje btsun chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa @065a * chen po'i zhabs kyi padmo la gus pas gtugs pa'i btsun pa dge legs dpal bzang pos grub pa'i gnas mchog 'brog ri bo che dge ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni blo ldan sdom rtson dkon mchog dpal mgon no swa sti phan bde'i 'byung gnas rgyal bstan yongs 'du'i ljon rab rgyas 'gro kun thar mchog 'bras bzang la spyod phyir bkra shis lhun grub chos grwa cher chos sbyin 'dzad med dal 'gro'i rgyun 'di spel sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

'dzin pas grub zin dper bkod pa yin gyi dbu ma bas rdzun par bzhag pa grub zin pa zhig dper 'god pa min no de yang byad bzhin du snang pa'i gzugs brnyan lta bu de la snang ba'i steng nas cha 'di tsam 'gog 'di mi 'gog ces pa'i rnam gnyis gzugs brnyan gyi dpe steng nas 'chad pa ni dbu ma'i lta ba rnyed pa la med mi rung du dgos pas tshim mi nyan no zhes gsungs aom swa sti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan <col>@004b de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang rgyu skar gyi lha rnams kyis leg so legs so zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do drang srong skar ma la dga' bas zhus pa'i mang lam skar ma'i yum zhes bya ba skar ma ngan pa thams cad bzlog par byed pa'i mdo rdzogs so zhus dag  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6318</vol>
<tib>stag mos zhus pa zhes bya ba'i mdo bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-11b</p>
<col>@011b bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang dge slong de dag dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do 'phags pa stag mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so zhus su mangga lam "</col>

<item>

<vol>6319</vol>
<tib>grub mtha'i rnam par bzhag pa 'khrul spong gdong lnga'i dbyangs kun mkhyen lam bzang gsal ba'i rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-14a</p>
<col>@013b ces grub pa'i mtha' rnam par bzhag pa 'khrul spong gdong lnga'i sgra dbyangs thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam bzang gsal ba'i rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas mang thos gser khang chos rje gu na ma tis snyan chig me tog gsar bas bskul zhing dus phyis yongs kyi bshes gnyen chen po @014a * mkhas mchog lcang rwa slob dpon pa 'phags pa rin chen gyis khams chab mdo nas ja g-yu kha btag gi rten bcas nas chab shog tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas stag lo'i dgag lan 'jam rgyas dgos zhes bskul ba'i bka' do dang khyad par rang blo goms pa'i slad du mkhan chen rgyal ba thams cad kyi bdag po rin po che las sdom gsum sogs chos kyi bka' drin thob cing 'jam dbyangs bla ma khri rin po che yab sras bzhi dang pan chen bka' 'gyur pa rdo rje 'chang smin grol chos kyi rgyal po sre rdo rje 'chang dang sems dpa' chen po ngag dbang blo gros sogs dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len cing rje bla ma'i mdo sngags rnams la nges shes rnyed cing 'phags bod kyi grub mtha'i gzhung dang khyad par sher sgron tshad chen rtsa 'grel dus 'khor sogs gzhung lugs chen po rnams la brten gsung rab dang grub mtha' rab 'byams smra ba 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje tshig nyung rgyas 'grel du dkar pho zhes pa sa tshe sbrul gyi lo tshe 'phrul zla ba dkar phyogs rdzogs pa gsum pa'i nyin gangs can gyi bya rgod phung po gnyis pa dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i 'du gnas ri bo dge 'phel gyi gar 'dug theg mchog rol mtsho gsang sngags bde ba chen po'i pho brang nas sbyar ba la slar yang 'phri ba snon cung zad byas pa 'dis rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6319</vol>
<tib>mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi bsdus don rin po che'i phreng ba</tib>
<p>1a-14a</p>
<col>@014a * 'dir 'bad dge ba rab dkar ci yod des lam bzang 'dir nam yang mi 'bral zhing nam mkha'i mthas gtugs gyur ba'i 'gro ba rnams theg mchog bgrod pa'i them skas 'dzeg gyur cig  mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi bsdus don rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mdo sngags kyi gzhung mang du mkhyen pa'i sdom brtson du mas bskul zhing khyad par du yang mtsho ston dka' bzhi pa sangs rgyas 'phel gyis las dang po la 'jug pa bde ba'i yan lag tu gyis zhes bskul ba la brten nas rigs pa smra ba dar ma rin chen gyis 'brog ri bo che dge ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson sdo snod 'dzin pa rin chen chos rgyal lo 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nus par gyur cig aom swa sti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri gsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir kun dga' chos gling du chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel mangga lam "</col>

<tib>rgyud sde spyi'i rnam par bzhag pa skal bzang gi yid 'phrog ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-63a</p>
<col>@062b (ces rgyud sde spyi'i rnam par bzhag pa skal bzang yid 'phrog ces bya ba 'di ni rgyud pa yab sras kyi gsung sgros rnying pa gzhir bzhag pa la kha 'thor ba rnams phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa dang bded kyis dus 'khor gsum gyi ti ka chen dang sngags rim chen mo rnams kyis cung zad spros te brgyan par byas nas mang thos chos kyi spyan can rdo rje'i slob dpon chos ldan blo gros pa'i zhal snga nas kyi gsung las skyes pa'i btsun pa bsod nams ming can gyis dben gnas byams pa gling du @063a * bsgrigs pa'o aom swa sti rigs brgya'i khyab bdg ston pa rdo rje 'chang rigs gsum spyi bsdus 'jam mgon tsong kha pa rigs gnas kun mkhyen pa pan chen bsod nams grags rnam gsum dpyod med zhabs la gus pas 'dud rdo rje 'chang dban gzhal gyi bum bzang las legs 'ongs gsang chen rgyud sde rgya mtsho'i don dpal mgon klu sgrub yab sras man ngag bzhin gsal byed bsam 'phel dbang rgyal 'di rmad do de slad bstan pa'i snying po sngags kyi spyod rnal ma srid mtha'i bar du gnas pa dang ris med 'gro la gtan med mchod sbyin rgyur dmigs te par gyi 'phrul 'degs deng 'dir bsgrubs 'dir 'bad las byung rnam dkar zla gsar 'dis rgyal bstan spyi dang khyad par tshong kha pa'i mdo sngags bstan phyogs bcur rgyas pa dang 'gro kun yid kyi mun pa sel bar shog  'brel thogs kun kyang tshe rabs 'phreng ba ru bshes gnyen dam pas rjes bzung gsang chen lam mngon du 'gyur te 'gro ba sgrol pa la dpal ldan rdo rje can dang mtshungs par shog  bstan pa'i gsal byed rgyal khang rtse mchog sprul rin po ches par du bsgrubs te kun dga' chos gling du bzhugs dge'o bkra shis par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>

<col>@030b (slob dpon ye shes snying pos mdzad pa'i bden gnyis kyi rnam bshad snying po gsal byed ces bya ba 'di nyid mdo sngags kyis bsdus pa'i gzhung du ma la 'dris par byas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i sdom brtson sde snod 'dzin pa thu btsun bsod nams rnam rgyal la sogs pa sde snod 'dzin pa du mas bskul zhing rang nyid kyang goms pa lhur len skyed pa'i phyir du rgyal ba'i ring lugs pa chen po rje btsun dam pa ku mar ma ti'i zhal snga nas dang snyigs dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa chen po bzang grags pa'i dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas gnyis ka la lan du mar thos pa rigs pa smra ba dge slong dar ma rin chen gyis 'brog ri bo che dge ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'o yi ge pa ni sdom brtson rin chen chos rgyal lo 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  ` khal kha 'gro ba'i dbang po sa'ing no yon gyi ael dmag dman rnams skyong ba tu wan ae rte ni jo nang ae rte nig thu me rgan no yon shr'i badzra 'jam dbyangs gong ma srid 'bar ldan rgyal srid skyong ba'i lo gnyis pa rab byung bco lnga pa'i 'dzin byed me pho byi lo zla ba bcu gnyis pa'i tshes dgu bar sku'i bkod pa bsdus pa gang gi dge rtsa rdzogs byang du bsngo ba'i rten rta legs pa gcig dang dar zab yug kha bdun lhag lha rdzas bcas gnang bar brten dpar 'di bsgrubs pa'i legs spyod kyis mtshon ma rgan sems cad thams cad la srid zhi'i rgud pa mtha' dag las grol ba'i mthar thug gi mngon mtho phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba sgrub par dmigs te sku gsum phun tshogs gling du bkod pa'o</col>

<tib>tshad ma kun las btus pa zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@017a * tshad ma kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so rgya gar gyi mkhan po rigs pa smra ba'i gtsug gi nor bur grags pa pa sudha ra rakshi ta dang; ;bod kyi lotstsha pa dge bsnyen seng rgyal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o aom swa sti gsung rab kun gyi rigs gnad bsdus rtsom tshe ngo mtshar brtags mang byung 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis legs bskul ba'i  ngo mtshar tshad ma kun btus la dus ngan snyigs ma'i mtha' khob tu slob gnyer byed mkhan med ma zad slob gnyer dgos pa'i gtam tsam med dpe yang shin tu rnyed dka' bas tha na dpe rgyas ci ma rung snyam du smon pa'i yid bskul nas dka' bcu blo bzang bkra shis dang dge bsnyen tshangs pa gnyis po yis par bsgrubs rnam dkar dge ba'i mthus 'gro kun rten bzang rim brgyud de sangs rgyas go 'phang myur 'thob shog khyad par bstan 'dzin zhabs pad brtan 'gal rkyen kun sel mthun rkyen bsgrubs bstan pa yun ring gnas 'gyur cig ces pa 'di ni dka' bcu blo bzang bkra shis kyis bris pa'o "</col>

<tib>shing rta'i srol 'byed kyi rnam bzhag skal bzang mgul rgyan ces bya ba</tib>

<col>@024a *  smras pa dbu sems shing rta'i srol 'byed rnam gzhag 'di 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa yab sras kyi dgongs pa ji bzhin legs par bkod mod kyi nongs pa mchis na dam pa'i sbyin sngar 'chags tshad ldan legs bshad dam pa'i khungs bral ba'i 'ol tshod dri mas bslang pa 'di la med de phyir gzur gnas chos la yid rton pa'i skal bzang don gnyer tshogs kyis mgul rgyan mdzod tshul 'di dbyangs can dga' ba'i blo gros kyis rang dang skal mnyam dag la phan phyir bsdebs dge bas mkha' mnyam 'gro ba ma lus pa  kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i go 'phang myur thob shog  ces pa 'di ni khal kha jo nang pe si'i shog dad brtson rnam dpyod mchog tu yangs pa dge slong ngag dbang bstan 'dzin gyis chos sbyin rgya cher spel ba'i lhag bsam gyis rgyu rkyen sbyar te bar du bsgrubs pa'i dge bas 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6321</vol>
<tib>'phags pa thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs te sangs rgyas su 'grub par rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo</tib>
<p>1a-147a</p>
<col>@146b bcom ldan kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mgon par bstod do 'phags pa thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'gyod tshangs kyi sdig sbyangs pa ste @148a * sangs rgyas su grub par rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so * lhun grub mtshan dang dpe byad 'byar ba'i sku drug cu'i dbyangs kyis chos sgra sgrog pa'i gsung mkhyen dang brtse ba dpag par dka' ba'i thugs zla med sh'akya'i rgyal pos rtag tu skyongs gang gis bskal ba bzang 'gro la legs gdams pa'i gzhung mchog bde sde bklag sogs bya gyur bar bag chags bzang po zhag pa'i cha rkyen tu gyur tshe skal bzang mngon rgyur ae ma rmad lhag bsam rab dkar bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan sogs spar bsgrub dge bas bskal ba rgyar mtshan tsam yang rnyed dka'i brtse ldan pa gon gyis gdams pa kun dub thar mi nyams 'phrin las cher rgyas shog  ('di'i spar bsgrun smon tshig tu gyin bzhig gas gyis pa 'dis kyang 'di la 'brel thog par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6322</vol>
<tib>bka' drin gsol 'debs</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@007b (ces bla ma'i bka' drin dran nas gsol ba 'debs shing thugs rje bskul ba grub pa'i sprin sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni chos brgyad kyi 'ching ba spangs te 'khrul med kyi lam la bsgrub pa snying por byed pa rnams kyi rgyan du gyur ba rang gi slob ma gnas bcu rab 'byams pa dge 'dun rgyal mtshan dang dad pa phun sum tshogs pa'i 'byor ldan gu shri se chen chos rje gnyis kyis lus longs spyod thams cad bltos med du phul nas bla ma'i bka' drin rjes su dran zhing thugs rje bskul ba ming spel dang bcas  pa rgyas pa zhig dgos zhes yang yang nan gyis bskul ba la brten nas bla ma dam pa'i bka' 'bangs tha chung mdo rgyud man ngag 'dzin pa'i rgyal khams pa dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis brda' dang tshig sbyor sogs kyis ma 'cings par @008a * kun gyis go bde bar mdo rgyud mkhas grub dam pa rnams kyi bka' srol bzhin ras 'phrul snang sh'akya'i rgyal po'i pho brang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul blo bzang dar rgyas so de yang ming spel gyi 'tshams 'dir rang gar mos kyi rtsa ba'i bla ma'i mtshan bcug pas kyang legs par 'gyur ro bskul ba po'i 'dod pas ming spel 'di ltar byas pa la mdo rgyud rnams dang grub pa'i dbang po rnams kyi rnam thar ma mthong ba 'ga' zhig gis mthong na 'on ta zhes sdig rkyen du 'gyur nyin che bas dad ldan phan tshun ma gtogs skal med rnams la gsang ba dge'am snyam mo</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6322</vol>
<tib>bka' drin gsol 'debs thugs rje'i char rgyun bskul ba'i sprin sgra</tib>
<p>1b-3b</p>
<col>@003b (ces bla ma'i thugs rje'i 'char rgyun bskul ba'i sprin sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni la mo chos skyongs chen po'i drung yig pa bsod nams grags pas 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i blo'i ngor dang bstun nas chos smra ba'i btsun pa blo bzang ye shes kyis sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<tib>tshe dpag med kyi sgrub thabs</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6323</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ma'i smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga la bya tshul gyi ngag 'don shin tu bsdus pa gangga'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6323</vol>

<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * (ces bcom ldan 'das so sor 'brang ma'i smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga bya tshul gyi ngag 'don shin tu bsdus pa gangga'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba 'di ni dad brtson blo gros kyi nor gyis phywags dge slong rgan pa mgon po tshe ldan gyis bskul ba ltar ^ gnam bsgos 'jam dbyangs gong ma'i gsung gis chen su tsug thu no mong hang du 'bod pa'i btsum chung ^ su ma ti aabhya sh'a sa na sya bh'a dzas dam pa gong ma'i phyag bzhes dang gsung rgyun tshad ldan la brten nas 'gal med 'khyer bde'i lugs su sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gam drung dge slong dge spel gyis bgyis pa'o 'di kyang bstan 'gro yongs la phan thogs par gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6323</vol>
<tib>dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sgrub thabs smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa las sgrib ngag byed bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-19a</p>
<col>@019a * (zhes dpal ldan dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sgrub thabs smyung gnas pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa la sgrib dag byed bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba 'di bstan pa'i gsal byed chen po the'u kwan sprul pa'i sku blo bzang chos kyi nyi mas 'phrin yig gi lam nas bskul ma mdzad pa ltar rgyal khams pa lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rjes pho brang chen po'i nye 'dabs bka' 'gyur ro cog tshul zung gru zi'i lha khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos tshul du ma la rnam dpyod dang ldan pa au rang zhabs drung bskal bzang bstan 'dzin gyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'gro ba thams cad bla ma thub pa'i dbang po'i rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig  dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6323</vol>
<tib>dpal mgon zhal bzhi pa'i sgo nas bzlog bsgyur zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007a * (ces khyab bdag 'khor lo sdom pa'i rnam 'phrul dpal ldan mgon po zhal bzhi pa'i bzlog bsgyur ba'i cho ga 'di ni dza ya pandi ta blo bzang snyan grags dge legs rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i slob ma rnams kyi tha shal blo bzang dpal mgon zhes bgyi ba mgon po la sogs bzlog bsgyur ma ma rigs 'gres nas byed pa la snyes ldung gi tshogs pa yon kun bla ma yi dam lha dang dpal mgon zhal bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa bzor par byams par mdzad cing 'gro kun la phan par @007b mdzad du gsol ngo tshe khrel yod med pa'i sems kyis bgyis pa dge bas rang gzhan la phan gyur cig  bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling brgyan du byon sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6323</vol>
<tib>dpal phyag na rdo rje la brten pa'i smyung gnas kyi cho ga zhes bya ba bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * (ces dpal phyag na rdo rje brten pa'i smyung nas kyi cho ga'i 'di lta zhig dgos zhes aor du su jun kar pe se'i shog rab 'byams dge slong ngag dbang tshul khrims bskul ngor sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos sbyar ba'o bkra shis 'bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6323</vol>
<tib>dpal phyag na rdo rje la brten pa'i smyung gnas kyi cho ga zhes bya ba bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-16a</p>
<col>@016a * (ces dpal phyag na rdo rje la brten pa'i smyung gnas kyi cho ga'i 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes aor ta su jun kar pe se'i shog rab 'byams dge slong ngag dbang tshul khrims bskul ngor ^ sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos sbyar ba'o bkra shis 'bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6323</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi mngon par rtogs</tib>
<p>1a-36a</p>
<col>@036a * (ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed lha bcu gsum ma'i sgrub thabs rin po che'i za ma tog ces bya ba 'di sdom brtson dam pa mang du thos pa'i mkhan chen tsha kho ba ngag dbang grags pas shar rgyal mo rong nas bskul ba'i don du gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pa shar tsong kha pa blo bzang grags pa'i bgyis 'brog rin po che dga' ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson sde snod 'dzin pa rdo rje rin chen no sgrub thabs rin po che'i za ma tog tu gsungs pa rnams tshang bar lhan thabs dang bsres pa'o dge'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6323</vol>
<tib>rje btsun ma 'phags ma yid bzhin 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs smyung gnas kyi cho ga dang 'brel ba 'chi med dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * (ces rje btsun ma 'phags ma yid bzhin 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga dang 'brel ba 'chi med dga' ston zhes bya ba 'di ni don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis bskul ba ltar blo dman pa snang mdzad rdo rje ming can gyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang rgyas pa'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6323</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sgrol dkar yid bzhin 'khor lo'i zhi ba sbyin sreg zhes bya ba bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (ces rje btsun yid bzhin 'khor lo'i rang bzhin gyis tshe dang bsod nams spel ba'i thabs zhi ba la sbyin sreg 'di yang skyabs dgon pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung 'jam dkar gyis sbyin sreg ltar du gzhan phan lhag bsam gyis kun blangs te rgyal sras bskal bzang thub bstan gyis bris pa'o dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6323</vol>
<tib>smyungs bar gnas pa'i cho ga'i las bum sgrub tshul</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@003b (ces pa 'di ni sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos 'phags pa thugs rje chen po zhal bcu gcig pa phyag stong spyan @004a * stong grub pa rnyes dge slong dpal mo'i lugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug cing dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bde legs kun 'byung zhes bya ba mdzad pa nas las bum sgrug dang lha bskyed ni rta mgrin yin la lag len gyi dpe cha la smyung gnas kyi cho ga la las bum nges par sgrub dgos lha ni las bum gyi lha ni rta mgrin bskyed pad+ma nta krita ces pa'i sngags rta mgrin gyi las sngags yin mchod gtor sogs kyi bgegs bsangs pa ni las bum gyis chus bsangs zhes gsungs pa ltar gzhen cho ga'i lugs la las bum lha bskyed tshul mi 'dug lag len gyi dpe cha'i rjes su 'brang nas zur bris pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>tshe sgrub 'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun</tib>

<col>@014a * (zhes tshe sgrub 'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyi sbyor dngos mjug gsum ji ltar bya ba'i chog bsgrigs man ngag zhal shes dang bcas pa gsal bar bkod pa dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni gangs can 'gro ba'i mgon po thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa rje btsun blo bzang bstan pa'i dbang phyug 'jam dpal rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i ^ bkas bskul ba la brten nas snang ba mtha' yas ngur smrig gar gyi rnam par rol pa ^ rje btsun thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang ye shes dpal bzang po'i bka' drin las chos 'di'i dbang lung man ngag rnams legs par thob par dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis pho brang chen po po ta lar sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs kun tu 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig  dge'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6325</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas gza' klu gtso ba'i sde brgyad kyi dug dbyung bya tshul gdung sel zla 'od zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-14b</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6328</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan lha  mo'i sgo nas ga-yul mdos dang 'brel ba'i gtor bzlog gi cho ga bgegs dpung rnam 'joms zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-56a</p>
<col>@055b (ces pa 'di ni dpal ldan lha mo dmag zor rgyal mo'i sgo nas yul gyi nad rims bzlog pa'i thabs mdos dang pa'i 'brel gtor bzlog gi cho ga bgegs dpung rnam 'joms zhes bya ba 'di ni @056a * gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pa 'jam dbyangs ral gris mdzad pa'i dpal ldan lha mo'i mdos dang zor 'phen pa'i rim pa shin tu gnyan pa dang grub pa'i dpal phyug nor bu bzang pos mdzad pa'i rdo rje thog 'bebs gnyis gzhir byas nas thams cad mkhyen pa phyogs las rnam rgyal sogs mkhas pa rnams kyi gsung nas cung zad kha skang ste rang bzo'i dri ma cung zad tsam yang ma slad par rab 'byams pa bsam grub bstan 'dzin gyis bris pa'o rgyal ba gnyis pa rje btsun btsong kha pa chen po'i bstan pa phyogs kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsnyen sgrub las gsum la bsnyen pa'i yi ge 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi zhal lung dngos grub rdzogs ldan sprin bzang bglags pas don grub skal ldan 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-27b</p>
<col>@027a * ces dpal rdo rje 'jig sbyed kyi bsnyen sgrub las gsum gyi nang nas bsnyen pa'i yi ge 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi zhal lung dngos grub rdzogs ldan sprin bzang bklags pas don 'grub skal ldan 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyan drug mchog gnyis lta bu'i mkhas mang 'ba' zhig gis gang ba'i grwa tshun zhes pa'i nang tshan mkhas mang blo gsal gling gi slob dpon rin po che mdo sngags thub bstan yongs @027b la sbyangs pa'i mkhas pa sbyin pa dang tshul khrims sogs dam pa'i yon tan gyis mdzes pa ye shes mgon po sogs tshe sngon 'grub pa'i rtags mtshan gyis mtho ba sogs yon tan du mas phyugs pa de nyid kyis bsod nams kha btags dang zho'i snying po tshe legs dang phyag bris bcas yang yang bskul ba dang gzhung brgya smra ba mi nyag chos rje nor bu'i mtshan can gyis dngul gyi me tog dang bcas yang yang bskul ba dang slad nas kyang tshe blos btang gi dga' ldan chos 'phel gyi bla ma dge slong ye shes bzang pos rje rin po che'i gsang ba'i rnam thar khyad 'phags rje legs bzang bas zin bris mdzad nas rje'i spyan lam du phab pa de nyid dang dngul gyi me tog byu ru che ba nyin bde dang bcas drag tu gsol ba btab pa'i ngor lus 'byung bzhi ma snyoms kyang 'phral mar ngag nas ci thon du bsnyen pa'i gnad don gsal bar mang du thos pa'i dge slong 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes dge 'phel gyi ri rtse mkha' spyod gur khang du sbyar ba 'dis 'gro ba rnams 'jam dbyangs zhi khros rjes su bzung ste mchog gi dngos grub la longs spyod par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<col>@015a * ces thabs mkhas kyi spyod pa dang @015b tshangs par spyod pa dang 'tsho ba dag pa dang las rnam par dag pa bzhi bstan pa mngon rtogs rgyan gyi skabs bzhi par mthong la ma phyir mi ljog pa'i rtogs kun byung bzod shes kyi ming gis btags pa'i skabs su lus sems las su rung ba yang ba dang mngon zhenmed par khyim gyi 'dod yon la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa dang tshe rabs rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa dang log 'tsho spangs pa'i 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa bzhi lus sems yang ba nyid dang ni 'dod la spyod la thabs mkhas dang rtag tu tshangs par spyod nyid dang 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa zhes pa ltar rang nyid gnas shing gzhan dag der dgog pa'i sems bskyed kyi dmigs rnam ma brjed pa'i dran shes bag yod gsum bsgril gyi sgo nas dran dang shes bzhin bag yod chen po yi zhes byung ba bzhin sems can thams cad dbang phyug gi yon tan brgyad ma 'thob par du brtson na snyam du mdo nas gsungs pa'i bslab bya de lta bu lag tu len pa'i don du rang gzhan la bskul ma gdab kyi tshul du zhes @016a * ai rti ni rbi shril thu mergen pandi ta'i btags ming 'chang ba ^tshe spel dbang phyug rdo rjes rab byung bco lnga pa'i rnam gnon zhes pa lcags pho 'brug lor bris pa'i yi ge pa ni spos 'dzin rdo rjes so zhi 'dul bag yod kyi rgyan dang ldan pa 'cham dpon dge bskos dge slong pha thwa skyabs dang dbu mdzad dam chos shes rab kyis dpar du bsgrubs pa'i dge bas ma rgan sems can thams cad nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin mi zad pa 'thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig "</col>

<item>

<tib>sur'yu pa gtong bar 'dod pa ni "</tib>

<tib>mkhan chen blo bzang chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung 'bum las 'chi ba bslu ba'i cho ga 'chi bdag ga-yul rgyal zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@012a * zhes tshe dpag med @012b 'chi med rnga sgr'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas 'chi ba bslu ba'i cho ga 'chi bdag ga-yul rgyal zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi nang slob chos la blo yis chu skyes kha phye ba'i dge slong grags pa rgyal mtshan pas nan cher bskul ba'i ngor dze ta ri'i rgya gzhung dang rdo rje 'chang pan chen thams cad mkhyen pas mdzad pa'i cho ga la gzhir byas bla ma'i gsung rgyun dang mkhas pa'i phyag bzhes rnam dag gis zur brgyan te rje khyab bdag dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i bka' drin gyis nye bar 'tsho ba'i jing gri lha'i btsun pa'o blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan gyis sug bris su bgyis pas 'gro ba thams cad dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba kun las grol te rnam 'dren tshe dpag med kyi myur du thob par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<col>@011b (ces jo bo lugs kyi dzam bha la dkar po 'brug gzhon lha lnga'i sgo nas nor sgrub bya tshul yid bzhin nor bu'i bang mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni don gnyer ba 'ga' zhig gis snga mo nas bskul zhing nye char dgos pa 'ga' zhig gis ched dang gzhan la phan 'dod kyis kyang bskul te rdo rje 'chang kun spangs pa ri pa'i drung du lha 'di nyid rjes gnang man ngag rnams legs par thob cing som nyi'i gnas la sgro 'dogs legs par bcad de khong du chud par byas pa mi rabs gsum du lh amchog 'di nyid sgrub cing dngos grub kyi cha shas la longs syod pa'i rigs su byung ba'i btsun gzugs ^blo bzang chos nyi mas dpen pa'i gnas mchog bde chen rab rgyas gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gu shri dge slong blo bzang bzod pas bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang 'gro ba mtha' dag dbul phongs kyis sdug bsngal las thar te mthar thug gi dpal 'byor zad mi shes la longs spyod par gyur cig  dge'o</col>

<col>@011a * (ces gcod kyi gdams pa thar 'dod kyi ded dpon zhes bya ba'di ni bslab gsum gyis thugs kyi bang mdzod yongs su gdams pa'i sde snod 'dzin pa rgyal bas sngags pa'i bsam gtan pa chen po rje drung legs tshogs lhun grub kyis nan cher bskul ba la brten nas rgyal ba'i sras po blo gros sbas pa dang pan chen lung rigs rgya mtsho la sogs pa'i dam pa du ma'i gcod kyi gdams pa rnams las legs cha rnams blangs te ngag 'don gyi rim par bsgrigs nas sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gys blo bzang mdun sa dben sa chos kyi pho brang gi gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6375</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan lha mo la tshes gtor 'bul tshul gyi lag len khrigs chags su bkod pa 'gag med rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13b</p>
<col>@013b ces rgyal yum 'dod khams dbang mo la tshes gtor 'bul tshul gyi lag len khrigs chags su bkod pa 'gags med rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di ni snga phyir dong gnyer can mang po dang nye char chos sde chen po dgon glung byams pa gling gi bskang gso dbu mdzad rgyal rtse rab 'byams pa ngag dbang bstan dar gyis lha rdzas dri bral dang bcas nan tan du bskul ba la brten nas thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho dang bsod nams rgya mtsho sogs kyi phyag len rgyal ba'i sras o don yod chos kyi rgya mtshos chos sde chen po byams pa gling du 'dzugs par mdzad pa ji lta ba bzhin rang bzos ma bslad par dpal ldan lha mo 'di nyid la shes nas dad pa thob pa'i btsun gzugs snyoms las pa blo bzang chos kyi nyi mas bshad sgrub bstan pa'i 'byung gnas chos sde chen po sku 'bum byams pa gling gi gzim khang theg chen chos mdzod du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong ngag dbang bstan 'phel gyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang dpal ldan lha mo dkyil pa chen pos 'phrin las rnam bzhi ga-yel med du mdzad par gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6375</vol>
<tib>dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa la gsol ba 'debs pa'i smon tshig bsam pa lhun gyis 'grub pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (ces dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo rgyal ba ^blo bzang grags pa la gsol ba 'debs pa'i smon tshig bsam pa lhun gyis 'grub pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ^rgyal mkhan po ^grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang chos 'phel lo</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6375</vol>
<tib>gnam sa snang brgyad kyi cho ga stong gsum 'khrugs pa'i yo bcos zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13b</p>
<col>@013a * (ces gsham bur btags ces gza' dang rgyu skar gnod na ri mgor bskyel sa bdag klu gnyan gnod na ri mgo'am khang dam mkhar thog gam chu mig gam gad pa khyim sgo mi gsal ba'i sar bder bskyal la ga-yang blang bya'o legs par grub pa 'di 'dra ba'i bsrung ba gzhan med do bdud rtsi'i lhag ma rnams ga-yang rjes su byin nad pa rnying ba'i don du byed na de ltar ma yin no 'di ni bcos ka'i @013b rgyal ba ste stong gsum 'khrugs pa'i yo bcos yin gza' dang rgyu skar sa bdag klu gnyan la sogs 'khrug pa'i yo bcos kyang yin gnam khyi dgu mig gdan bcos la sogs pa thams cad 'dir 'dus pa yin las rnams kun la 'di bya 'phags pa gnam sa snang brgyad kyi cho ga slob dpon klu sgrub kyi mdzad pa bstod gsum 'khrugs pa'i yo bcos zhes bya ba sdzogs bkra shis par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6375</vol>
<tib>kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i gsung 'bum las 'jug sgo gsum gyi khrid yig gzhan phan nor bu'i phreng mdzes zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6375</vol>
<tib>lha mo 'od zer can ma'i sgo nas bzlog bsgyur bya tshul nyer 'tsho yul las zhes bya</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (ces lha mo 'od zer can ma'i sgo nas bzlog bsgyur bya tshul nyir 'tsho yul las rgyal ba'i ru mtshon zhes bya ba 'di bla ma gong ma man ngag la rigs 'gre nas bstan pa dar pa rgyas kyi bkod pas 'gro kun bar chad las rgyal bar gyur cig sarba legs so ces so bkra shis 'bar gyur cig</col>

<tib>rgyal mdos zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6375</vol>
<tib>rgyan mtshan rtse mo dpung rgyan gi bskang bshags bstod bskul bzlog pa bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006b (ces pa 'di ni lhag pa'i lha mchog rgyal mtshan rtse mo dpung rgyan la brten nas bskang bshags bstod bskul bzlog pa bcas ^sh'akya dge slong su ma te kti kri ti bris bkra shsi dpal 'bar 'dzam gling can du gyur</col>

<rkts></rkts>

<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas gza' klu gtso bo'i sde brgyad kyi dug dbyung bya tshul gdung sel zla 'od zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17b</p>
<col>@017b (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas gza' klu gtso bo'i sde brgyaddug dbyung bya tshul gdung sel zla 'od zhes bya ba 'di ni snyigs dus kyi skye bo du ma la phan par mthon nas yig cha 'dra min 'ga' zhig snang yang gsang bdag sprul skus mdzad pa'i chog bsgrigs rdo rje'i snying po 'khyer bde bar 'dug pa'i de nyid sgra sor bzhag la lhag sngags rta mgrin du kha bsgyur zhing tshigs 'ga' zhig ngag tu 'don bde bar bcos te ku s'a li^dharma badzra gyis sdebs pa'i yig pe ni dge slong blo bzang kun dga' bgyis pa dge legs 'phel</col>

<tib>grub chen l'u ai pa'i lugs kyi 'khor lo sdom pa'i mngon rtogs nag 'gros su bkod pa</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@026b (bde mchog l'u ai pa'i lugs kyi mngon rtogs'di la 'don cha 'dra min sna tshogs cig 'dug pa las dben dgon du gsung chog ji ltar mdzad pa'i @027a * lugs bde chen gsal ba dang mthun pa 'dug pa ltar slar yang tshig phran tshegs mi 'dra ba rnams rtsa ba dang mthun par byas te btsun pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis ngag 'don khrigs chags su bsgrigs pa'o</col>

<item>

<vol>6384</vol>
<tib>rgyal chen rnam thos sras kyi gong gnon gyi lha dpal gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi sgrub thabs dngos grub kun 'byung ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@005b (ces phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyis bsgrub thabs dngos grub kun 'byung ces bya ba 'di yang rgyal chen rnam thos sras kyi sgo nas 'phrin las bsgrub pa'i skabs du ma zhig tu nye bar 'kho bar mthong nas rang gzhan la phan pa'i sems kyis kun nas blangs te gsang bdag ngur smrig gar rol rje dag gis dbang po 'phrin las dpal bzang po dang kun mkhyen chen po 'jam dbyangs bzhad sprul dgon mchog 'jigs med dbang po'i zhal snga nas sogs dam du ma'i zhabs drung nas yi dam 'di nyid kyi rjes gnang legs par thob pa'i ^sh'akya'i dge slong gyi na ba blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug gis slob dpon 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa'i 'di'i sgrub thabs rtsa 'grel dang mgon po bsod nams mchod ldan dang mkhas chen ngag dbang chos grags sogs kyi mdzad pa'i rnam thos sras kyi rje gnang gi chog sgrigs dang 'phags sde lo tsa ba'i rnam sras bsgrub thabs dgos 'dod kun 'byung sogs tshad thug gyi yig cha du mar zhib tu spyad nas sgrub thabs kyi zur sogs so so'i bka' srol ma phyed pa'i gang dran rgyas 'geb lta bu ma yin par 'di nyid kyi srol bka' nyams pa med pa'i lugs su rang gi bsam gtan gyis khang bur mtshams cad dge sbyor gyi thun bar? zhig @006a * tu sgrigs pa 'dis kyang 'gro kun gsang ba'i bdag pos rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig ) phyag na rdo rje'i mngon rtogs 'di 'di phyi'i las kun 'grub byed yin yin kyang las nyon che ldan rnams; ;rnam kun dran shes gsal bar shog badzra tishtha:"</col>

<p>1a-37a</p>
<col>@036b ces bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i lam gyi rim pa la slob tshul gyi spyi don mdor bsdus pa gsang chen rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i gru gzings zhes bya ba 'di ni rang nyid brjed byad dang lam 'di la mos pa'i blo ldan don gnyer can gzhan dag la'ang phan pa'i bsam pas nye bar bskul te spyi bshad phal cher ^rdo rje 'chang blo bzang chos kyi nyi ma'i zhal snga nas kyis mkha' spyod ma'i spyi don du gsungs pa gzhir bzhag pa la yab bka'i bskyed rdzogs dang 'brel ba'i bshad sbyor gyi rim pa rnams bu ston rin po che'i bde mchog spyi don dang rje bdag nyid chen po'i rgyud 'grel sbas don kun gsal dang rnam bshad 'dod 'jo sogs las ci rigs par btus shing skabs su babs pa'i mtshams sbyor ci rigs pas brgyan te mkhas shing grub brnyes yongs 'dzin dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i bka' 'bangs tha shalba bhu su ku pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes myos byed ces pa shing mo lug lo'i dgun 'bring rgyal zla ba'i tshes [?'i] dus mchod dang bstun par bsam gtan sgrub sde yid dga' chos 'dzin gyi bsti gnas su sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni lam 'di lamos pa lhur byed pa'i rdo rje'i slob bu @037a * chos mdzad dge slong bstan 'dzin bzang pos bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa'i snying po 'jam mgon bla [???] kyi ring lugs dri ma med pa spyi dang khyad par du dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi bshad sgrub kyi bstan pa rin po che nam yang mi nub cing kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nus par gyur cig mah'a su ha siddhi mwe pra yatstshantu "</col>

<tib>cho 'phrul bstod pa rgya chen tshogs gnyis ma bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b (zhes pa 'di yang bkra shis lhun po'i dngul gdung lha khang du cho 'phrul gyi mdzad pa rin po che bre ba'i dus pir thogs dbang po'i chos kyi rje blo bzang chos 'phel dpon slob dang dka' bcu tshogs gsog pa legs pa chos 'byor rnams kyis bskul ba la brten nas ston pa mchog de'i rjes su byung ba sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i gzims khang du thogs med du sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6387</vol>
<tib>dpal gsang ba 'dus pa mi bskyod pa'i zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga lag tu blang bde ba</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6389</vol>
<tib>bla ma mchod pa'i khrid yig gsang ba'i gnad rnam par phye ba snyan rgyud man ngag gi gter mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-294a</p>
<col>@293b (ces bla ma mchod pa'i khrid yig gsang ba'i gnad rnam par phye ba snyan rgyud man ngag gi gter mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni lta dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba yongs kyi rnam 'dren dam pa rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag po pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa rje btsun blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes dpal bzang pos dben sa snyan rgyud kyi man ngag gi snying po bla ma mchod pa bde stong dbyer med ma 'di la khrid yig rgyas pa man ngag gig gnad rnams rnam par phye ba zhig gyis shig ces bkas bskul ba la brten nas bka' bzhin sgrub pa mchod pa'i mchod tu bsams bka' lung spyi bos mnos te rje nyid kyis dgyes bhzin rjes su bzung zhing lam bzang 'di la brten nas grub pa mchog brnyes pa'i bla ma dam pa las chos 'di'i snyan rgyud kyi man ngag thob pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bla ma dampa'i zhal las thos pa'i man ngag la gzhi byas @294a * gdams ngag 'di gang las btus pa'i rtsa ba'i khungs 'dus pa rtsa bshad kyi rgyud sogs rgyud dang grub chen gyi gzhung rnams dang rje thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung rnams la zhib tu brtags te yid ches pa'i tshul du thams cad 'dul zhes pa me mo phag gi lo dbyug pa zla ba'i dkar tshes rgyal ba gnyis pa'i nyin ba la bod mtshams kyi gnas mang yul skyid grong gi nags khrod bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs kun tu dar zhing nam yang mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig bkra shis</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6390</vol>
<tib># dbu ma'i lta ba la bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@008a * (ces dbu ma'i lta ba la bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni stobs kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ching gi se zhes yongs su grags pa'i gdung brgyud du 'khrungs te lugs gnyis kyi gzhung la @008b mkhas par spyangs shing bstan pa bstan 'dzin dang bcas pa la gus mchod lhur len pa dang 'bangs rnams byams brtses skyong ba la sogs pa'i yon tan du ma'i sgo nas bod kyi chos rgyal mes dpon rnam gsum gyi mched zlar gyur ^ho shos chin wang tshe ring rdo rjes kho bos bris pa'i byang chub sems bstod kyi tshigs bcad gzigs pas rkyen byas te dbu ma'i lta ba la yang bstod pa zhig dgos zhes kha btags rnam dbang dngul srang gang bcas nye bar bskul ba'i bak'astsal dang du blangs nas mang thos sbong ba pa'i gzugs brnyan ^sprang btsun ngag dbang dpal ldan gyis rang byung @009a * bzhi pa'i bgrang bya zhe bdun pa chu mo glang lo'i cho 'phrul zla ba'i yar ngor sha ra'i sman chu zhes bya ba'i dben sar mtshams bcad skabs sug bris bgyis pa 'dis kyang bstan 'gro la phan thogs par gyur cig bkra shis par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>

<tib>rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la brten pa'i ga-yang 'gugs kyi cho ga dgos 'dod char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@049b (ces rnam mang thos pa'i srsas la brten nas ga-yang 'gugs pa'i cho ga 'di yang dga' ba'i tshal dbu mdzad zur pa mang du thos pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan sogs kysi 'dilta bu zhig dgos zhes gsung nor skyabs gnas kun dus phyag na padmo'i thugs rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i btsun pa kalwa bhadra'i ming can gyis ga-yang 'gugs kyi cho ga rin chen gsang ba khang bu brtsegs pa dang rin chen phreng ba gnyis nas kha bskang gtso bor nor lha @050a * ga-yang skyabs la gzhi bya te mig dmar zhes pa shing pho byi ba'i lo gro zhun zla ba'i yar tshes dge bar phywa ga-yang ma khus 'du ba'i gnas mchog chos 'khor rgyal legs bshad gling gi zims chung gsang sngags rdo rje'i pho brang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul blo bzang mi 'gyur gyis bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6390</vol>
<tib>rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol dkar yid bzhin 'khor lo'i tshogs mchod</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004b (zhes brjod de gtsang gsar phyi rol tu btang ngo mi dmigs pas rgyas btab smon lam bkra shis ci rigspas brgyan par bya'o rje btsun'phags ma sgrol dkar yid bzhin 'khor lo'i tshogs 'khor mdor bsdus dge legs char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni bikshu blo bzang zhes bya ba yid bzhin 'khor lo'i tshe sgrub kyi mthar tshogs 'khor 'bum 'bul skabs su bya rgyud dang mthun par 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes don gnyer can 'ga' zhig bskul ba'i ngor khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chen byang phyogs bstan pa'i gsal byed dpal bzang pos sku skyes bsod nams rin chen gyi slob ma rnams kyi thal zhal ba su ma te ming can gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni su ma ti sha sa na ming can no dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6390</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma'i tshogs 'khor</tib>
<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@005a * (ces pa 'di ni byang phyogs bstan pa'i sgron me khal kha mkhan po no mun han tshe dbang rdo rje grags gsung gis bskul ba ltar brten nas sh'akya'i @005b dge rigs pa 'dzin pa ^gong ma'i lung gis zhwa ser bstan pa'i gsal byed aa chi thu no mun han du bod pa blo bzang ye shes bstan pa rab rgyas kyis rwa sgreng rgyal ba'i dben gnas kyi rang gnas bde chen pho brang du sbyar ba dzayantu dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6390</vol>
<tib>rjebtsun sgrol ma yid bzhin 'khor lo'i sgo nas trba'i sbyin sreg byed tshul gyi yig chung</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (ces pa'ang slob bu 'ga' zhig nas lag len gyi yig chung 'di lta bu zhig dgos tshul byung ba ltar ^dam tshig rdo rjes bris pa dge legs 'phel aa: yu siddhi pha la to:)"</col>

<tib>grib bdag nag po mdos glud bya tshul</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@004a * (ao rgyan pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi gsung bzhin 'bri mangga lam dge'o bkra shis par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>gshin rje'i rgyal po'i 'chi bslu</tib>

<tib>kha 'bar ma'i gtor chog zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6466</vol>
<tib>kong tse gsol mchod zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6466</vol>
<tib>lcam sring gi mdos glud zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004b (chos skyong lcam sring 'khor bcas la mdos glud 'bul tshul zhes pa 'di ni byang phyogs bstan pa'i gsal byed dza ya pandi'i sku gzhogs grwa tshang phan bde gsang sngags kyi gling gi bstan srid kyi blo rig dang ldan pa dim chi ai hi ni tas sang skal bzang dge legs dang jang jong chen po'i chen wang gi mnga' 'bangs gso rtsis kyi blo rigs pas brgyan pa'i dim chi blo bzang ngag dbang zhes bya ba ni gnyis nan tan du chen pos 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngo khral du byang phyogs bstan pa'i gsal byed rje dza ya pandita'i mtshan gzhan blo bzang snyan grags dge legs rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i slob ma tha shal pa nyon mongs kyi bran du gyur ba blo bzang dpal mgon zhes bgyi ba'i sbyar ba'i 'di yis gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi 'gal rkyen bar chod kun sel zhing rgyal ba'i go 'phang thob rgyu ru bsngo bkra shis 'bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6466</vol>
<tib>lus ngag yid gsum bcings pa las grol bar byed pa'i gzungs</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b ces bstod do brgya byin la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad yi rangs ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod lus ngag yid gsum bcings pa las grol bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so (rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta ka ya dha ra dang bod kyi lo tstsha ba sh'akya ye shes kyis mang du yul byams sprin gyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6466</vol>
<tib>ma gcig khros man nag po man ngag zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * (zhes mkha' 'gro snyan rgyud kyi gnyan khrod la 'gro ba'i zhal shes zhes yeg chu 'di yang mkhas grub byams pa karma dar rgyas kyi gsungs pa ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin gang zag blo rmongs shing shes rab chung pa dang rang dang bskal ba mnyam pa rnams kyi don du chos med byams pa lha dbang rigs 'dzin gyis bkod pa'o blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis snyan rgyud zhal gdams chen po ma rigs mun sel sogs rgyas rnams la gzigs par zhu slar yagn gsal byed ldan thob cung zad ngag dbang phun tshogs kyis sbyar ba'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6466</vol>
<tib>phyag chen gsol 'debs</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6466</vol>
<tib>rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyin sreg ltung mun sel nyi 'od 'bul 'phro zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b (ces rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyin sreg sdig ltung mun sel nyi 'od 'bum 'phro zhes bya ba 'di ni nang don rig pa mdo sngags kyi gzhung legs par sbyangs shing dbang lung man ngag gis rgyud phyug pa mtsho bdun gyi dgon pa'i ther kun bla ma ka bcu blo bzang tshul khrims kyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba ltar snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis mtsho bdun gyi lha khang chen mor sbyar ba'o 'dis kyis bstan pa dang sems can la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6466</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas phyugs glud gtong thabs 'byung ba tshim byed zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (zhes sogs man sngar bzhin sbyar phyugs ma blang bya phyugs glud spang bya ru rgyal bas ma gsung deng dus thams cad kyis gan phyugs thob byar 'dzin phyir phyugs glud kyang mkho ba srid snyam ^ dharma badzra gyis snang srid sel bu'i 'phyong dang mthun par spel dge bas 'gro kun bde skyid ldan par shog  sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6466</vol>
<tib>rta yi cha glud</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006b (rta yi cha glud 'di slob dpon pad+ma sa gsungs pa'i rgyun la gzhi la byas nas rgyud gzhung rnams nas glud kyi cha lag 'ga' zhig bsdus nas phyogs gcig tu dge slong blo bzang sbyar ba'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6466</vol>
<tib>rten 'brel snying po'i gzungs sngags kyi sgo nas yul khrus sogs bya tshul cho ga dge legs char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9b</p>
<col>@009b (ces rten 'brel snying po'i gzungs sngags gis sgo nas yul khrus sogs bya tshul dge legs char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni t'a re gangga'i aer te ni mer gen ho thug thu'i gsol dpon chos mig yangs pa dge tshul dpal ldan dam chos kyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba la brten nas bla ma dam pa rnams kyis zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i ban rgan ^ dam tshig rdo rje sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge slong mangga la badzra gyis bris pa'o 'dis kyang bstan 'gro yongs la phan bde rgya chen po byung bar gyur cig  mangga lam dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>6466</vol>
<tib>no title [@006a * na mo gu ru t'a ki ni shar rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro mtsho bzhengs la sku mdog sngon mo gdangs ldan mtsho bzhengs la mchong gi thor tshugs ldems se mtsho bzhengs la]"</tib>

<p>1a-6a</p>

</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6467</vol>
<tib>dus gsum rgyal ba'i bstan srung srid gsum skye 'gro'i srog bdag khams gsum bdud 'dul sprin ring rgyal po dang 'brel bar rang gzhan la bkra shis dge mtshan spel ba'i cho ga dge legs char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-20a</p>
<col>@019b gal te tshe 'gugs lta bu re re tsam byed kyang tshogs zhing spyan 'dren bzhugs gsol bya rjes tshe 'gugs kyi gsol 'debs sogs 'thud byas shing des gzhan la'ang rigs 'gro'o ces pa 'di ni dpyod ldan chos rje ye shes tshul khrims kyis snga mo nas bskul zhing nye char dad ldan slob ma 'ga' @020a * zhig gis yang yang rna ba rtsi ra bas bskul ba bo'i 'dod mos ltar ^ sh'akya'i btsun pa su ma ti tsinta siddhis ^ grub dbang thu'u bkwan rin po ches mdzad pa'i rta mgrin la brten nas rang gzhan gyi bkra shis dge mtshan spel ba'i cho ga de nyid khungs su byas te shing pho 'thug lo'i hor zla yar tshes bzang por sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6467</vol>
<tib>gnod sbyin chen po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi bskang gso'i rim pa bar chad kun sel zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006a * (ces @006b gnod sbyin chen po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi bskang gso'i rim pa bar chad kun sel zhes bya ba  'di yang rigs rus mchog tu dge zhing dad pa dang rnam dpyod phun sum tshogs pa rig gnas mtha' dag la mkhyen pa'i spyan yangs ga-yo ba'i sde pa rnam sras dzam la zhes bya bas bskul ba'i ngor mdo rgyud dam pa'i man ngag 'dzin pa sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis 'di'i sgrub thabs slob dpon pad+mas mdzad par grags pa dang grwa ba mngon shes kyis mdzad zer ba'i yig rnying 'ga' zhig 'dug kyang snga mo nas brgyud pas bris nor mngan che zhing phal tshig ring thung yang mi snyoms pa yid brtan dka' ba dang gzhan ma khungs btsun pa'i gtor chog gtsang ma zhig ma mthong yang 'di'i rjes gnang las tshogs rags rim dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i zhabs drung du thob pa'i gdams pa la gzhi byas sngar gyi yig rnying de dag gi legs cha rnams kyis kyang kha bskangs te chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i gtsug lag khang du sug bris su byas pa las slar yi ge pa ni rab 'byams smra ba'i lo tstsha ba dge 'dun dpal 'bar ro 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig bkra shis pa dang dge ba 'phel gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6467</vol>
<tib>gnod sbyin chen po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi bskang gso'i rim pa bar chad kun sel zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006a * (ces @006b gnod sbyin chen po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi bskang gso'i rim pa bar chad kun sel zhes bya ba  'di yang rigs rus mchog tu dge zhing dad pa dang rnam dpyod phun sum tshogs pa rig gnas mtha' dag la mkhyen pa'i spyan yangs ga-yo ba'i sde pa rnam sras dzam la zhes bya bas bskul ba'i ngor mdo rgyud dam pa'i man ngag 'dzin pa sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis 'di'i sgrub thabs slob dpon pad+mas mdzad par grags pa dang grwa ba mngon shes kyis mdzad zer ba'i yig rnying 'ga' zhig 'dug kyang snga mo nas brgyud pas bris nor mngan che zhing phal tshig ring thung yang mi snyoms pa yid brtan dka' ba dang gzhan ma khungs btsun pa'i gtor chog gtsang ma zhig ma mthong yang 'di'i rjes gnang las tshogs rags rim dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i zhabs drung du thob pa'i gdams pa la gzhi byas sngar gyi yig rnying de dag gi legs cha rnams kyis kyang kha bskangs te chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i gtsug lag khang du sug bris su byas pa las slar yi ge pa ni rab 'byams smra ba'i lo tstsha ba dge 'dun dpal 'bar ro 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig bkra shis pa dang dge ba 'phel gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<item>

<vol>6467</vol>
<tib>lha mchog srid gsum gyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po'i gsol mchod kyi rim pa don yod 'phrul gyi zhags pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@011a * (ces lha mchog srid gsum gyi bdag po lha chen tshangs pa chen po'i gsol mchod kyi rim pa don yod 'phrul gyi zhags pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lha mchog tshangs pa chen po nyid kyi bka' lung gis nye bar bskul te gang gi sku 'dzin pa'i rigs sras 'chi med pa dur 'joms dbang pos snyan tshig gi lan nas drangs pa'i tshig gi zhu 'phrin gyi bskul ba ltar 'jam dpal gshin gyi gshed kyi rnal 'byor pa sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis sug bris su bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>6467</vol>
<tib>lha mchog srid gsum gyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po'i gsol mchod kyi rim pa don yod 'phrul gyi zhags pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@011a * (ces lha mchog srid gsum gyi bdag po lha chen tshangs pa chen po'i gsol mchod kyi rim pa don yod 'phrul gyi zhags pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lha mchog tshangs pa chen po nyid kyi bka' lung gis nye bar bskul te gang gi sku 'dzin pa'i rigs sras 'chi med pa dur 'joms dbang pos snyan tshig gi lan nas drangs pa'i tshig gi zhu 'phrin gyi bskul ba ltar 'jam dpal gshin gyi gshed kyi rnal 'byor pa sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis sug bris su bgyis pa'o)"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6467</vol>
<tib>lha mchog srid gsum gyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po'i gsol mchod kyi rim pa don yod 'phrul gyi zhags pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>

<tib>rgyal mdos</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (rje rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzad pa'o bkra shis par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6469</vol>
<tib>rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi bzhag gtor 'bul ba'i rim pa rin chen char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11b</p>
<col>@011b (ces rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi bzhag gtor 'bul ba'i rim pa rin chen char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi gam du nye bar 'tshe ba'i slob ma sems dul ba dang dbang po nye bar zhi ba dad pa dang tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyan gyis mdzes 'od zer rgyal mtshan zhes bya bas 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes yang yang bskul ba la brten nas lha'i btsun pa su ma ti ma ni pra dzny'as sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa dang 'gro kun bde chen dpal la rol bar gyur cig  dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6469</vol>
<tib>rta phyugs rgod ma'i 'bras mchod bsang chen bkra shis char 'bebs</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (ces sog yul du rgod ma'i 'bras mchod zhes byar grags shing snga m mchod pa ni bla ma dam pa rnams kyi mdzad pa min ching gis rgyal po'i rgyal phran blon po rnams rang rang gis chu ming gi 'jug cing rang rang gis bsam bzhin bya ba yin de'i go rim la sangs rgyas thams cad nas lha klu sa bdag sogs sngon du 'jug pa ni tshul min pa'i phyir sems phan thogs pa'i bsam ste blo bzang ming can gyis sbyar ba'o bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling rgyan du byon dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6469</vol>
<tib>sgrol ma'i mandal bzhi ba'i cho ga phan bde'i dpal ster</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * (ces rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i thugs rje bskul ba'i cho ga brjod bya'i don ma lus par tshang zhing mdor bsdus tshogs 'don du byas mchog pa zhig dgos zhes rdo rje slob dpon rab 'byams pa rgya mtsho dger bskos rab 'byams pa thub bstan phyogs glagn bcas nas bskul ma byung ba ltar dam pa gong ma rnams kyi phyag srol nyams pa med par rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gyi tshul du rgyal sras bskal bzang thub bstan 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis kun la phan pa'i bsam pas dang du blangs te bris pa'i yi ge pa ni rab brtan ming can gyis bgyis pa'o bkra shis dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * (ces bcom ldan 'das tshe lha rnam gsum la brten nas tshe sgrub bya tshul 'chi med rdo rje'i srog shing zhes bya ba 'di yang don gnyer can te gnyis la'ang phan par bsam nas yi dpal ming can gyi gser gyi sge rags zhes pa'i char yi ger 'du bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang sems can thams cad 'chi med rdo rje'i sku 'thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig  legs so</col>

<item>

<item>
