<tib>sku gsung thugs rten rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga 'bring po'i lag len gsal bar bkod pa bkra shis 'phel rgyas zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-65a</p>
<col>@064b (ces sku gsung thugs rten rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga 'bring po'i lag len gsal bar bkod pa bkra shis 'phel rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi bsti gnas sgrub sde yid dga' chos 'dzin 'phel rgyas gling gi bla ma gnas brtan pa dang dbu mdzad mchod dpon sogs chog rogs pa rnams nas lag len gsal ba'i chog bsgrigs bklag chog ma zhig dgos tshul byung bar brten deng sang phyogs 'dir gtsug lag khang dang sku gsung thugs kyi rten che chung bzhengs mkhan mang na'ang @065a * 'byor ba mtho dman su yin kyang rab gnas kyi cho ga mdor bsdus tsam zhig las rgyas 'bring gi cho ga don du gnyer zhing lag len byed mkhan dkon par snang bas cho ga'i lag len nag 'gros ma 'di lta bu byung na rgyud sde nas gsungs pa'i cho g khyad par can gyi rgyun rnam par dag pa mi nyams pa'i rkyen du 'gyur bar re nas rang phyogs kyi dam pa gong ma rnams kyis mdzad pa'i rab gnas kyi cho ga rgyas bsdus dang phyag len gyi yig cha du ma'i snying po dang legs cha bsdus te shin tu 'jug bde'i tshul du ^ bla ma dam pa du ma'i bka' drin gyis nye bar 'tsho zhing ^ 'jam dbyangs gong ma'i lung gis chos rjer 'bod pa'i ban rgan ^ dam tshig rdo rjes bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa n shes ldan dbang po gsol dpon dge slong bstan 'dzin bzang pos spro bzhin du bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang bkra shis dge legs rgya cher 'phel te rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nus par gyur cig  dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6471</vol>
<tib>ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma seng ge gdong pa can gyi bskang gso'i lhan thabs reg gzigs tu bkod pa 'phrin las dngos grub kun gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba tshogs mchod 'khyer bde dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-14a</p>
<col>@013b (zhes ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma seng ge gdong pa can gyi bskang gso'i lhan thabs reg gzig tu 'god pa 'phrin las dngos grub kun gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba 'di ni ma gcig mkha' 'gro de nyid rang gi dgon pa dga' ldan phun tshogs dge 'phel rnam par rgyal ba'i gling gi bsrung mar mnga' gsol ba'i tshe dus gtor sogs kyi skabs su nye bar mkho bar bsam nas bris 'dun yod pa'i thog rang gi gam du gnas pa'i dgon gnyeer dge slong grags pa don grub kyis lha rdzas dri med dang bcas 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ma byung bar rten dpal ldan sgo mang grwa tshang gi 'don cha dang phyag len la gzhi byas bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gsung gis brgyan te ^ btsun gzugs ye shes don gnyis @014a * lhun grub kyis rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i me yos lo'i gro bzhin zla mar ngo'i tshes brgyad la bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni bskul ba po nyid kyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che 'di nyid mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan mi 'gyur ba'i ga-yung drung mi shigs pa'i rdo rjer gyur cig  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6471</vol>
<tib>ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong pa can gyi sgo nas bzlog bsgyur bya tshul rdo rje thog mda' zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@008b (ces ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sengge'i gdong pa can gyi sgo nas bzlog bsgyur bya tshul rdo rje'i thog mda' zhes bya ba 'di ni bdag gi yongs 'dzin dam pa lha 'di nyid la thugs dam mdzad pa'i hur tsha pi lig thu bla ma rin po ches 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bka' stsal pa @009a * bzlog par mi nus par dang du blangs te 'di skor gyi man ngag cung zadd thob pa'i btsun gzugs ^ ye shes don gnyis lhun grub kys 'di nyid kyi gtor bzlog sogs la gzhi byas bla ma'i man ngag gis brgyan te rnga chen ces pa chu pho khyi lo'i dpo zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis stobs ldan sbyor ba'i nyin mgyogs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni nye gnas tshe ring rdo rje grags so mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6471</vol>
<tib>ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sengge'i gdong pa can gtso 'khor gsum ma'i sgrub thabs spu gri 'bar ba'i khrul 'khor zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9b</p>
<col>@009a * (zhes rje btsun chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa nas brgyud pa'i seng gdong ma gtso 'khor gsum gyi sgrub thabs spu gri 'bar ba'i khrul 'khor zhes bya ba 'di ni deng sang rang phyogs pa 'ga' zhig gis rje bla ma'i thun monh ma yin pa 'di 'dra yod bzhin du de las zab pa'i seng gdong ma'i man ngag zhig gzhan du yod snyam pas gzhan phyogs kyi man ngag zab zab @009b mor btab pa'i shog 'khyer re gnyis la khyi dang glo ba 'phrad pa bzhin 'jug pa mthong zhing rje bla ma'i man ngag 'di la yang glongs bshags bsun bzlog tshogs brgya me mchod sogs rnying lugs kyi rgyas 'ge bas sna tshogs pas sleng bar byed pa 'ga' zhig kyang mthong nas rang lugs gtsang sing nge ba'i yig cha zhig 'bri 'dun thog nye char bla brang bkra shis 'od 'bar du pha rol gyi bsam sbyor ngan pa'i mthu byad sogs kyi lhas mtshan byung ba bzlog pa'i ched du seng gdong ma dang cha lugs khro rgyal gtsug tor 'bar ba gnyis kyis gtso bo'i phyir bzlog gi sgrub pa khag 'ga' zhig 'dzug 'dun skabs bklag chog 'di lta bu nyer 'khor 'dug tshul 'ga' zhig gi mol brten nas btsun gzugs ^ dharma badzra gyis rje lcang skya gong ma dang rgyal dbang skal bzang rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i seng gdong ma gtso rkyang gi sgrub thabs dang rdo rje 'dzin pa chos rje rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i gtso 'khor gsum ma'i sgrub thabs rnams gong 'og bsgrigs te gzhis ka ao rgyan gling du mgyogs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang don grub po mangga lam</col>

<item>

<tib>rje btsun ma ku ru kulle gsang sgrub lha lnga'i sgrub thabs khams dbang du sdud pa'i ye shes lcags kyu zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007a * (rje btsun ma ku ru kulle gsang sgrub lha lnga sgrub thabs khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i ye shes lcags kyu zhes bya ba 'di ni @007b hal ha ga-yon du nas ^ rgyal dbang yab sras sa pan sku mched sogs mkhas grub mang po'i zhabs la gdugs nas zab chos kyi bka' drin mnos shing thub bstan rin po che'i zhabs 'digs la gcig tu brtson pas skyod mi'i dbang po yil ten rngan cung wang yang gsang dpal gyi thugs dam gsal 'debs su ^ zhwa ser cod pan 'dzin pa dga' ldan bstan pa'i gsal byed lcang lung aarya pandi tar grags pas gser 'phyang zhes pa me bya lo'i dbyar gyi dgal mdar la babs pa 'dod 'phel zla ba'i tshes brgyad kyi nyin rab zhi bde dga' tshal nas bris pa dge  sarba mangga lam bkra shis 'bar gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6475</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas gza' klu gtso ba'i sde brgyad kyi dug dbyung bya tshul gdung sel zla 'od zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-21a</p>
<col>@020b (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas gza' @021a * klu gtso bo'i sde brgyad kyi dug 'byung bya tshul gdung sel zla 'od zhes bya ba 'di ni snyigs dus kyi skye bo du ma la phan par mthong nas yig cha 'ra min 'ga' zhig snang yang gsang bdag sprul skus mdzad pa'i cho ga bsgrigs rdo rje'i snying po 'khyer bde bar 'dug pas 'di nyid sgra sor bzhag la lha sngags rta mgrin du kha bsgyur zhing tshigs 'ga' zhig ngag du 'don bde bar bcos te ku s'a li ^ dharma badzra gyis sdebs pa'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang kun dgas bgyis pa dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6475</vol>
<tib>ye shes mkha' 'gro seng gdong ma gtso 'khor gsum gyi bskang bshags zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@008a * (ces ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sengge'i gdong pa can la mchod gtor bskang rdzas sogs 'bul ba'i tshul mdor bsdus pa 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes cing gir rgyal po'i gser gyi gdung rgyud rigs 'byor phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa bstan pa'i sbyin bdag ^ gong ma rgyal po'i bka' aan panwang thu re'i da ae phu sogs yul gyi rgyal po kha gsum sogs kyi p'a ka thur hung thas ci zhes bkur ba'i sangs rgyas rdo rje yang dang yang du bkas bskul ba'i ngo mchog par ma zad nyid kyi dang ba sos su aer te ni pandi ta no mon han zhes 'bod pa'i sh'akya'i btsun pa dge slong 'jam dpal rdo rjes yar khral du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos tshul dum ma la rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge slong dpal 'byor bzang pos bgyis pa'o ) bkra shis mangga lam shu bham</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6476</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyi gtad rag smon lam shis brjod bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * (dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyud don gsal ba zhes bya ba sur rab mtha' dag la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa brnyes nas gdul bya mtha' yas pa la rang rang gi skal ba dang 'tsham par sngo snod gsum dang rgyud sde bzhi'i lam gyi gnad mtha' dag par 'doms shing rgyas par mdzad pa chos kyi rje rin po che blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyi zhal snga nas kyi gsung sgros ltar grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis ri bo dge ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du yi ger bkod pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6476</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas gshin po rjes 'dzin lho sgo'i cho ga'i ngag 'don</tib>

<col>@018b (gshin po'i ched du @019a * lho sgo'i cho ga tshul bzhin du byas na phan yon shin tu che bar dgongs nas dam pa gong ma mang po dkyil 'khor so so la brten pa'i lho sgo'i yig cha du ma mdzad kun rig gi lho sgo'i yig cha deng sang dang phyogs su dang che ba 'dul 'dzin gyis mdzad pa'i rgyud don gsal ba 'di nang bzhin las lhag pa ma mchis 'on kyang tshig bsdus par brten dgon pa che ge mo'i 'don rgyun yin zer ba'i tshig nyog mang du bcug pa la snying po med pas lho sgo'i ngag 'don 'di yang de nang du gsal ba rnams de gsod bzhag dang der mi gsal ba dang rgyas bsdus kyi khyad par rnams de'i t'ik chen dang bsdu na de gnyis su dngos su mi gsal yang don la dgongs par 'byor ba'i 'don rgyun rnams kyang khungs dang 'brel ba zhus dag byas ste ngag 'don gyi rim pa rnams bsgrigs bsam bya'i don dang phyag rgya 'ching tshul sogs rgyas par dgod na ngag 'don rnams 'thor nas blo dman rnams kyi don du mi 'gyur bar snang bas ma bgod kyang don la shin tu nas gal che bas rgyud gsal dang t'ik chen la gzigs nas thugs su chud par mdzod cig </col>
</item>

<item>

<p>11a-21a inc [*missing page from 14a-19b *]</p>
<col>@020b ces rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la mchod gtor 'bul ba'i rim pa lag tu blang bde bar brjod pa 'di ni gnas brtan sdom brtson dam pa blo gros rgya mtshos bskul ba'i ngor chos smra ba dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa'i yig cha gzhir byas med mi rung rnams kha ba gang ste chos 'khor rgyal gyi gtsug lag khang gi bka' gdams pho brang du nye bar sbyar ba 'dis kyang skye 'gro thams cad dbul phongs kyi sdug bsngal las thar bar gyur cig bkra shis) @021a * bee bdud dpung ga-yul las rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan dang 'dod dgu'i nor gyis mchog stsol ne'u le 'di rgyal chen rnam sras mnyes pa'i rten du 'bul rten las ma 'das 'bem las ma ga-yel bar  'phrin las rnam bzhi'i dngos grub char chen gsol gnas 'dir bshad sgrub dpal 'byor rgyas par mdzod (ces pa 'di ni dpon po che'i dbang chos jo mo rgyal mo'i bka'i bskul ba la brten nas sh'akya'i btsun pa bsod nams ye shes dbang pos pho brang chen po jo mo kha stag rtser sbyar ba'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@015a * (ces pa 'di yang slob ma rnams kyi zhe bdun ma'i bskor mgo'i lag len rnams kha dang lag pa sprad pa lta bur 'tshugs pa med cing zhal gsal ba zhig dang de dag gi 'grel pa gnad du dril ba'i rgyas bsdus 'tshams pa zhig rtsom dgos zhes nan gyis bskul ngor bgyis so dge'o</col>

<tib>no title [@001b aom swa sti sid dham dpa' bo gang zhig yid la dran tsam gyis bar chad mi mthun phyogs rnams kun sel cing phun tshogs dge legs bde legs rtsol mdzad pa'i bla ma mgon po nag po che la 'dud]"</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6479</vol>
<tib>bsnyen yig dngos grub rgya mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-23a</p>
<col>@022b ces @023a * bsnyen dngos grub rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi nye 'khor ba dka' bcu shes dar ba sogs du ma dang sngon goms legs sbyang kyi bag chags thug po sad cing skyebs thob pa dang sbyangs pa'i rnam dpyod mchog tu yangs rgyal dbang dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i gdan sa chen po rgyal me tog thang gi seng ge'i khrir 'khod pa'i mkhan po che ches pa bde thang sprul sku blo bzang rin chen tshangs dbyangs phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba dang nang rigs pa dang gso ba rig pa rnam dpyod yangs pa'i 'byams smra ba ngag dbang bstan 'dzin mdo sngags rab 'byams la sbyangs pa mi dman zhing rnam dpyod yangs pa'i rab 'byams smra ba bstan 'dzin grags pa skye bas thob pa'i blo gros kyi rtsal gsuns rab la lta ba'i mig dang ldan zhing don gnyer dad bcas pa'i dge slong chos rgya mtsho dang tshul khrims dpal bzang la sogs pa'i don gnyer can mang pos bskul ba'i ngor sbrang ban snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis mtsho bdun gyi lha khang chen mor sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod dang brtson pa mi dman pa'i dge slong grags pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  mangga lam dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6479</vol>
<tib>dgra lha mched dgu'i bskang bshags dkor rgyal byed zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10b</p>
<col>@010a * (ces dgra lha'i bskang gso dkar po rgyal byed ces pa 'di ni rang gi mched grogs rdo rje zhes bya bas 'di lta bu zhig gyis ces sngon na yod pa'i yig cha bskang gso ma mthong bas gu ru'i gtor ma dgra lha'i dbang bstod ces bya ba las bkod pa 'di ni sngags 'chang smon lam lhun grub kyis @010b sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rigs gnas skar rtsis pa'i sogs med la mkhas pa'i rnam dpyod can blo bzang mkhas mchog go  bkra shis 'bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6479</vol>
<tib>dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i phyi dkyil dang lus dkyil gnyis kyi dbang gi bla brgyud gsol 'debs byin rlabs char rgyun zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i phyi dkyil dang lus dkyil gnyis kyi dbang gi bla brgyud gsol ba 'debs byin rlabs char rgyun zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi yongs 'dzin dam pa blo bzang chos grub kyis bka' bskul ba ltar 'dod chags rdo rje ming can gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni 'du byed pa ni blo bzang dkon mchog go </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6479</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i dmar khrid brgyud 'debs dang zab lam rim pa dang po'i lam la khrid tshul yongs 'dzin bla ma'i gsung zin bris su bkod pa</tib>
<p>1a-30a</p>

<tib>'phags mchog rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i bskyed rim gyi rnam bshad dngos grub gter mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@026b (ces grub pa'i dbang phyug mi tra rdzogs ka'i thugs dam lhag pa'i lha mchog spyan ras gzigs rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i bskyed rim gyi rnam bshad dngos grub gter mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni lha mchog 'di nyid kyi bsnyen sgrub la gcig tu gzhol ba rong bo'i rgyud grwa'i byung 'dren zur ba sngags ram pa dge 'dun bsam 'grub dang nged kyi nye gnas tsho 'dru'i ri khrod pa ye shes dam chos gnyis nas lha rdzas bcas snga phyir du mar nan tan chen pos bskul ngo mchog par btsun gzugs 'chang ba blo bzang lung rigs rgya mtshos ^grub dbang skal ldan rgya mtshos pa'i 'di ga'i bskyed rim tshigs bcad mdor bsdus dang skyabs mgon khri chen rdo rje 'chang blo bzang rgyal mtshan seng ges mdzad pa'i bskyed rim gnyis la gzhi byas te dben gnas bkra shis chos rdzong du sbyar ba 'dis kyang mdo sngags kyi bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  @027a * 'phags mchog rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i bskyed rim 'di chos sbyin mi zad rgya cher spel slad du dad gtong khrims ldan mchod gnas sngags ram pa blo bzang rgya mtshos par du bskrun pa'i dges pha mas gtso byas mkha' mnyam 'gro ba kun phyag na padmos 'bral med rjes gzung ste rim gnyis lam gyi bgrod pa mthar phyin nas sku gsum gzhal med khang du phyin gyur cig sarba mangga lam)"</col>

<col>@010a * (ces rab gnas 'bring po'i cho ga bsgrigs bkra shis 'phel rgyas gzhir bzhag gi steng du cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad par rnams bsnan te rab gnas rgyas pa byed tshul gyi zur 'debs dge legs kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di yang rang gzhan gyi lag len 'jug pa bde bar mthong nas snyoms las pa ^ dam tshig rdo rjes bla ma'i gsung las bsdus te bris pa'o dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>

<vol>6481</vol>
<tib>'go ba'i lha lnga'i gsol mchod kyi cho ga tshe bsod dpal skyed ces bya ba</tib>

<col>@010b (ces 'go ba'i lha lnga'i gsol mchod kyi cho ga tshe bsod dpal bskyed ces bya ba 'di yang sngon byon gyi bla ma dam pa rnams kyis mdzad pa'i gsol mchod kyi cho ga rnams la gzhi byas te khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang kun mkhyen bla ma ^thu'u bkwan rin che dharma badzra gyi slob ma'i tha chu rig pa 'dzin pa ye dpal ming can gyis rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i dbang phyug ces pa me mo glang lo'i nag pa zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes bzang por sbyar ba 'dis kyang chos srid kyi bsam don thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6481</vol>
<tib>'go ba'i lha lnga'i gsol mchod phan bde'i 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007b (ces 'go ba'i lha lnga'i gsol mchod phan bde'i 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba 'di ni btsun gzugs blo bzang chos kyi nyi mas rang gi lha gsol gyi tshe mkho bar bsam nas rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung las btus te 'khyer bde bar dben gnas bde chen chos gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni ni gu khri dge slong blo bzang bzod pa'o dge'o sarba mangga lam bkra shis par gyur cig </col>

<col>@017b (zhes dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa 'jam dpal dgongs rgyan zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas khon gyi gdung 'dzin dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub pas dus 'khor lha lnga lta bu bsdus pa'i mngon rtogs gcig cis kyang dgos ces yang yang bskul ba dang 'phral du gling chos rje mgon po rnam rgyal bas nan gyis bskul ba la brten nas chos smra ba blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis bu ston thams cad mkhyen pas mdzad pa'i dus 'khor gyi sgrub thabs rnams dang kun mkhyen shes rab dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa grags pa rgyal mtshan pas mdzad pa'i lha lnga'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor ma'i mchod chog dang bcas pa dang mkhas grub thams cad mkhyen pas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs dang rje byams pa gling pas mdzad pa'i lhan skyes kyi sgrub thabs rnams phal cher mthun pa 'dug pa ltar zhib tu brtags nas sgrub thabs dpag bsam snyem dang pad dkar zhal lung gnyis kyi gnad bsdus rin chen snying po la gzhi byas nas bdag cag gi ston pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dus khyad par can la chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i gtsug lag khang du mgyogs par @018a * sbyar ba'o yang 'di nyid gzhir bzhag pa la gtso rgyang yab yum zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa lhan skyes dang yab zhal phyag yongs rdzogs kyi sgrub thabs rin chen snying po ji lta ba dpa' bo gcig pa dang 'di ji lta ba la 'dab ma'i lha mo brgyad bzhag pa lha lnga dang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po bzhag pa lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba lha dgu ste 'don cha'i bsgyur bkod cung zad tsam shes par bgyis pas bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bzhi tshang ba'i rnal 'byor phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing rgyud dang 'grel ba'i dgongs pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro zhes smras so</col>

<tib>ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sengge'i gdong can gyi sgo nas than bzlog gnam lcags 'khor lo dgra bsgyur sgrol byed ces bya ba bzhugs so  "</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@009a * (ces mkha' 'gro ma sengge'i gdong pa can gyi than bzlog drag po gnam lcags 'khor lo dgra bsgyur sgrol byed ces pa 'di ni lag len cho ga dril ba 'di ni dad pa dang gtong ba sogs dam pas bsngags pa'i yon tan mang pos brgyan pa'i ^ dge slong karma blo bzang sbyin pas bskul ngor sngon yi ge rnying pa tshol ba byang shes ni dam pa'i man ngag bzhin du ^ yo ga dzny'a na bha dras sbyar ba'i dge bas t'a ki mkha' spyod gnas su khrid par shog  dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6483</vol>
<tib>no title [@001b na mo a'a rya lo ke shwa ra ya phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rab 'byams zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa nge dag gi 'gro la chags pa kun tu chags pa'i snying rje rgya mtsho lta bur zab]"</tib>
<p>1b-5b</p>
<col>@005b (de ltar rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs rje'i rang gzugs 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs la bstod cing rje bskul ba'i gsol 'debs dang bcas pa ban bde'i char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni sh'akya'i dge slong chos smra ba blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>6484</vol>

<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@012b (ces chos skyong dregs pa lcam sring gdab las byed tshul dgra bgegs 'joms pa'i rdo rje thog mda' zhes bya ba 'di ni gso ba rig pa'i sgo nas gzhan la @013a * phan pa'i 'phrin las rgya cher tshang zhing dad brtson shes rab phul du byung ba'i sman pa tho'u dge slong tshe ring rdo rje nas yang yang du au tshugs nang ba'i ngo bsrung ba'i mched du mkhan chen bstan pa'i mnga' bdag skyabs mgon rdo rje 'chang ^ pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa yab sras kyi zhabs rdul spyi bor blangs te lha 'di nyid kyi rjes gnang man ngag thob pa'i btsun gzugs rab 'byams pa ngag gi dbang pos gong gsal dam pa du ma'i yig cha la yang yang dpyad khul byas te bshad sgrub bstan pa'i 'byung gnas khu re chen mor bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni tsha bo dbu mdzad dge slong yi dam skyabs so 'dis kyang rgyal bstan yun ring du gnas pa'i cha rkyen du gyur cig  sarba dza ga tam dge'o</col>

<col>@039b (ces 'phrin las blo mos gus shugs drag po'i bcol gtor chog 'di ni gur drag gi tshogs bzlas pa'i 'phro de ma thag tu bcug la bya tshogs zor ba'i skabs su gong gis sngags bzlas pa'i phr'o la gtor btang de nas gtang rang gi mchod bstod bzod gsol bya mgron gshegs so gsol byed dpa brten nam bris sku yod pa'i tshe de la nas btan bzhugs byed cing 'jig rten pa'i mgron bsgom pai ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal du bsdus ltar langs thun mtshang sam kyi rnal 'byor skyang zhing bsngo ba smon lam gyi bkra shis kyi mtha' brgyan pa sogs gter gsar gur drag gi las byang byed gtor chog 'dir ni rgyal dbang ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i las byang thog mda'i tshe dpal nas spyan drangs shing zhan kha bskong 'ga' zhig gter gsar nas blangs 'ga' zhig gsar du sgrigs pa'i gtor chog kun kyang mchod sprin rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni lam 'di'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa pad+ma rgyal po rtsal gyis sug bris su bgyis pa'o mangga lam</col>

<tib>rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la brten nas nor dang tshe dpal 'gugs shing bsgrub pa'i cho ga dgos 'dod gru char 'bebs pa'i chu 'dzin zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1b-4b</p>
<col>@004a * (zhes rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la brten nas nor dang tshe dpal 'gugs shing bsgrub pa'i cho ga dgos @004b 'dod gru char 'bebs pa'i chu 'dzin zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs rus kyi dpal mthon pos brjid pa'i jun dbang dkon mchog bkra shis kyis bskul ba ltar ^ sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis slob dpon 'gro bzang snying po'i dgongs pa bzhin sug bris su bgyis te bkod pa 'dis kyang 'gro ba'i dbul phongs thams cad sel bar gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6485</vol>
<tib>rje btsun n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bya tshul dngos grub 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@007b (ces rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bya tshul dngos grub 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba 'di ni sa skya pa'i bla ma rnams kyis mdzad pa'i yig cha mang po 'dug kyang rang de'i lugs @008a * srol gyi 'gros dang mthun pa zhig byung na lag tu blang bde ba 'dug pas ci'i kyang yi ger 'gong dgos zhes don gnyer ba du mas snga phyir yang yang bskul ba la brten nas 'jam mgon sa skya pa rjes 'brang dang bcas pa'i yig cha gang yod dang khyad par du gsang chen slob bshad pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan gyis mdzad pa'i mkha' spyod sgrub pa'i dga' ston gyi steng nas phyag len mdzad kyi na 'dug pas de nyid kyi dgongs don gtso bor bzung dgongs pa mi 'gal yang cho ga'i go rim dang tshig ris cung zad mi mthun pa rnams rje rgyal ba gnyis pa yab sras kyi bzhed pa dang mthun par bgyis te btsun gzugs blo bzang chos kyi nyi mas dben gnas bde chen chos gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su gu shr'i dge slong blo bzang bzod pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6485</vol>
<tib>slob dpon chen po pad+ma k'a ra'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i 'bum bsangs beed'urya'i sngon po bkra shis 'dod pa'i re skong zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-28b</p>
<col>@026b (ces 'bum bsangs beed'urya'i sngon po bkra shis 'dod pa'i re skongs 'di ni rje khri srong lde'u btsan rgyal po'i skabs su slob dpon chen pad+ma k'a ra'i @027a * zhabs kyis dpal bsam yas kyi gtsug lag khang bzhengs pa'i tshe lha srin lde brgyad la sogs pa nag phyogs pa rnams kyi 'dul ba'i ched du mdzad pa de'i rjes su gangs can bod kyi sa la nad rims dang dal yams sad ser btsa' mu ge than pa la sogs pa byung ba'i dus su de dag thams kyi zhi bar byed pa'i thabs 'di shin tu mchog go zer sngags 'chang pad dkar 'dzin pas gong bzhin mdzad pa de'i rjes su snyigs ma lnga bdo'i dus su lha 'dre mi gsum 'khon 'dzin 'thab rtsod kyis sa phyogs yul khams thams cad la char chu dus su mi 'bab pa dang lo phyogs ma legs pa dang rtsa shing chu gsum 'dzom med pa dang nad dang rims tshad la sogs pa ltas ngan pa mtshan ma gyur ba la btsun pa 'jam dbyangs dga' ba'i blo gros kyi lar klungs kyi stod la 'di dag gis zhi bar byed pa'i thabs 'di mchog go snyam pa'i lhan thabs su mdzad pa'i cho ga bzhin du phyogs phyogs su 'bum bsangs @027b 'di btang ma thag tu bkra shis pa'i dge ltas mang du byung ba la mi la sogs pa 'gro ba rnams kyi dbul phongs kyi sdug bsngal sel ba dang phan pa rgya chen po'i bde skyid ldan tshe srog dbang thang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ro smras pa 'jam dbyangs mgrin 'khyud mkhas pa'i dbang brtse chen phyag na bad dkar tshul mthu stobs gsang bdag nus pa yis rigs gsum kun 'dus drin can rje mtshungs med slob bzang grags pa la 'bral med rtag tu spyi bos mchod bskal bar bsdus pa dge chung zad tshe 'di'i rnam par ma 'bad na tshe rabs grangs pa'i lan chags ni nag phyogs gdon bgegs 'byung po rnams lha srin sde brgyad 'tshe ba las skyabs gcig bla ma yi dam lha dkon mchog rin chen rnam gsum nges khyad par @028a * myur du brts don grub bstan bsrung chos skyong 'khor tshogs yin mi phyed dad pa'i mos gus bya phun tshogs dus bzang zla re la yar ngo'i nyin 'phrod gza' skar dag lha yi 'bum bsangs 'di dag gi rgyun du byas par phan yon ni nad dang gdon rnams thams cad dag rims tshad dal yams med pa yi dgra dang chom rkun ci spyang sogs stobs kyis 'phrog rnams bzlog par 'gyur tshe ring nad med bde skyid ldan chos srid rgyun du 'grub pa dang nor dang longs spyod 'phel ba yin bkra shis dge mtshan rgyas par 'gyur spel mi bar gyi sbyin bdag ni bya rigs dbang phyug gis thub bstan lang tsho bdo pa'i thang chos grwa dbyangs chen dag tu sgrub yi ge'i rig byed la mkhas pa sgra rigs dbang phyugs grags pas bris brkos mkhan rnam @028b dpyod rgyas pa ni sum pa bstan 'dzin zhes bya bas sor mos zlos gar bsgyur las sgrub dge 'dis 'jig rten khams kun tu phan bde'i lo bdab rgyas pa dang bdag dang mkha' mnyam sems can gyi mi mthun phyogs rnams rgyal gyur cig  (bkra shis par gyur cig  dge'o</col>
</item>

<tib>dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo</tib>
<p>1a-224a</p>
<col>@223b bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas byon te rin po che'i shing ljon pa ngag gi drung na seng ge'i khri la zhugs pa de dag dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i @224a * byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag dang spyod pa khyad par can la sogs pa sa rum nas 'thon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang 'khor bzhi po de dag dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thugs yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do 'phags pa dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las yongs su gtang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o gang na mdo sde 'di yod par me ma mur gyi dad 'bogs shing spu gri gtams las 'jogs nas kyang rigs kyi bu dag 'gro bar bya  'phags pa dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sde byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sba pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gcig tu 'dus pa thabs mkhas pa chen po theg pa gcig tu bstan pa don dam pa bsgrub pa bstan pa'i mdo rdzogs so  rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo dhi dang zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba bande sna rnam ye shes sdes bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa "</col>
</item>

<tib>sman bla bde gshegs bdun gyi mdo chog la brten pa'i 'chi bslu ba'i cho ga zla ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (ces sman bla bde gshegs bdun gyi mdo chog la brten pa'i 'chi bslu ba'i cho ga zla ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba 'di ni bla ma dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan mthong ba'i sgo nas dad pa thob pa dang shes rab brtson 'grus sogs yon tan du mas brgyan pa'i dge bshes slob dpon blo bzang phyag rdor gyis yang yang bskul ba la brten nas dam pa rnams kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos brten pa btsun gzugs aa mo gha badzra gyis mdo sde brgyad brgya pa la gzhir byas nas mkhan chen zhi ba 'tsho'i mdo chog sogs dam pa rnams kyi man ngag gis brgyan te rgyal po zhes bya ba shing rta'i lo'i lnga mchod dus bzang gi nyin rdzogs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad pa dang shes rab phun sum tshogs pa'i rtsis mkhan pa dge tshul blo bzang gzungs sgrub kyis bgyis pa'o bkra shis 'bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6491</vol>
<tib>'go ba'i lha lnga'i tshogs mchod dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>3a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (zhes 'go ba'i lha lnga'i tshogs mchod dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni hal kwa che sengges bskul ba'i ngor pandi ta ming can mkhan po bka' chen blo bzang phun tshogs kyis dga' ldan dge rgyas gling du sbyar ba'o mangga lam bawantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<tib>mtsher sa sogs kyi gzhi bdag mchod pa'i tshul</tib>

<col>@004a * ('di ni rje btsun bshad sgrub pa'i gsungs las btus shing bcos bsgyur cung zad byas te bris so 'di ni tsha hor dge bshes blo bzang tshul khrims kyis gsungs thor las byung ngo mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6491</vol>
<tib>'phags pa bkra shis brtsegs pa'i sgo nas ga-yang 'gugs pa'i chog bkra shis kun bsdus ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@006b (zhes dang brtson ltag bsam dge ba'i slob dpon gung pi lig thu zhes pas bskul ba'i ngor ^btsun gzugs sh'a sa na di bam zhes bya bas sbyar ba'i dge bas bstan pa rang 'gro ba mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig chog de yang mdo rang nydi las @007a * 'di ji ltar las cho ga dang ldan par bgyi de'i cho ga ni ji ltar bgyi zhes pas ga-yang 'gugs pa'i cho ga de 'dra zhig byar rung ngam snyam 'ong kyang dpyad par bya'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6491</vol>
<tib>phyugs kyi gnod bar chad god kha rgyun mi chad du 'byung ba sri mnan byed bcos thabs bzhugs so  * dpal phyag na rdo rje sgo nas gang phyugs kyi nu ma 'o ma la nyes 'byung ba nag po lag tu mo 'dre nas byung ba te bzlog bcos thabs ni  * bse rag brngan thabs kyi bcos thabs bzhugs so  * phyugs kyi gnod bar chad god kha rgyun mi chad du 'byung ba sri mnan byed bcos thabs ni "</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces pa 'di ni au rgyan pad+ma'i gsungs la snyigs ma'i dus 'byung tshe sems can thams cad mi shes pa'i nad mang po 'gyur ba dang sri'i sogs byung ba'i phyir du phyugs kyi sri mnan 'di ltar mdzad par zhus pa'o aithi ga-yung drung zab: : </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6491</vol>
<tib>rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma mandal bzhi pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a* ('di ni jo bo rje'i phyag len snar thang brgya rtsa'i rgya mtsho 'jugs ngosg nas ji ltar 'byud pa bzhin phan du'i byams pa'i zin bris rags pa tsam 'phral der bkod pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6491</vol>
<tib>rje btsun ma phongs pa sel ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs dang ga-yang 'gugs pa'i cho ga 'dod dgu'i char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@012b (zhes rje btsun ma phongs pa sel ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs dang ga-yang 'gugs pa'i cho ga 'dod dgu'i char 'beb zhes bya ba 'di ni dad ldan dar han chos rje dge slong rgya mtsho dang ta'i ching phyag mdzad pa 'jam dbyangs shes rab aer khe pi li thu t'a bla ma blo bzang 'od zer aer ti ni tho yon slob dpon bde legs dpal chi hu la pi lig thu dge bsgos dge legs dar rgyas hur tsha pi lig @013a * thu dge bsgos 'jam dbyangs grags pa aer ti ni tho yon dge bshes gnyen ping thu tso rig thu tho yon nyer ba blo bzang legs bshad rnams kyis rin chen gnysi pa'i mandal lha rdzas dri med dang bcas ste 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ma 'byung ba la brten nas dam pa rnams kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos brten nas kun rdor ming can gyis rje btsun sgrol mas lta gcig jo bo rje la dngos su gnang ba'i gdams pa pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang cho kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i sgrol ma nyer gcig gi sgrub thabs las tshogs dngos grub rnam gnyis kyi dbang mdzod la gzhir byas nas dam pa'i man ngag gis brgyan te rnam 'gyur zhes pa lcags pho stag lo'i cho 'phrul dus chen gyi yar tshes bzang po la bde chen rab 'byams gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod dang ldan pa dkon mchog skyabs so 'dis kyang gnas skabs su 'gro ba kun gyi dbul ba'i sdug bsngal zhi nas dal 'byor longs spyod gong nas gong du 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang mthar thug rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang myur du 'thob par gyur cig sarba mangga lam dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6491</vol>
<tib>rta phyugs rgod ma'i 'bras mchod bkra shis char 'bebs ma</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * (ces sogs po yul du rgod ma'i 'bras mchod zhes bya bar grags shing 'o ma'i mchod ni bla ma yi dam rnams kyis mdza' yin ching gis rgyal po rgyal phran blon po rnams rang rang gis cha ming gi 'dug cing rang rang gi gsum bzhin bya ba yin de'i go rim la sangs rgyas thams cad nas lha klu sa bdag sogs sngon du 'jug pa ni tshul min yin pa'i phyir sems can la phan thog pa'i bsam ste blon min can gyis sbyar bdug dge legs 'phel bkra shis bar gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6491</vol>
<tib>sgrol ma'i mandal bzhi pa'i dge mtshan phywa ga-yang spel ba'i cho ga bya tshul dus ngan 'tsho ba'i lag cha zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@007b (zhes brjod cing me tog gi char 'bebs nas cho ga'i 'jug gi bya ba dkyus ltar bya'o de ltar na dge mtshan spel ba'i cho ga byas pa'i dgos pa ni bkra mi shis pa'i skyon sbyong ba'i ched du yin la de yang spyir mi shis pa'i rigs la sde @008a * 'khrugs byas pa'i sar yod pa'i 'bu srin yan chad ngan song du skye bar gsungs pa lta bu dang su zhig la dam nyams pa'i grib phog pa gtam 'dres pa zas zos pa rdzi phog pa tsam gyis tshe dpal dbang thang rgud pa dang bsrung ba skyobs mdzad pa'i 'das dang ma 'das lha bsrung ga-yel ba dngos grub mi 'grub pa nyams rtogs skye dga' lta bu dang rten rdzas dang zas nor sogs la bkra shis bkrag mdangs dang ro bcud nyams pa bgegs bzhugs pa dri mi zhib pa bro ba tshag sgra 'byung bar gsungs pa lta bu shin tu mang la de dag gi bkra mi shis pa skyon pa'i che ddu yi dam la'i dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod bya ba gzungs sngags bzla ba rab gnas sbyin sreg gtor ma'i rigs dang bsrung 'khor phyugs dpyad rdzas sngags la sogs pa bkra shis par bya ba'i thabs sgo du ma nas nan tan du gsungs pas deng sang yul dus kyi dbang gis skye 'gro mtha' dag gi bsod nams kyi mthu ha cang dman pa'i dus 'dir bya ba ni shin tu gal che zhing bye brag tu dge ba'i gnad tshang zhing bya sla ba dge spel ba'i cho ga bya tshul 'di'i yan lag tu byin rlabs 'bebs pa dngos grub zhu ba ga-yang 'gugs pa'i rim pa 'di dag kyang mdo rgyud kyi khungs dang 'brel zhing rang phyogs @008a * bla ma dam pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 'dod lha'i ci rigs pa'i sgo nas bkra shis par bya ba'i cho ga phyag pa zhes mdzad pa bzhin du snang bas rang bzo min la sgabs 'dir sgrol ma'i mandal bzhi pa'i cho ga dang 'brel tshe don la dmigs pa de'i gsol btab bya bar gsungs pas yul dus dang mthun par bkra shis par bya ba'i byin 'bebs dang ga-yang 'gugs lta bu'i skabs su 'bab pa'i 'dod don gsol ba ni shin tu 'brel che ste mandal bzhi byed dgos pa'i gtso bo ni mthar thug byang chub sgrub pa'i yan lag tu gnas skabs su bu tsha rigs brgyud dang nor longs spyod 'phel ba'i ched du phan yon kyi skabs nas gsal bar gsungs pa'i phyi ro smras pa phyi rol bya bral tshul chos kyang nang gi tshan ma ngan brdol bas mkhas blun kun gyi blta mor gsal khyim pa'i rang mdog 'di ming ci 'on kyang 'jig rten sgrub na'ang chos kyis bsgrub dam pa'i bzhed srol som nyi'i gnas la gtogs ma rabs so nam las bzhi'i khol bar nyams deng dus btsun pa'i grub po thal bar des des na ga-yo sgyur khram gsum gyis log 'tsho sgrub pa rkyangs bsrings te bka' gdams pha mes gter phyi nas 'di bzhin mdzod cig rjes 'brangs kyi zhes dge mtshan phywa ga-yang spel ba'i cho ga bya tshul dus ngan 'tsho ba'i lag cha zhes bya ba 'di yang @008a * rgyal khams myul ba'i sprang chung dge spyod pa ratna kirtis rang gi kun rtogs la shar ba ltarri mor spel ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod dang ldan pa dge slong blo bzang chos ldan gyis bgyis pas dge mtshan 'phel bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6491</vol>
<tib>` gnyan gyi zhi ba dkar po bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@005b (ces rgyal ba rig lnga'i zhi ba khro ba 'di au rgyan slob dpon chen po pad+ma sambha rin po che'i zhes gsungs par mdzad pa'o</col>

<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (dpal rba sgreng gi gdan par snga lor nas gang 'tshams yod rung cha tshang ba zhg mi 'dug pas ha lam 'di la ngos bas rgyu sbyar te 'phying dkar gtso bo 'khor bcas dang dur bdag yab yum gyi 'tshams gsang 'jug thogs bsgral pas kyang 'tshang tshams yig 'bum bsang gi lging zhig dgos zhes phyag mdzod pa zhabs drung du bskal bzang rgyal mtshan nas bskul ba'i ngor ^zhwa ser bstan pa'i gsal byed aa chi thu no mong hang blo bzang ye shes bstan pa rab rgyas kyis da 'di bzhin du sug bris su gyis pa'o bkra shis par gyur cig dza yantu: :)"</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6492</vol>
<tib># mkhan chen chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung 'bum las gtor che drug cu pa'i lag len ngag 'don bsal bar bkod pa gnam lcags spu gri shes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13b</p>
<col>@013a * (ces gtor chen drug cu pa'i lag len ngag 'don gsal bar bkod pa gnam lcags spu gri zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi rdo rje slob ma gsum rab la blo gros kyi mig phye ba gus ldan gyi dag slong bzang rab brtan dang dge slong grags pa rgyal mtshan sogskyis bskul ba'i ngo mchog bar zha lu pa'i rtsa tshig dang pan chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa'i mtshon cha 'bar ba'i 'khrul 'khor gzhir byas de'i lag len bkra shis lhul po'i gsang sngags rgyal ba gr'a tshang du mdzad par bsdun nas khyad par du yang don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te rdo rje 'chang chen po khyab bdag 'khor lo'i bdag po dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dpal @013b bzang po'i zhal gyi bdud rtsi las byung ba'i man ngag rnams kysi brgyan cing phan chen rdo rje 'chang chen po dang rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa lnga pa sogs yongs 'dzin dam pa mang po'i zhabs pad bsten cing zhal gyi bdud rtsi myong ba'i jid gir lha'i btsun pa blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan zhes bgyis pas rang lo re gnyis pa rnam gnon lcags pho 'brug gi zla ba bcu gnyis pa'i tshes bco lnga skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par rdzogs par bgyis pa'i yi ge pa blo ldan ) mangga lam"</col>

<tib>bstan pa'i 'jug sgo skyabs 'gro'i khrid dmigs skal bzang re skong zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@029a * (ces bla ma dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i khrid dmigs skal bzang re skong zhes bya ba ste 'di ni ku shri bstan 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i rigs rgyud bu'i be'i zhes bya ba'i dge bsnyen mas 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes yang yang bskul ba la brten nas srad rgyud rdo rje 'chang dkon mchog yar 'phel yab sras lnga'i nang tshan dpal ldan zla ba grags pa'i sprul pa'i sku bka' drin gsum ldan kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i dngos kyi slob ma sgo mang bla zur sudw'i: lakshim zhes bya bas lung rigs kyi spros pa rnams dor te lag tu len pa'i khrid dmigs tsam gsal bar bkod pa'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul rin chen bzang ba'o dge legs 'phel bar 'gyur cig sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>

<tib>glud gtor cho ga kun phan 'dod 'jo ba zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@007a * glud gtor lugs kyi cho ga 'dra min mang du 'dug kyang pha dam pa'i lugs 'di khungs btsun par mthong nas cho ga'i tshig rnams kyang bsgyur bkod ma byas par grub chen gyi gsung byin rlabs can nyid rang sor bzhag ste lhan thabs cung zad sbyar nas lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa kun phan 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba 'di ni don gnyer can du mas bskul te ^dharma badzra gyis sdebs pa'o dge'o "</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@003a * (rta mgrin gsangsgrub kyi sgo nas grib sel bya tshul nor bu ke ta ka zhes bya ba 'di ni don gnyer pa 'ga' zhig gis 'di lta bu zhig dgos bskul bar brten mkha' 'gro sgrub thabs dang 'brel ba'i grib sel gyi gdams pa rnams rta mgrin la mi bgrigs bzhin du nan gyis sbyor bar dgos pa ma mchis shing sngar bkod pa'i gdams pa 'di nyidam gang la'ang sbyar chog pas rta mgrin gyi le lag tu blang bar 'gal ba @003b med par bsam nas btsun gzugs dharma badzra gyisbha ta'i sa'i char sgar thog tu sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6492</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas lo bskor bcu gnyis kyi bar chad sel zhing 'dod don sgrub thabs gzhan phan bdud rtsi ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@009a * (ces lo bskor bcu gnyis la rten pa'i bar chad sel zhing 'dod don 'grub thabs gzhan phan bdud rtsi ces bya ba 'di ni sngags pa pad+ma rgyal pos rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas lo keg sogs zlog thabs khungs dang ldan pa zhig ci'i kyang dgos zhes yang yang nan gyis bskul ngor rgyal khams pa ^dharma badzra gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su dge slong blo bzang kun dga'o zhus dag </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6492</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas rgyal rdzongs bya tshul gnod 'tshe kun sel zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@008a * (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas rgyal rdzongs bya tshul gnod 'tshe kun sel zhes bya ba 'di ni sngar bkod pa de 'don cha nyung drag yid tshim pa zhig mi yong ba 'dug pas rgyas tsam zhig 'god thub na legs pa 'dug zhes 'ga' zhig gis bskul ba dang dus 'dir rgyal gdon shin tu sngang bas rang gzhan gyi rkyen sel sogs la nye bar mkho ba'i bsam pas ^dharma badzra gyis skyed tshal yid dga' chos 'phel du ja sbyor gcig gi yun la grub par sbyar te dge slong blo bzang kun dga'i sor mo'i 'du byed glog ltar bsgyur bas bris pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6492</vol>
<tib>sde brgyad gser skyems bsdus pa ni "</tib>
<p>1b-1b</p>
<col>@001b (sde brgyad gser skyems bsdus pa rje btsun dam pa blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtsho'i sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6492</vol>
<tib>sh'akya btsun pa blo bzang 'phrin las kyi dag rnams phyogs su bsgrigs pa las sh'akya'i rgyal po'i sgrub thabs</tib>

<col>@004b (ces pa 'di ni lung rtogs kyi yon tan nor bus thugs kyi chu gter yongs chu gter yongs su gtams pa'i aa mo ko lang zhabs drung rin po che'i zhal 'don du 'dza ya pandi ta blo bzang 'phrin las kyis sug bris su bgyis pa'o 'dis kyag rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig</col>

<item>

<vol>6492</vol>

<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa rngams pa'i 'brug sgra zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>5a-6a</p>
<col>@005b (ces dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa rngams pa'i 'brug sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni sa'i steng na mtshungs pa'i zla thams cad dang bral ba gsang sngags rgyud pa grwa tshang gi rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'dus sde chen po'i thugs dam rten du ^dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed @006a * chen po'i sku zhig lcags gsum las bzhengs te phul skabs sngags pa mchod dpon pa dka' bcu blo bzang sbyin pas de'i bstod pa 'di ltabu zhig dgos zhes bskul bas mtshams sbyar zhing ^rang nyid kyang mos pa chen pos bskul te 'gro bas mthong na ngo mtshar 'gyur zhes pa yan chad dgra nag gi rgyud dang ^chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i gsung rin chen 'bar ba sor bzhag cing mjug tu smon tshig gsar bsgrigs dang bcas te ^gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pa sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis sbyar ba don 'grub</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6494</vol>
<tib>dpal ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong ba can gtso 'khor gsum gyi bdag mdun bskang bshags bstod bskul bsgral las gtor bzlog dang bcas pa'i rnam bzhag mkha' 'gro'i dgongs rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-16b</p>
<col>@016b (ces dpal ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong ba can gyi bdag mdun bskang bshags bstod bskul zor las dang bcas pa'i rnam bzhag mkha' 'gro'i dgongs brgyan zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhung lugs du ma la spobs pa mchog tu dge ba rab 'byams smra ba ngag dbang shes rab kyis bskul ngor btsun pa dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang pos ga-yar khral du sbyar ba dge bar gyur cig bkra shis 'bar gyur cig mangga lam dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@009b (zhes tshe dpag med 'chi med rnga sgra'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas 'chi ba bslu ba'i cho ga 'chi bdag ga-yul rgyal zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi nang slob chos la blo yi chu skyes kha phye ba'i dge slong grags pa rgyal mtshan pas nan cher bskul ba'i ngor dze ta ri'i rgya gzhung dang rdo rje 'chang pan chen thams cad mkhyen pas mdzad pa'i cho ga la bzhin byas bla ma'i gsung rgyun dang mkhas pa'i phyag bzhes rnam dag gis zur brgyan te rje khyab bdag dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i bka' drin gyis nye bar 'tsho ba'i jing ker lha'i btsun pa blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan gyis sug bris su bgyis pas 'gro ba thams cad dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba kun las grol te rnam 'dren tshe dpag med kyi sku myur du thob par gyur cig  shu bham</col>

<item>

<col>@001b (ces ril bu bdun bdun 'bul ba tshe snags bdun dang spel tshigs tshar gcig bya'o mjug tu bsngo ba smon lam bkra shis rnams bya'o za hor bande ngag dbang blo bzang tsho'i smras pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6503</vol>
<tib>rgyal po sku lnga'i gshegs gtor 'bul tshul</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006a * (ces sprul pa'i chos rgyal chen po la gshegs gtor 'bul tshul 'dod don kun grub ces bya ba 'di ni mdo sngags kyi gzhung la spyangs pa me dman zhig khyad par dgos sgrigs pas gzhan phan grub pa'i bsam pa can lha'i @006b btsun pa blo bzang bstan 'dzin gyis yang yang nan gyis bskul ba la brten nas sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos ldan gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bskul ba po nyid do)"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6503</vol>
<tib>yi dam mkha' 'gro chos bsrung spyi la sbyar rung ba'i bzlog chog mi mthun phyogs las rgyal ba'i ru mtshon zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@011a * (ces pa'ang yi dam mkha' 'gro chos bsrung spyi la sbyar rung ba'i bzlog chog mi mthun phyogs las rgyal ba'i ru mtshon zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan dang dad ldan dge slong blo bzang mkhas mchog sogs don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis yang yang bskul ba'i ngor btsun gzugs ratna sha shwa'i gyis ^rje 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa dang grub dbang tho kwan rin po che dang skyabs rje ngag dbang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan sogs kyi gsung las btus te bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni dge slong patu bris pa dza yantu</col>

<vol>6504</vol>
<tib>bsnyen bsgrub spyi la gces pa'i man ngag dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba'i dbu phyogs</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@011b (ces bsnyen bsgrub spyi la gces pa'i man ngag dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje chen po'i rnal 'byor pa brtson pa mdo sngags rab 'byams smra ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po dge slong blo bzang chos rgyal gyis yang yang gsol ba btab pa'i ngor bsnyen bsgrub spyi'i gnad ni phyogs tsam rigs cing phyogs med kyi rgyal khams @012a * nyul ba'i btsun pa bya btang mnga ris pa blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan theg mchog mi 'gyur dbang gi sdes slob dpon chen po pad+ma thod sbreng rtsal gyis gsung las byung ba'i man ngag lta ba'i rthod phrang srid pa'i gter khyim bla ma dgongs 'dus rdo rje gtsug lag gi rgyud sogs dang rgyal ba rtsod kha pa chen po'i sngags rim chen mo la gzhi byas khyad par du yang dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i zhal nas byung ba'i man ngag gis zur rgyan bla med bya rgyud kyi dgongs don khyad par pa rnams 'chan bus phye ste khams gsum chos kyi rgyal ba gnyis pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis zung 'jug mdon du mdzad pa'i gnas gangs khrod kyi rangs ri'i dbang po 'od de gung rgyal gyi lha zhol 'ol kha bsang sngags gling gi ri khrod du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bskul ba po nyid kyi bgyis so 'dis kyang bstan pa dang 'gro ba sems can thams cad la phan pa rgya chen po 'byur bar gyur cig sarba dza ga tam mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6505</vol>
<tib>dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dbang gi rnam bshad dgongs pa rab tu gsal ba'i 'od rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-72a</p>
<col>@071a * ces dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dbang bdun gyi rnam bshad dgongs pa rab tu gsal ba'i 'od rgyan zhes bya ba 'di yang mdo khams bstan pa'i sgron me brag ga-yab sprul ba'i sku rin po che dpal ldan bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po nas gsung na chen pos bka' gnang ba ma ldog pas dwang du blangs ste rang nyid kyi smon lam bzang po'i mtshams sbyor rtsam du skyabs mgon pad dkar 'chang ba blo bzang @071b bskal bzang rgya mtsho dpal bzang po dang snang mtha'i mgon po rje btsun blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes dpal bzang po rnam gnyis las lugs 'di'i dbang gi bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba'i dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor la mos blos spyod pa rgyal sras sprul sku bskal bzang thub bstan 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis ston pa sh'akya'i rgyal po'i bstan pa lo lnga stong gi gnas tshad gsungs pa'i 'bras bu dang bsgrub pa'i shes rab teng nge 'dzin gyi le'u rdzogs shing tshul khrims le'u steng nas lo brgya dang nyer gcig pa bstan pa lo nyisstong drug brgya dang nyi shu 'das shing nyer gcig pa'i dus 'di nas ma 'ongs rigs ldan drag po 'khor lo'i bstan pa'i snying po rdzogs ldan gsar ba'i dga' ston mngon du 'gyur ba la lo lnga brgya dang brgyad cu gya dgur nye ba rab byung bcu gsum pa'i sgang lo drug cu'i nang mtshan legs sbyar @072a * don gnyis pra bam ga stong 'drel bod yul skad du spre'u zhes pa mah'a tsi na'i skad du ting wu'i ljong 'dir dbang thang khams dang bstun pa me mo lug gi lo sa ga zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes bcu rdzogs pa gnyis par dga' ldan chos sdings nges gsang dar rgyas gling gi yang thog rang gi bsti gnas su rdzogs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rab brtan ming can gyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bstan pa'i nyi ma phyogs kun tu khyab pa'i rgyur gyur cig mangga lam dge'o"</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@009a * (ces pa 'di yang dad brtson dang ldan pa rab 'byams pa pa blo gros kun dga' bskul ba la gshin rje'i gshed kyi rnal 'byor ^'jam dbyangs bzhad pa dkon mchog yar 'phel sems can thams cad la gnod 'tshe 'chi bdud mang po'i 'gro ba'i tshe 'thung du myur ba las kyi don du mdzad pa'o yi ge pa ni phun tshogs rgyal mtshan no dge legs phun sum tshogs par gyur cig dge'o sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6506</vol>
<tib>'dod lha sna tshogs kyi sgrub thabs kyi mjug tu bya ba'i smon lam shis brjod sogs smon lam gyi skor bzhugs "</tib>

<item>

<tib>mandal bzhi pa'i cho ga dgos 'dod kun 'byung</tib>

<col>@004b zhes pa 'di ni bla ma byams pa'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'i jo bo rje'i phyag len snar thang brgya rtsa rgya mtsho'i 'jugs ngogs nas seng ldeng nags sgrol gyi sgo nas sgrol ma phyag 'tshal lnyer gcig gi mandal bzhi'i cho ga bar kab byas pa lta bu gzhing bzhag byas kyang 'di'i skong la thos pa shin tu nyung zhing chos la dbang za ba dang rang bzos slang ba lta bur bsam nas rna ba'i rgyab tu bskur kyang rang gi slob ma ngag dbang dar @005a * rgyas kysi yang yang nan cher bskul ba'i ngo mchog par gyi na ba sku skye blo gros ming can gyis chog bsgrigs dgos 'dod kun 'byung 'di sbyar bas nong ba'i cha rnams bla ma lha la gzod par gsol zhing legs chas 'gro kun bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal la longs spyod par gyur cig zhes pa'i yi ge pa ni tho yon ngag dbang brtson 'grus kyis so dge'o "</col>

<item>

<tib>'phags pa thugs rje chen po zhal bcu gcig pa dpal mo lugs kyi sgrub thabs smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa phan bde'i snang ba gsar dngos zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-30b</p>
<col>@030a * (ces 'phags pa thugs rje chen po zhal bcu gcig pa grub dbang dpal mo lugs kyi sgrub thabs smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga bya tshul dang bcas pa phan bde'i snang ba gsar dngos zhes bya ba 'di ni bstan @048a * pa'i gsal byed dza ya pandi ta hu thoug thu stag phu sprul sku blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan chos 'khor rgyal mkhan zur sku skye rab 'byams pa bskal bzang rab rgyas lha ldan spro bde kha r gsar ba'i dkar po phyogs brgyad pa spyi tshogs dang 'bras spungs sgo mang aor du su pa'i se rnam rgyal rdo rje'i shog dka' bcu klu sgrub rgya mtsho bde yangs @030b rab 'byams pa blo bzang nor bu sogs nas bskul ma rim par byung bar brten rtsom 'dun thog nye char khal kha nas stobs dang ldan pa khe ba'i aam pa pa'i se tshe mchog skyabs kyis bskul ma byung bar brten dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub dang grub brnyes dpal mos mdzad pa'i rgya gzhung sogs la gzhigs gtso cher phyag na padmo thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i sgrub thabsb 'jug pa bde bar brten dang so che bar 'dug pa de nydi gzhir bzung mkhas grub tshad ldan gzhan gyis mdzad pa'i cho ga dang dam pa'i phyag bzhes sogs nas kha 'gengs 'os kyis legs par brgyan te sh'akya'i dge slong chos smra ba blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi pho brang po ta la'i gzim chung nyi 'od 'khyil bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad khan dge slong skal bzang yon tan gyis bgyis pa'o</col>

<col>@047b (ces 'phags pa thugs rje chen po zhal bcu gcig pa grub dbang dpal mo lugs kyi sgrub thabs smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga bya tshul dang bcas pa phan bde'i snang ba gsar dngos zhes bya ba 'di ni bstan @048a * pa'i gsal byed dza ya pandi ta hu thoug thu stag phu sprul sku blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan chos 'khor rgyal mkhan zur sku skye rab 'byams pa bskal bzang rab rgyas lha ldan spro bde kha r gsar ba'i dkar po phyogs brgyad pa spyi tshogs dang 'bras spungs sgo mang aor du su pa'i se rnam rgyal rdo rje'i shog dka' bcu klu sgrub rgya mtsho bde yangs rab 'byams pa blo bzang nor bu sogs nas bskul ma rim par byung bar brten rtsom 'dun thog nye char khal kha nas stobs dang ldan pa khe ba'i aam pa pa'i se tshe mchog skyabs kyis bskul ma byung bar brten dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub dang grub brnyes dpal mos mdzad pa'i rgya gzhung sogs la gzhigs gtso cher phyag na padmo thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i sgrub thabsb 'jug pa bde @048b bar brten dang so che bar 'dug pa de nydi gzhir bzung mkhas grub tshad ldan gzhan gyis mdzad pa'i cho ga dang dam pa'i phyag bzhes sogs nas kha 'gengs 'os kyis legs par brgyan te sh'akya'i dge slong chos smra ba blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi pho brang po ta la'i gzim chung nyi 'od 'khyil bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad khan dge slong skal bzang yon tan gyis bgyis pa'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6507</vol>
<tib>seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma dang zhar byung sgrol ma nyer gcig gi sgrub thabs smyung gnas dang 'brel ba'i cho ga autpal sngon po'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-32a</p>
<col>@029a * (ces seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma nyer gcig gi sgrub thabs smyung gnas dang 'brel ba'i cho ga autpal sngon po'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di ni bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs dang bcas pa la mi phyed pa'i dad pa brtan po dang ldan zhing rang gzhan 'gro ba'i don du rgyal bstan yun ring gnas pa'i thabs la gcig tu brtson pa'i lhag bsam gyi sbobs pa dge ba can aer ti ni thon bla ma dge slong ngag dbang rgya mtshos nan tan chen pos bskul ba ltar rdo rje 'chang dbang dur smrig gar rol skuabs mgon dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin la sgrung chen nyi ma spas pa'i lugs kyi rje btsun nyer gcig gi dbang chen dang rjes gnad tshang re dza lugs sgrol ma neyr gcig gi rjes gnang tshad drug seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i rjes gnang bcu phrag pa rgal tsam @029b zhus rtsis dang las rung grangs bsnyen la yang bag chags bzhag khul gyi snyoms las mkhan dka' chen chos rje'i ming 'dzin blo bzang shes rab zhes pa zhig gis cho ga'i gzhug spyi rnams pan chen blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi gsung rnams gung bsgrigs kha bskongs rnams yongs 'dzin pandi ta ye shes rgayl mtshan gyi bya rgyud don gsal nas blangs sgrub thabs kyi khog bsgrigs pan chen rin po che'i spyan ras gzigs kyi smyung gnas cho ga dang sgo bstun mkhas grub dam pa gzhan gyi man ngag rnams la yang legs par brtags ste 'gal med 'khyer bde'i tshul du bris pa'o cho ga'i doon dang dmigs rim rnams gzhung dang man ngag chen po rnams las mkhyen par mdzod rjes su brnyed pa slob dpon bhaswa bha tas mdzad pa'i sgrol ma'i dkyil 'lhor la 'jug bzhes: ba ded ba lcis byug pa'i mandal gyi khar me tog gi tshom bu bkod ste sgrol ma 'khor bcas spyan drangs mchod bstod gyis nas snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas de nas gso sbyong blangs nas mjug bzod gsol bar gyi cho ga'i 'gro tshul rnams sman chog 'dra ba thig gi rgyas pa gcig dang slar yang bsdus pa sdoms tshig lta bu gcing sde rgyas bsdus gnyis gsung sgrol ma'i lha tshogs rnams kyang bla med rdo rje gur nas bshad pa'i rdo rje sgrol ma'i lha tshogs lta bu zhig 'dug pas des mang thos blo ldan chos kyi spyan mda' rnams ma gtogs @030a * bdag 'dra blo dman rnams kysi lag len byed dka' shes sngar bkod zin pa nyid gsang sngags spyi'i lam gyi rnam bzhag ston pa'i sngags rim chen po'i dgongs pa yin pas sor gnas bzhag 'dod pa yod na nyams len bgyis med tshe blo can sgro skud sbongs 'ga'g 'dod bsam ba bzang mdzod la chos spongs las la ma 'jug cig smyung gnas dang 'brel ba'i bsgrub thabs nyams su blang ba'i phan yon ni sgrol ma'i dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon bhawabhatas ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod cing smyung bar gnas pas bsgrub pa dang bstod pa lasogs pa byas na mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa yang das par byang bar 'gyur ro sku dngos su mthong ba la sogs pa'i yon tan mtha' med pa la sogs pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro dus ni yar ngo'i tshes brgyad yin no dkar gsum dang dus cung zad thung ba la sogs pa ci rigs pas kayng btub po</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@016b (ces rje btsun sen ldeng nags ky isgorl ma'i sgo nas klu'i gdon grol gyi cho ga ji ltar bya ba'i tshul gdud sel bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba 'di yang pha sbyor kho bo cag mdo sngags kyi chos tshul la sbyangs pa dman zhing goms 'di lta bris pa 'o sa su ma che ayng rang nyid chu ser gyi zug rngus mnar bar sgrol ma la brten pa'i gdon grol dgos tusl bla ma lha bsrung gi lung kha yar byung ba dang rang nyid kayng 'di ltar grub na phan pa che ba'i nges pa rnyed pa'i khar gam du bcar @017a * ba'i nye 'khor ba rnams nas kyang 'di lta bu zhig khyod rang nas cis nas kyang bris dgos zhes bskul ma byung bsam tshams sbyar gtso bor pan chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i sengge sgra la brten pa'i klu'i gdon grol gyi cho ga la gzhi byas dmigs gsal man ngag gi rigs rnams rje btsun ma nyid kyi gsung gi gnas pa ji ltar rtsal ba la rang bzos ma bsla par khrigs su sdebs pa 'di ni byang phygos nags shong kyi yul gru'i 'dren par rlom shing rje btsun ma 'di nyid yi dam gyi lhar ring nas snyan pa'i dge sbyong sha gzugs blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug gam ming gzhan gar gyi dbang por 'bod pa'i snyoms las gyi na ba zhig gis rang gi bsti gnas ri khrod dge 'phel byang chub gling gi gzims chung bde ldan nyi 'od 'khyil dus sprel hor zla gsum pa'i tshes lnga'i nyin legs par sbyar ba 'dis kyang 'gro ba ku la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig snod min log lta'i dbang mdzod can dag la ches shin tu gsang bar bya'o bkra shis dge'o)"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6508</vol>
<tib>ston pa thugs rje can gyi 'khrungs rabs so bzhi pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa theg chen chos kyi sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>14b-18a</p>
<col>@018a * (ces 'khrungs rab so bzhi pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa theg chen chos kyi sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di ni ^gangs ri'i mgon po'i sku mdun pa mchod dpon sde drug mkhan po bskal bzang rnam rgyal gyis 'khrungs rab so bzhi pa'i snying po bsdus te ston pa thugs rje can de nyid la bka' drin dran pa'i sgo nas gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul rgyun tu kha ton du byas chog pa 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba la brten nas ston pa thugs rje can de'i rjes su bzhugs te chos smra ba dge slong yes shes rgyal mtshan gyis gru 'dzin gnyis pa'i gzhal med khang gi gzim chung bde ba can du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6508</vol>
<tib>tshul khrims yang dag par bsrung ba'i man ngag ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-19a</p>
<col>@019a * (ces pa'ang nub gling pa dge slong 'jig byed bzang pos ^pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa chen pos mdzad pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par bsrung ba'i man ngag par du brkos pa'i kha byang du bskul ba ltar gcig tu ma nges pa'i ya ma zung gi rnam thar 'dzin pa'i rgyal khams pa mi bskyod dgyes pa bzhad pa'i rdo rjes sbyar ba'i dge ba la brten nas tshul khrims kyi spyan gyis spangs pa'i blo bzang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i 'dul ba'i brtan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  shu bha mastu parba dza ga tam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6509</vol>
<tib># dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgo nas gshin po'i rjes su 'dzin pa'i cho ga ngag 'don kun phan rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>3b-22b</p>
<col>@022a * (de ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgo nas gshin po rjes su 'dzin pa'i cho ga ngag 'don kun phan rgya mtsho zhes pa 'di yang khams phyogs su 'di nyid dar so che zhing bdag bskyed 'jigs byed la brten nas cho ga 'di nyid kun rig ltar sor gzhag mdzad pa shas che ba de ltar na kun rig tig chen nas rtogs sla ba'i dbang du mdzad de zhib par ma gsung kyang mkhas grub thams cad mkhyen pas de bzhin ma rung ba'i tshul rgyas par gsungs shing gzhan mkhas pa sngams 'jigs byed la sbyar nas mdzad pa'i khung btsun gyis dpem mthod la 'ga' zhig gis gang dran sna tshogs bris par yid brtan mchis pas cho ga dngos rje 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i gzhung don gsal bar gzhi byas bu ston rin po che dang yab sras kyi gsung rab rnams dang bstun phyag rdor 'khor lo chen po'i sgo nas gshin po'i rjes 'dzin gyis cho ga thar ba'i lam ston la rgyud sde so sor sbyor tshul rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pas @022b mtshan dkrol gnang ba rnams kyis dgongs don ltar lag len gsal byed logs su byas te pha bsa par rgyal rnga rngung ba'i dpe ltar ma adg pa ngo sor khyer ba rnams dang mi mthun kyang deng rang gi skar gyi ngag 'don 'khril chags mang du thos pa'i btsun bdag dbang dkon mchog nyi mas yul steng dgon gsar du sbyar ba 'di kyang 'gro ba la phan par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6510</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan 'dod khams dbang phyug dmag zor rgyal mo'i 'phrin las bzhi'i sbyin sreg gi chog dngos grub rin po che'i bang mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-19a</p>
<col>@018b (ces dpal ldan 'dod khams dbang phyug dmag zor rgyal mo'i 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i sbyin sreg gi chog dngos grub rin po che'i bang mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni gnas mchog bsod nams kun sdud gling du dpal ri bo dge ldan pa'i bstan pa bstan 'dzin dang bcas pa'i sku'i rim gror 'di'i las bzhi sbyin bsgrub dgos pa'i skabs du mar yig cha mang po la ltom mi dgos pa'i chig chog nag 'gros su bkod pa zhig dgos zhes rang gi tsha bo gu shri dge slong ye shes thogs med dang 'di ga'i byang 'dren grags pa rgyal mtshan sogs chog gra pa thun mong nas bskul bas mtshams sbyar ba la brten nas pan grub chen po slob dpon aabhya ka ra'i gsang ba spyi'i cho ga dang mnyam med btsong kha pa chen pos @019a * mdzad pa'i dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sbyin sreg dngos grub rgya mtsho gzhir bzung rgyal dbang yab sras dang rdo rje 'chang lcang skya rin po che'i legs bshad pa rnams kyis kha skang gzhan yang 'di skor gyi yig cha du ma la rtog 'jug byas shing bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis legs par brgyan te ^btsun pa ngag dbang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan nam rig pa 'dzin pa'i gzugs brnyan dam tshig rdo rjes dkar po zhes pas sprul me tog can gyis zla ba'i mar ngo'i rdzogs pa gnyis pa'i dus dge bar ^'jam dbyangs gong ma bdag po chen po'i gser gyi bka' lung gis dge 'phal gling zhes bsngags pa'i gtsug lag khang gi bla brang bkra shis bsam gtan pho brang du sbyar ba 'dis kyang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  sarba mangga lam dge legs 'phel dge'o</col>
</item>

<col>@012b (ces rje btsun sgrol ma la brten nas bu'i ga-yang dgugs bya tshul rin chen lcags kya zhes bya ba 'di ni dza ha chen gun thog tha pi thu dbul gyi manyal la tags dang bcas pas 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor bu 'dod pa ni bu thob byung 'di zhes pa gzhung yod pa'i phyir ael la gog sa hu thug thu mer gen pandi tas sbyar @013a * pa'i yi ge pa ni aer ta ni nom chi tho'i ku shi slob dpon blo bzang rgyal mchog pa'o 'di kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa dang 'gro ba rnams kyi nas skabs su dgos 'dod grub cing mthar thug sangs rgyas kyi go 'phong myur du thob par gyur cig bkra shis par gyur cig legs so mangga lam dge'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6516</vol>
<tib>chos skyong gi 'khu ldog zhi ba'i man ngag bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (ces chos skyong gi 'khu ldog zhi ba'i man ngag bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba 'di ni deng sang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i bla rigs sbyin bdag mang po zhig chos skyong bsten rgyu mang zhing bzang ngan gyi rnam rtog sna tshgos pa'i dbang gi rgud pa du ma 'byung ba seb thabs ston pa rnams kyis kyang yid brtan gang yang med pa'i brdzun tshig gis sbyin bdag bslu ba ltur blang ba la brten nas mchog dman du ma zhig mi shes pa'i mtshanmas mnar ba rnams la brtse ba'i bsam pas kun nas bslang ste rgyal khams pa lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rjes sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan chos rje thub bstan dar rgyas kyis bgyis pa bkra shis par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>

<p>1a-5b</p>

<item>

<tib>sngags kyi rtsa ltung dang spom po'i ltung ba ngos bzung ba'i sgo nas bshags pa byed tshul ni "</tib>

<col>@037b (ces sngags kyi rtsa ltung dang spom po'i ltung ba ngos bzung ba'i sgo nas bshags pa byed tshul go bde ba zhig gyis zhes chso la brtson pa dang rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge tshul dpal bzang sogs don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis yang yang bskul zhing rang gis kyang ltung ba ngos 'dzin gyi brjd byang dang skal mnyam gzhan @038a * la'ang phan par bsams nas ltung ba'i ngos 'dzin dang bshags pa byed tshul mkhas grub nor bzang rgay mtshos mdzad pa'i rtsa ltung rnam bshad dam tshig gsal sgron ltar byas te rgyal khams ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis mtsho bdun gyi lha khang chen mor sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bskul ba po dge tshul dpal bzang ngo 'dis kyang 'gro ba mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>

<vol>6519</vol>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6519</vol>
<tib>lha chen drag po gdong bzhi pa'i mngon rtogs bskang bshags bstod bskul dang bcas pa</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6528</vol>
<tib>slob dpon chen po pad+ma ka ra'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i 'bum bsangs beed'urya'i sngon po bkra shis 'dod pa'i re skong ma zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-35a</p>
<col>@033b (ces 'bum bsangs beed'urya'i sngon mo bkra shis 'dod pa'i re skong 'di ni rje khri srong lde'u btsan rgyal po'i skabs su slob dpon chen po pad+ma k'a ra'i zhabs kyis dpal bsam yas kyi btsug lag khang bzhengs pa'i tshe lha srin sde brgyad la sogs pa nag phyogs pa rnams kyi 'dul ba'i ched du mdzad du de'i rjes su gangs can bod kyi sa la nad rims dang dal yams sang ser btsa' mu ge than pa @034a * ma sogs pa byung ba'i dus su de dag thams cad kyi zhi bar byed pa'i thabs 'di shing du mchog go zer  bsngags 'chang pad dkar 'dzin pas yang gong bzhin mdzad pa de'i rjes snyigs ma lnga bdo'i dus su lha 'dre mi gsum 'khon 'dzin 'thab rtsod kyis sa phyogs yul khams thams cad la char chu dus su mi 'bab pa dang lo phyugs ma legs pa dang rtswa shing chu gsum 'dzom med pa dang nad dang rims tshad la sogs pa lhas ngan pa mtshan ma gyur ba labtsun pa 'jam dbyangs dga' ba'i blo gros kyi yar glungs kyi stod la 'di dag gis zhi bar byed pa'i thabs 'di mchog go snyam pa'i lhan thabs su mdzad pa'i cho ga bzhin du phyogs phyogs su 'bul bsangs 'di btang ma thag @034b rtsal bkra shis pa'i dge lhas mang du byung ba la mi la sogs pa 'gro ba rnams kyi dbul phongs kyi sdug bsngal sel ba dang phan pa rgya chen po'i bde skyid ldan pas tshe srog dbang thang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ro smras pa 'jam dbyangs mgrin 'khyud mkhas pa'i dbang brtse chen phyag na pad dkar tshul mthu stobs gsang bdag nus pa yis rigs gsum kun 'dus drin can rje mtshungs med blo bzang grags pa la 'bral med rtag tu spyi bos mchod bskal bar bsdus pa dge chung zad tshe 'di'i rnam par ma 'bad na tshe rabs grangs pa'i lan chags ni nag phyogs gdon pa bgegs 'byung po rnams lha srin sde brgyad 'tshe ba las skyabs gcig bla ma yi dam lha dkon mchog rin chen rnam gsum @035a * nges khyad par myur du brtse don grub bstan bsrung chos skyong 'khor tshogs yin mi phyed dad pa'i mos gus bya phun tshogs dus bzang zla re la yar ngo'i nyin 'phrod gza' skar dag lha yi 'bum bsangs 'di dag gi rgyun du byas par phan yon ni nad dang gdon rnams thams cad dag  rims tshad dal yams med pa yi dgra dang chom rkun ce spyang sogs stogs kyis 'phrod rnams bzlog par 'gyur tshe ring nad med bde skyid ldan chos srid rgyun du 'grub pa dang nor dang longs spyod 'phel ba yin bkra shis dge mtshan rgyas par 'gyur spel mi bar gyi sbyin bdag ni bya rigs chos kyis dbang phyug gis thub bstan lang tsho bdo ba'i thang chos grwa byams chen dag tu sgrub yi ge'i rig byed la mkhas @035b pa rigs dbang phyug grags pas bris brkos mkhan rnam dpyod rgyas pa ni sum pa bstan 'dzin zhes bya bas sor mos zlos gar bsgyur las sgrub dge 'dis 'jig rten khams kun tu phan bde lo 'dab rgyas pa dang bdag dang mkha' mnyam sems can gyi mi mthun phyogs rnams rgyal gyur cig  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<tib>mi dang phyugs kyi 'bru la bar chad byed pa'i bdud 'dre la glud bsngos nas tshim byed gzhan gsos bcud len zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6561</vol>
<tib>pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa khrag 'thung lha dgu'i bsnyen pa'i thog mtha' bar gsum gyi cho ga'i lag len dmigs rim dang bcas pa'i rnam bzhag dbang chen dgyes pa'i mchod sprin kun gsal me long zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-62a</p>
<col>@062b (ces pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa khrag 'thung lha dgu'i bsnyen pa'i thog mtha' bar gsum gyi cho ga'i lag len dmigs rim dang bcas pa'i rnam bzhag dbang chen dgyes pa'i mchod sprin kun gsal me long zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam dpyod yangs pa'i blo ldan sbyangs pa'i yon tan can rnams la 'kho mi che na'ang bdag dang bdag 'dra'i blo dman lugs 'dir bkab dkrugs thor bu'i tshul du yod pa rnams bsdu mi shes shing kun gzigs lnga ba chen po'i bsnyen yig @062a * rin chen dbang gi 'dod 'jo lag len sgrub chen dang 'brel ba sogs kyis go dka' ba bcas 'di 'dra zhig rang gi brjed thor bris na snyam pa'i thog rdo rje mched grogs 'gas kyang tshogs 'khor sogs la gong sa'i bskyed rim chen mor rnam bshad med pas rgyas par 'dri dgos tshul yang yang nan cher byung ba'i ngor snying dus 'dir bla ma rnams kyi mdzad spyod la au tshugs kyis dag snang sbyangs dgos pa'i skabs 'dir phyogs zhen tsam ma yin par mngon lkog med par ci mdzad tshul mthun bstan 'gro'i don kho na 'drar byed pa zhig los yin snyam pa bdag cag nang 'khor dred po mkhan rnams la'ang bcol min dang gis byung ba ^ nges par thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po yab rje blo bzang rgyal mtshan sengge dpal bzang po gang des rnam pa kun du 'tsho ba sh'a sa na dwa dzas gtso bor gang gi zhal rgyun dang lo chen bee ro'i sbas pa mig 'byed mus srad pa dpal ldan sengge'i sgom khog rin chen phreng ba bla chen gyi sgom khog chen mo sogs dang tshar chen rdo rje 'chang dang kun mkhyen lnga pa yab sras brgyud pa dang bcas pa'i gsungs rnams gzhir bzhag gsang sngags snga 'gyur gyi mkhas grub chen po rnams kyi gsung gi rigs mthun gyi rnam bshad sgom khog nas kyang kha bskangs te yig tshogs la ma 'dzems par nag 'gros su rab yid le lug hor zla bdun pa'i tshes bcur drang srong snyan dngags mkhan rgyu skar mdza' bo lha'i dga' ma dang rtse zhing phun tshogs sbyor ba'i nyin gyi snga dro bdud rtsi thun mtshams 'char ba'i dus su grub par sug bris su byas shing slar shog bu 'bebs pa po ni ri khrod pa blo bzang brtson 'grus kyis bgyis pa'i dge bas ma gyur 'gro ba kun pad+ma dbang gi rgyal pos rjes su bzungs te kha sbyor bde ba chen po'i sku thob par gyur cig dza yantu grub 'phral ^ gong la snyan 'bul zhus skabs dgyes pa'i 'dzum zhal bstan cing gzhan la spel ba'i bka' lung kyang bstsal da to</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6561</vol>
<tib>pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i las byang gi skabs su nye bar mkho ba'i sman rag gtor gsum byin rlabs kyi dmigs rnam yid la byed tshul gsal bar bkod pa dbang chen dgyes bskyed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@008a * (ces pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i las byang gi skabs su nye bar mkho ba sman rag gtor gsum byin rlabs kyi dmigs rnam yid la byed tshul dbang chen dgyes byed ces bya ba 'di ni bla ma gong ma dag gis las byang rnams su gsungs pa gab dkrugs che tsam snang bar brten dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las 'di skor gyi dbang dang gdams ngag mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa btsun gzugs ^dam tshig rdo rjes rang gzhan mang po la phan 'dod kyi bsam pas kun nas bslangs te 'di'i sgos rgyud du rgyas par ma gsungs kyang sman rag gtor gsum byin rlabs kyi shog dril lo chen be ro'i sbas pa mig 'byed sgom khog che chung sogs lugs 'di la tshad mar gyur pa'i mkhas grub dam pa rnams kyi gsung rnams gung bsgrigs rang gi bla ma'i man ngag gis kyang brgyan nas bris pa dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6561</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i 'phrin las dang 'brel bar skongs bshags bya tshul 'khyer bde rtsa gsum dgyes skongs dag byed bdud rtsi zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@014b (ces byin rlabs dang thugs rje'i gter chen bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i 'phrin las dang 'brel bar skongs bshags bya tshul gyi cho ga rtsa gsum dgyes skong dag byed bdud rtsi zhes bya ba 'di ni yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen rdo rje 'dzin pa mkhyen rab mtshan can sogs don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis cho ga sgrigs 'khyer bde ba zhig cis kyang dgos zhes nan tan chen pos bskul zhing rang gzhan mang po'i lag len du'ang phan par bsam nas skongs bshags kyi bka' gter @015a * tshad ldan du ma dang mkhas shing grub pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyi phyag bzhes la brten nas rgyas bsdus 'tsham zhing 'jug pa bde bar ^dge sbyong rig pa 'dzin pa dam tshig rdo rje lha ldan sprul pa'i gtsug lag khang gi nye 'dabs zhig tu bla ma lha la tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa dang bcas gsol ba btab ste legs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson dam tshig dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'i slob bu dge slong blo bzang nam mkha' rdo rje'o 'dis kyang bdag gi tshe 'di'i lus bskyed cing bskyangs pa'i drin can pha ma gnyis kyis gtso byas pa'i nam mkha'i mtha' khyab kyi ma rgan sems can thams cad myur ba nyid du sgrib gnyis byang zhing tshogs gnyis rdzogs te  kha sbyor yan lag bdun ldan zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6561</vol>
<tib>no title [@001b na mo gu ru tshul gsum bsgrub byed dkar ba'i mig 'byed gsal bar bkod na byas pa chos can sgram rtag par sgrub par byed pa'i rtags yang dag yin par thal sgra mi rtag par sgrub par byed pa'i tshul gsum yin pa'i phyir]"</tib>
<p>1b-8b</p>

<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i dmar khrid thams cad mkhyen par bgrod pa'i bde lam zhes bya ba</tib>

<tib>myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po phyag drug pa'i gtor chog bskang gso cha lag dang bcas pa</tib>

<col>@022b (myur mdzad mgon po 'khor dang bcas pa bsgrub cing dtor ma 'bul ba'i rgyud kyis rnal 'byor nyams su len tshul man ngag gis rnam par brgyan cing rgyud sde dang mi mthun pa'i log chos sa slad par ma hor mdor bsdus shing cha tshang bar bkod pa 'di ni mang du thos pa'i rje rje  'dzin pa dge legs dpal bzang pos gnod sbyin gangs mgul dben gnas rin chen 'bar ba'i sdebs su sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang bstan pa chen por phyogs bcur rgyas par gyur cig  dge'o</col>
</item>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6570</vol>
<tib>bla ma'i rnal 'byor dang 'brel ba'i byang chub lam rim gyi thun mong min pa'i 'khrid nyams su len pa'i cho ga bklags pas don grub dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-70b</p>
<col>@070a * (ces byang chub lam rim pa la brten pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor thun mong min pa nyams su len pa'i cho ga skal ldan mgul rgyan nor bu'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs rus dpal gyi mngon par mtho ba'i ching gis rgyal po'i gdung brgyud bla ma dkon mchog la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan zhing lugs gnyis la mkhyen pa'i spyan yangs pa gung ho lo che dar han hong tha'i ci 'phags pa skyabs kyis gtsos pa'i dza sag bcu bzhi'i bla grwa dpon ga-yog stong phrag du ma la slob dpon aarya ka ra dang grub chen mi tra'i lugs kyi rdo rje 'phreng ba'i dbang dang byang chub lam rim dmar 'khrid bde lam dang lam gtso rnam gsum bla ma mchod pa sogs kyi lung khrid 'bul bar byed pa'i dus su gus nyid kyis grwa tshang gi slob dpon pi lig thu dge slong ngag dbang dge 'dun aer te ni pi lig thu bla ma dge slong blo bzang rdo rje dge bsgos das chen pi lig thu thor dge @070b slong blo bzang dge legs aer te ni dbu mdzad dge slong blo bzang sangs rgyas dge bsgos das chen dar han nang so au rgyan ngag dbang aer te ni pi lig thu thon chos rgya mtsho sogs dang gzhan yang dge bshes dar han thon bla ma dge slong tshe ldan rdo rje aa chu thu dar han bla ma dge slong dar rgyas pi lig thu slob dpon bla ma dge slong blo bzang rab 'phel aer te ma pi lig thu slob dpon dge slong tshul khrims bla ma dge slong blo bzang don grub pi lig thu t'a bla ma dge slong bzang spyod nig tha pi lig thu bla ma dge slong shes rab shes dar dge dgos blo bzang rdo rje pi lig thu dar han nang so dge slong 'jigs med dge slong dkon mchog bkra shis dge bshes blo bzang tshe ldan sogs der tshogs pa'i gra rigs mang pos thugs 'dod bzhin la rang gi bsod nams gsog pa'i rgyur gyur ba'i rkyen gyis kyang nye bar bskul bas mtshams sbyar te yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag lcang skya rdo rje 'chang dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i dmigs rim mdor bsdus 'khyer bde'i steng nas bdag la dam pa de nyid kyi mchog sprul mkhas grub kun gyi gtsug rgyan rgyal ba gnyis pa la ring lugs pa chen po bka' drin nyams med drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma rdo rje 'chang ye shes bstan pa'i sgron me dpal bzang pos khrid gnang ba'i dus kyi snyan rgyud man ngag zhal shes la gzhi byas gzhan nas kyang kha skong dgos pa rnams kyis brgyan te yongs 'dzin dam pa chos bzhn spyod pa spyi dang khyad par thog mtha' bar gsum du bka' drin 'gran zla dang bral ba'i rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang blo bzang nor bu shes rab dpal bzang po yab sras kyi bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba dang byang phyogs bstan pa'i bdag po rje btsun dam pa blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i bka' 'bangs tha shal dge slong grags pa dar rgyas sam ming gzhan aer te ni jo bo'i bla ma khri pa nom chi chos rjer 'bod mas shing 'brug lo'i hor zla drug pa'i tshes bcu gsum la dge mtshan bcu ldan pur ge'i sa char dga' ldan gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod dang ldan pa dge slong dkon mchog bkra shis dang bsod nams dbang phyug gis bgyis so 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus kun tu 'phel bar gyur cig  ) mangga lam "</col>

<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi sgo nas gshin po rjes 'dzin byang chub bde ba can du drangs pa'i thugs rje'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@009b (zhes byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi sgo nas gshin po rjes 'dzin bya tshul bde ba can du drangs pa'i thugs rje'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba 'di ni bla ma dkon mchog gsum la dang dge legs rgya mtshos da lha don go rgyu ma byung kyang blo phugs lam rim la btad nas tshig tsam gyi sgo nas 'bad na skye ba phyi mar mkhas pa chen po 'ong des na rgyun du 'don pa dang nyan bshad gyis de tsug min na byed mkhan so so'i dge bar 'gyur gsungs pa rnams kyi don la yid ches pa'i sgo nas bstan pa la bya ba byed par 'gyur ba dang gzhan mang po la phan thogs par re ba'i bsam pas skye ser du ma dang tshig bgros nas de rnam dang lhan du lo re bzhin byang chub lam rim dang sems bskyed ston ma dang gsang bde 'jigs gsum dang skyes bu gsum gyi chos skyong rnam gsum rnams 'don par bya ba dang gcig shi tsa na lam rim gyi sgo nas gshin rjes 'dzin bya bar dam bca' nas de'i phyir du 'di lta bu zhig ces kyang dgos zhes nan cher bskul ba la rjes su yi rang gi bsam pas rje btsun bla ma dam pa lcang skya rdo rje 'chang gi man ngag zhal shes la zhes bya ba gzhan dam pa rnams kyi gsung rgyun l as byung ba ltar kha bskong te byang phyogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag rje btsun bla ma dam pa blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtsho'i sde chen po'i bka' 'bangs tha shal btsun gzugs grags pa dar rgyas kyis shing 'brug lo'i ston 'bring tshes bcu drug la aer te ni jo bo'i gtsug lag
