<tib>rje btsun byams pa mgon po la bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@002b (zhes rje btsun byams pa mgon po la bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni rgyal khams pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis chos grwa chen po'i skyer mo lung du sbyar ba dge legs su gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6578</vol>
<tib>thugs rje chen po bcu gcig zhal gyi sgrub thabs smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga bdag mdun bum gsum cha lag tshang ba bzhugs"</tib>
<p>1a-28b</p>
<col>@028a * (zhes thugs rje chen po bcu gcig zhal gyi sgrub thabs smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga cha lag tshang ba 'di ni lam 'di la snying nas mos shing sgrub pa snying por byed pa dwags po rab 'byams pa ngag dbang ye shes kyis rang nyid tshe mjug 'dir nyams len snying por bya ba dang ae dwags phyogs kyi don gnyer can gzhan mang po la'ang phan thugs rje chen po bcu gcig zhal gyi sgrub thabs bdag mdun bum gsum cha lag tshang ba 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes nan tan du bskul zhing dpal ldan smad rgyud gra tshang gi gra rigs dge slong blo bzang mkhas grub kyis kyang rang nyid tshe mjug lhag pa'i lha 'di'i rnal 'byor la nyams len snying por bya phyir dang mdo khams phyogs su'ang thugs rje chen po'i rnal 'byor 'di la tshang ma mos blo che bas kun la phan phyir thugs rje chen po'i bla brgyud gsol 'debs sgrub thabs cha lag tshang ba lam yongs rdzogs kyi smon lam dang bcas pa zhig dgos zhes bskul ba la brten nas thugs rje chen po bcu gcig zhal gyi dbang dang man ngag thob pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gru @028b  'dzin gnyis pa'i gzhal med khang gi gzim chung bde ba can du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs kun tu 'phel zhing rgya par gyur cig)"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6578</vol>
<tib>zhing mchog bde ba can du theg chen gyi rigs su skye ba 'dzin pa'i rgyu'i tshogs rnams nyams su len pa'i tshul dpag bsam ljon shing zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-35a</p>
<col>@034a * (ces zhing mchog bde ba can du theg chen gyi rigs su skye ba 'dzin pa'i rgyu tshogs rnams ji ltar nyams su len pa'i tshul dpag bsam ljon shing zhes bya ba 'di ni rje bdag nyid chen po'i bde ba can gyi zhing du skye ba 'dzin pa'i smon lam zhing mchog sgo 'byed @034b gzhir bzhag nas sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas ngur smrig gar gyus rnam par rol pa pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa rnam pa gnyis kyi gsung rab rnams dang skyabs mgon dam pa lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa'i mchog gsum spyi'i mchod chog yid bzhin dbang rgyal dang khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po rje btsun blo bzang nor bu shes rab dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i bskal bzang sangs rgyas stong gi phyag mchod smon lam dang bcas pa bsod nams kyi myu gu 'phel bar byed pa'i bdud rtsi'i char chen rnams las tshig 'ga' zhig btus te zhing bkod kyi mdo gnyis dang bla ma'i gsung la brten nas dge slong kun rdor ming can gyis gzhan la phan du re ba'i bsam pa dang phyi mar yang zhing mchog den ston pa 'khor bcas kyi zhabs drung du skye ba'i rten 'brel khyad par can bsgrigs pa'i phyir du zil gnon zhes pa me pho rta'i lor snyigs dus kyi 'gro ba'i 'dren mchog rje btsun dam pa blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i grub pa'i gnas @035a * mchog sgrub khang shi pe thu'i dben gnas su bsgrigs pa'i dge bas bdag dang 'gro kun lam bzang 'di la brten nas zhing mchog bde ba can du mgon po 'od dpag med kyi zhabs drung du theg chen gyi rigs can dbang po rnon po sha stag tu skye bar gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6578</vol>

<tib>rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras yang gsang mdung dmar can gyi sgrub thabs las tshogs dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-14b</p>
<col>@014b (zhes rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras yang gsang mdun dmar can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs las tshogs dang bcas pa 'di ni rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas pa'i pandi ta mdung nag zhabs drung aer te ni no mon khang gis bskul ba ltar 'di nyid kyi bsnyen sgrub las gsum tshang du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor pa ^ sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis sbyar ba'o dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>

<vol>6586</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i sgo nas bum chu sgrub tshul gyi cho ga gdung sel zla ba'i 'khri shing</tib>

<col>@016b (ces pa 'di ni gso ba rigs pa'i gnas la rnam dpyod mchog tu yangs pa dge slong blo bzang bstan dar gyis gtsos brag lung ri khrod pa spyi tshogs nas bskul ba ltar ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes dga' ldan bshad sgrub dar rgyas bkra shis kun nas 'khyil ba'i gling gi 'du khang chen mo'i yang rtser bris pa 'dis kyang skye 'grol phan thogs par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>

<col>@004a * ('di ni rgyun khyer thun re nyams blangs na ser sna'i sgrib pa ma lus byang 'gyur zhing yi dwags skye ba'i skye sgo chod gyur nas rnam yang dbul po skye bar mi 'gyur zhing bsod nams rje 'phel tshe 'dir longs spyod dang phyi ma bde ba can gyi zhing khams skye 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur nor sgrub kun gyi mchog gyur 'di yin no tshe 'dir lha mi'i 'gro ba thams cad byams rgyal po chad pa la sogs 'jigs kun skyobs mi kun dad cing @004b gus pas dbang du 'du dpag bsam shing gi sgrub pa zhes bya ba ku ru kulle'i rgyud dang rtogs pa nas gsungs pa'i gdams ngag shin tu zab pa ste  'di nyid spyan ras gzigs kyis dngos su gsungs de phyir khungs btsun the tshom bral ba yin  dge slong sangs rgyas dar gyis bskul ba'i phyir r'a ga aa syas snga dro'i thun 'tshams la gzhan phan bsam pas rdzogs par smras pa ste  bla ma pad+ma thabs mkhas zhes byas bris dge bas 'gro kun yi dwags @005a * skye sgo chod 'dzad med rin chen gter la spyod par shog sarba mangga lam</col>

<p>1a-11b</p>
<col>@008a * (zhes dregs pa sde brgyad la gser skyems gtong ba'i cho ga bdud rtsi'i rlabs phreng zhes bya ba 'di ni bsod nams stobs kyis mngon par mtho ba dur bed wang phun tshogs bsam 'grub kyis rin chen gnyis pa'i skyes dang bcas 'phrin yig gi lam nas bskul ba'i ngor ku s'a li ^dharm'a badzra gyis 'phral du bris pa'i yi ge pa ni gu shri ngag dbang bstan 'phel lo 'di'i lag len ni snod @008b gtsang ma'i nang du gtor ma ri rab bang rim bzhi pa'i steng du dkon mchog la zlum gtor dkar po gsum bad rim dang po la phyi'i sde brgyad gnyis pa la nang gi gsum pa la gsang ba'i bzhi pa la mchog gi ri rab rtsa bar sprul ba sde brgyad dang bcas par bshos chung brgyad re mtha' skor du gtsad rim kyi dpal mgon yul lha gzhi bdag dang bcas pa la bshos zlum grangs ma nges pa ci mang de dag gi bar mtshams rnams su ril bu mthe ba kyu ting lo chang bu @009a * sogs dang dkar gsum mngar gsum sha khrag sna tshogs sman dang me tog rtsi bcud shing tog sna tshogs 'bu sna rin po che gos sna dar sna zas sna rnams gang 'dzom so so ma 'dres pa tshom bur spungs gzhan yang gser skyems ja phud chad phud nyer spyod kyi mchod pa dang bcas pa bshams yi dam gyi rnal 'byor dang rdzas rnams sngags drug gis byin gyis brlab tshul rnams bsangs chog bkra shis dbyangs snyan ltar bya @009b de nas 'gron rnams nam mkha' la spron rdol ba bzhin du stong ba'i dbyings las skad cig gis 'ur gyis bzhengs te nam mkha' bar snangs gzhi thams cad khyab par bzhugs par bsams la dngos gzhi'i bsngo tshig gzhung ltar dang mjug tu 'dod gsol dmigs gsal sbyar dgos yod na yi ge zur du yod pa ltar sbyar bas 'thus gtor ma sogs med par gser skyems 'ba' zhig gtong ba yin na phud phor du gser skyems @010a * blugs pa lag tu thogs te 'bru gsum gyis brlabs la 'gron tshan re re rdzogs mtshams su 'thor ba re bya bsangs rkyang ba gtong na bsangs mchod dam pa 'di 'bul lo dgyes pa chen pos legs bzhes nas bdag gi 'dod don sgrub tu gsol zhes sbyar bar bya'o zhes pa'ang dharma badzra gyis smras  "</col>

<tib>rlung rta gos pa'i bsangs gsol mchod rgyun khyer mdor bsdus rlung rta'i spar ba'i rlung yab ces bya ba</tib>

<col>@011a * (ces rlung rta gsos pa'i bsangs gsol mchod rgyun khyer mdor bsdus rlung rta me spor ba'i rlung yab ces bya ba 'di ni ^bla ma gong ma'i mdzad pa bzhes yi bzhin @011b gyi nas bskul ba po'i 'dod mos ltar tshig zung snan nas yang khra kha du bris pa'i dge bas rang gzhan gyis yang rlung rta phyogs bcur dar bar gyur cig sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>

<vol>6589</vol>
<tib>rang gzhan gyi don du mchog dman gyi mgron la gtor ma dang gser skyems dang bsang sogs gtong skabs don dmigs gsal can sbyar ba ni"</tib>

<col>@010a * (ces bla ma rje btsun rnal 'byor ma chen mo pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma la drin lan bsab pa'i ma bstod bcu phrag bcu gsum las gsum lhag pa bstod pa thams cad mkhyen pa ma zhees ba'i dbu can 'di nyid sh'akya'i dge slong rig 'dzin gzi brjid rdo rje ming can mi phyed pa'i dad pa chen pos chu rdo rje rnal lo'i gri bzang zla bar dkar ngo'i rdzogs pa gra bar thol 'byung gis tshul gyis bris so 'di mtshon rnam dkar dge bas bstan pa dang 'gro ba longs la phan bde 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cig </col>

<item>

<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * (ces pa 'di ni cing gir gnam gyi rgyal po'i rgyud las 'khrungs pa'i au cu mu chen aa ki bkra shis rab brtan gyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor blo bzang bstan pa'i nyi mas mtsho bdun gyis dgon par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gsol dpon dge slong blo bzang ba stobs ldan gyis bgyis pa'o dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6634</vol>
<tib>'dod khams dbang phyug dpal ldan lha mo nag mo'i tshogs mchod dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (ces 'dod khams dbang phyug dpal ldan lha mo nag mo'i tshogs mchod dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni tu rung ja sag gi bu tsha mdo sngags gi chos tshul la mkhas pa'i rnam dpyod dang ldan pa sku rje yang zer ba'i chos tho yon slob bu dge slong skal bzang rdo rjes bskul ma mdzad pa'i ngor dam pa gong ma rnams kyi khungs thub kyi tshogs mchod du ma la legs par gzhir bzhag te ga-yar khral tsam du btsun gzugs dzny'a na ming can gyis yi ger 'dud byed do 'di mtshon rang gzhang gyi rnam dkar dge bas ^bla ma yi dam ma dang mkha' 'gro chos skyong bsrung ma rnams kyis dus dang gnas skabs thams cad du thugs brtse ba chen pos rjes su 'dzin pa'i gyur rgyur cig  dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6634</vol>
<tib>'dod khams dbang phyug ma'i sgo nas ga-yang gi gzo rdol bcos pa'i cho ga gso byed bkra shis kun bzang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@010b (ces 'dod khams dbang phyug m'ai sgo nas ga-yabng gi gzo rdol bcos pa'i cho ga gso byed bkra shis kun bzang zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge tshul blo bzang bstan 'dzin gyis bskul ngor ga-yang gi gzo rdol bcos pa'i yig rnying zhir byas nas rje drung gzhad rdor gyi ga-yang 'gong mnan thabs dang dam pa gong ma'i gzhung nas cung zad kha bskang te btsung gzugs @011a * mkhan ming bsam grub bstan 'dzin gyis bkra shis zla ba'i yar ngo tshes bcu 'phel sbyor dge ba'i nyin mor sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang bkra shis so bkra shis 'dzam gling kun tu khyab gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<col>@014a * (ces dpal ldan dzambha la dkar po 'brug gzhon lha lnga'i gtor chog dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni mkhas shing grub pa'i dbang phyug bshes gnyen dam pa'i drin gyis lha 'di'i rjes su gnang ba thob pa'i dka' ming bhadras sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni mah'a ya na zhes bya ba'o 'dis kyang 'gro kun sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6634</vol>
<tib>'jam dpal dus dgra'i dbang po ma he'i gdong can bcu gsum lha'i 'khor lo'i rim pa dang po'i zab khrid zin bris 'jigs mdzad rdo rje'i zhal lung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-61a</p>
<col>@061a * ces 'jam dpal dus dgra'i dbang po ma he'i gdong can bcu gsum lha'i 'khor lo'i rim pa dang po'i zab khrid zin bris 'jigs mdzad rdo rje'i zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di yang sangs rgyas kun 'dus kyi ngo bo kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje ^rje btsun blo bzang thub bstan 'jigs med rgya mtsho yab sras kyi zhabs pad gtsug gis mchod pa'i bka' drin las lam 'di'i smin byed kyi dbang grol byed rim gnyis kyi khrid rgyab brten gyi lung rgyud kyi bshad pa las tshogs dang bcas man ngag gi bdud rtsi tshim par myang ba dge slong shes rab rgya mtshos rang gi brjed byang dang` don du gnyer ba du mas yang yang bskul ngor bris pa bla ma yi dam bka' sdod bsrung ma'i tshogs kyis bzod par mdzad du gsol zhus aom swasti chos srid 'byor ba'i mdzod dang dge bcu ldan dga' ldan rab rgyas zhes bya'i rgyud grwa cher kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa yab sras kyi thugs rjes chos sbyin 'dzad med rgyun 'di spel "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6634</vol>
<tib>rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan la brten nas rlung rta yar bskyed kyi cho ga bya tshul nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6634</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma la brten pa'i nyams len zab khyad can bya tshul mdor bsdus 'phags ma'i 'phrin las gsal ba'i me long zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@004b (ces rje btsun sgrol ma la brten pa'i nyams len zab khyad can 'ga' zhig bya tshul 'phags ma'i 'phrin las gsal ba'i me long zhes bya ba 'di ni gam bcar dad ldan 'od zer gyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ngor ^no yon chos rjer 'bod pa'i btsun pa blo bzang tshe dbang rab brtan gyis grub dbang stag phu pa'i man ngag ltar sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@004b ('di ni bris sud nyer mkho'i yan lag tu byed par mthong nas btsun chung sh'il ming can gyis brodbs pa'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6635</vol>
<tib>bde mchog rtsa rgyud kyi tikka sbas pa'i don kun gsal ba'i snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-125a</p>
<col>@124b ces bde mchog rtsa rgyud nyung ngu'i tikka spas pa'i don kun gsal ba'i snying po bsdus @125a * (zhes bya ba 'di ni bstan pa'i mda' bdag ko'u shr'i nang so yes kyi rang phyogs su rgyud grwa gsar du btsugs pa'i tshe bde mchog gi 'chang nyan gyu rgyun la phan par dgongs te gnang spyin dang bcas bskul ba ltar rgyud pa'i slob dpon pa sh'akya'i dge slong grags pa bshad sgrub ces bya bas rje nyid kyi man ngag la brten nas con dgon du legs par sbyar ba ste phyis sngags ram pa ngag dbang bsam gtan dang ngag dbang bkra shis gnyis kyis rgyud grwar mtshan gdags mdzad pa'i tshe dad pas bar du bsgrubs pa'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6636</vol>

<col>@006a (ces bde mchog lha lnga'i yongs 'dzin dzny'a na dhwadza'i dril bu lha lnga'i sbyin sreg sogs las btus te dge slong dharma bhadras sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>

<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@006b (ces rlung lha rgyal po sde bzhi lha dang bcas pa bskang pa'i cho ga phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i gser gyi dhwadza zhes bya ba 'di ni khu ral chen mo'i grwa rigs zhu kher che thub bstan dar rgyas kyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ngor ^snyoms las pa @007a * ratna shastras thun 'tsham su 'phral du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni nye gnas dge tshul shes rab kyis bris pa dza yantu: :)"</col>

<item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6636</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan dmag zor rgyal mo'i rjes gnang gi tho yig dngos grub sgo 'byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@008a * (dpal ldan dmag zor rgyal mo'i rjes gnang gi tho yig dngos grub sgo 'byed ces bya ba 'di'ang ^dbyangs can bzhad pa ge 'dun rgya mtsho'i yig cha la gzhi byas te lha mo 'di bsnyen cing sgrub pa'i ^btsun pa ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis lag tu blangs bde bar sbyar ba'i thog ma'i rtsom gdan las shog bur gsol dpon gushri ye shes rgyal mtshan gysi bris pa dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6636</vol>
<tib>gsang sngags kyi sa lam bgrod tshul legs par bshad pa ngag gi snang ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-66b</p>
<col>@066a * slar yang smras pa shes dang mi shes cha med kyang gzhung chen glang chen rgyab khal la ngal dang mi ngal mi blta @066b bar` `zhang rigs zhang kbtsung rgya pos spyangs bskal ba bye bar mtshan tsam yang rmi lam du yang 'byung dka' ba 'jam mgon bla ma'i bka' drin gyis bsam gyin rnying nasphyag 'tshal lo dam tshig gtsang mas gzhi bzung ste thos dang bsam pa'i stobs shugs kyis tshul bzhin sgrub pa mthar son te rgyal kun dgyis pa bskyed gyur cig thabs kyi theg pa'i dogs gcod phran bu 'di mkhas pa rnams la kkdgos pa med na yang dam bca'i khur babs rtsod tshul mi shes pa dag la phan ched zhang btsun rgan pos bris "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6636</vol>
<tib>rje rin po che rigs gsum spyi sgrub la brten pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor zab mo slob ma rjes su 'dzin pa'i cho ga drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma'i zhal shes ltar bkod pa</tib>
<p>1a-10b</p>
<col>@010b (ces dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi ngo bo khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po shar tsong kha pa chen po la rigs gsum kun 'dus kyi tshul du gsol ba 'debs pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor zab mo slob ma rjes su 'dzin pa'i cho ga bsgrigs gsal bar bkod pa 'di yang don nyer can 'ga' zhig la dgos pas ched du khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chen po bka' 'drin gsum ldan tsha ba sngags rab 'byams pa bskal bzang dpal bzang po zhal snga nas chos 'di'i dbang lung gnyis tsam thos pas bla ma zhal shes ltar bkod pa'i byed po gong gi tsa ba'i bla ma'i slob ma'i tha shal dge ming byams pa dge legs kyis zin bris su btab pa las nangs pa ci mchis bla ma lha bsrung rnams kyi spyan sngar bshags shing de ba'i bdag gzhan 'gro ba rnams rnam mkhyen rgyal ba'i go 'phang rin po che thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6636</vol>
<tib>sgra mi snyan pa'i tshe dbang lo rgyus dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@003a * (zhes sgra mi snyan pa'i tshe sgrub 'di yang dbang gi nye 'khor drod skyed kyis bskul bar dbu ru stod kyi dge slong dharma k'artis spyos lung gi lcang lo can du bris pa'o ma ltar lan cig zhus so</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6636</vol>
<tib>sngags kyi dris lan 'ga' zhig</tib>
<p>66b-75a</p>
<col>@074b (cea par byang smong tshig 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes ^dam pa mchog gi gsang gsum gyi mdzad pa la snying nas dad pa'i @075a * dpon po mtha' yas rgya mtshos bskul ngor slob ma'i tha shal snyan grags sprul ming 'dzin pa blo bzang lung rtogs rgya mtshos bris pa'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib># rje btsun n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bya tshul dngos grub 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@011b (ces rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bya tshul dngos grub 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba @012a * 'di ni sa skya pa'i bla ma rnams kyis mdzad pa'i yig cha mang po 'dug kyang rang re'i lugs srol gyi 'gros dang mthun pa zhig byung nas lag tu blang bde ba 'dug pas ci'i kyang yi ger 'god dgos zhes don gnyer ba du mas snga phyir yang yang bskul ba la brten nas 'jam mgon sa skya pa rjes 'brang dang bcas pa'i yig cha gang yod dang khyad par gsang chen slob bshad pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan kyis mdzad pa'i mkha' spyod sgrub pa'i dga' ston gyi steng nas phyag len mdzad gyin 'dug pas de nyid kyi dgongs doon gtso bor bzung dgongs pa mi 'gal yang cho ga'i go rim dang tshig ris cung zad mi mthun pa rnams rje rgyal ba gnyis pa yab sras kyi bzhed pa dang mthun par bgyis te btsun gzugs blo bzang chos kyi nyi mas dben gnas bde chen chos gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su gushni dge slong blo bzang bzod pa'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6637</vol>
<tib>dpal 'khor lo bde mchog l'u ai pa'i bskyed rim skal ldan re skong zhes bya ba bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-71a</p>
<col>@070b ces dpal 'khor lo bde mchog l'u ai pa'i bskyed rim skal ldan re skong zhes bya ba 'di ni gsung rab rab 'byams smra ba ngag dbang phun tshogs bka' bcu 'dzin pa bzang po rgyal mtshan pa bzang po rgyal mtshan rgyud pa sdom brtson dpal 'byor sengge sogs mdzod dge'i sgrub sde'i sde snod 'dzin pa rnams kyis gos chen sogs 'bul ba'i rnam grangs @071a * du ma dang bcas yang dang yang du nan gyis bskul ba dang rab 'byams pa ye shes bzang pos kyang 'bul ba'i me tog bcas 'tshams sbyar ba'i ngor don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te mkhan po rin po che mkhas grub ngag dbang bstan 'dzin rdo rje 'chang blo bzang chos dbyings 'jam pa'i dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje sogs mkhas grub du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i gzugs brnyan bka' bcu'i ming can bya btang blo gros rgya mtshos chos rje sems dpa' chen po byams pa bkra shis kyi sgrub pa'i dben gnas rdzong phu byams pa gling gi gzims chung bde chen rab gsal du shing sprul lo'i zla ba brgyad pa'i nang du grub par gyis pa 'dis kyang chos kyi rje rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nus par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<col>@013a * (de ltar dpal mgon chos kyi rgyal po phyi nang gsang gsum gyi rjes gnang gi tho yig dngos grub kyi za ma tog dbye ba'i rin chen lde mig ces bya ba 'di'ang rang dang skal mnyam 'ga' zhig la phan pa'ang srid snyam du smon lam @013b slob dpon dpa' bo rdo rje'i rtsa gzhung la gzhigs  kun gzigs pan chen blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang rdo rje 'dzin pa dkon mchog rgyal mtshan gyi gsung rgyun thugs sral rnams kyis rig zig tu mdzad pa'i dgongs don bzhin ^btsun pa ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis mtshams sbyor gyis bshad pa dang 'don cha'i rim pa dkyus lu mi gsal ba rnams cung zad kha gsal bar byas pa ma gtogs rang bzo'i dri mas cung zad kyang ma bslad par rnam 'dren stong gi pho brang bsod nams kun sdud gling du bris pa'i yi ge pa ni mchod 'os blo bzang ae wam gyis bgyis pa'o</col>

<vol>6639</vol>
<tib>rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed rim gyi dmar khrid gnad don rab gsal skal ldan re skong zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-104a</p>
<col>@103b ces rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed rim gyi dmar khrid gnad gdon rab gsal skal ldan re skong zhes bya ba 'di ni lam 'di la mos pa'i sdom brtson slob bu mchod dpon pa dge slong don grub bzang po dpal gyis nan tan du bskul zhing rang nyid kyi brjed byang dang don gnyer can gzhan dag la'ang phan re'i bsam pas kun nas bslangs te rje bdag nyid chen po'i rdo rje'i gsung sgrub thabs rnal 'byoro dag rim la gzhi byas sras kyi thu bo rgyud 'dzin dang bcas pa'i mkhas grub du ma'i legs bshad dang dmigs rim gyi zhib cha rnams rgyud chen dkon mchog yar 'phel gyi gsung rgyun lcang skya rin po che ngag dbang blo bzang chso ldan gyi zhal snga nas dang kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje dpal bzang po rnam gnyis kyis snga phyir zin bris su mdzad pa rnams phan tshun gung bsgrigs te dmigs rim gyi ngo bo tsam 'dus gsal go bde'i tshul du ^rdo rje 'chang dngos bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin gyis lugs 'di'i dbang dang rim gnyis kyi zab khrid sogs legs par thob pa ^ban rgan @104a * snyom las pa dam tshig rdo rjes sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan bskul ba po nyid kysi bgyis so 'dis kyang rgyud kyi mthar thug dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad sgrub kyi bstan pa rin po che 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i ring lugs bla na med pa 'di nyid mi mthun phyogs kyi dri mas magos par phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  dar rgyas 'phel "</col>

<tib># 'dus pa 'phags lugs lha so gnyis pa'i lam rim pa dang po'i khrid dmigs kyi brjed byang mi bskyod mgon po'i zhal lung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-109a</p>
<col>@108a * (ces 'dul ba'i lam rim pa dang po'i brjed byang mi bskyod mgon po'i zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di yang dus gsum gyi rgyal ba thams cad @108b las kyang nges par thugs rje dang bka' drin mtshungs zla ma mchis pa snyan rgyud rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag dpal ldan bla ma dam pa mtshan brjod par dka' ba ^rje btsun dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i bka' drin las rim gnyis kyi khrid mnos pa'i skabs brjed tho cung zad bris pa debzhin yi ger 'khod pa dgos pa'i bskul ma 'debs mkhan mang du byung yang bdag 'dra thun mong ba'i lam gyi sne zin tsam la yang blo sbyangs ma song ba'i gang zag gis snyan rgyud kyi gdams pa 'di 'dra 'god pa la skrag pas bzhag kyang nye char thugs rje bdag nyid bla ma yab sras kyis bris chog pa'i bka'i gnang ba stsal ba mi bskyod mgon po rang gi gsung dang dbyer ma ma chis pa'i byin rlabs kho na la brten nas dge slong shes rab rgya mtshos zin tho snga phyi phyogs bsdebs su byas pa la rang nyid sbyangs pa zhan pa'i blo skyong gyis sbags pa dang zhal shes kyi rigs gsal bar bris pa sogs nongs pa mtha' dag bla ma lhag pa'i lha bka' sdod dang bcas pa la snying nas 'tshags shing dge bas tshe rabs thams cad du bla ma lhas rjes su bzung ste tshang la ma nor ba'i lam bzang po 'di spyod pa'i snod ldan du gyur nas phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rab 'byams su rgyal ba kun gyi dam chos ma @109a * lus pa rgyal ba'i dgongs pa bzhin du 'dzin nus par gyur cig  aom swasti chos srid 'byor ba'i mdzod dang dge bcu ldan dga' ldan rab rgyas zhes bya'i rgyud grwa cher kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa yab sras kyi thugs rjes chos sbyin 'dzad med rgyun 'di spel mangga lam</col>

<tib>rgyal ba khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chen po'i lam gyi rim pa gsang ba kun gyi gnad rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba'i bshad lung gnang skabs kyi gsung bshad 'ga' zhig brjed thor bkod pa bla ma'i gsung gi snang ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-33b</p>
<col>@033a * (ces pa 'di ni dpal ldan rigs brgya @033b khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chen po mtshan brjod par dka' ba bdag gi mkhan po rin po che don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te ^tshe 'phel rdo rje dpal rdo rje bzang po'i zhal snga nas kysi rgyal ba khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chen po'i lam gyi rim pa gsang ba kun gyi gnad rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba'i bshad lung gnang skabs kyi gsung bshad 'ga' zhig brjed thor bkod pa bla ma'i gsung gi snang ba zhes bya ba 'di` rje btsun bla ma rdo rje 'chang dbang gang de'i zhal slob dran dbang rnams kyi tha shal su ma ti aaksha ra badzra gyis rang blos gang zin tshod bris pa 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i mdo sngags chos tshul gyi ring lugs 'di nyid dri ma med par phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>

<tib>dgra lha dbang bstod gsol mchod snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@017b (ces byang phyogs chen po hor kyi yul du nye bar mkho ba'i bsangs mchod dgra lha dbang bstod dang bcas pa lha rgyal snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'di ni rgyal ba gnyis tsong kha pa chen po'i bstan pa bla na bla ra 'debs pa'i srid zhur btson pa tshangs pa dang stobs kyi dbang phyug dga' ldan bstan 'dzin spo shog thu rgyal pos 'bar ba chen pos bskul ma mdzad pa ltar za hor gyis bandhes drag po zhes pa lcags sprel hor zla bdun pa'i yags tshos la rang bung 'phags pa'i gzhal yas khang pho brang dmar po sbyar ba'i @018a * yi ge pa ni mthar rgyas pa blo bzang dbang pos bgyis pa'o bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling rgyan du byon</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6644</vol>
<tib>dgra lha'i rten dar btsugs mchod pa'i cho ga 'don don kun 'grub ces bya ba</tib>

<item>

<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@009b (ces dpal 'khor lo bde mchog yab yum gyi rkang brgyad bstod pa'i phan yon 'dod don sgrub tshul dang bcas pa byin rlabs myur ster zhs bya ba 'di ni lam 'dir mos ldan rnamsla phan re'i bsam pas kun nas bslangs te phan yon dngos gzhi drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma rdo rje 'chang mkhas shing grub pa'i dbang phyug chos kyi rdo rje dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi gsung bcos med du bkod @010a * cing nyer mkho'i yig chung phran bus brgyan te bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' 'bangs tha shal ba bhu su ku pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes sug las su spel ba 'dis kyang dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa'i lam bzang gi bshad sgrub phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig `shu bham mastu sarba dza ga tam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6648</vol>
<tib>bka' por rnam lnga'i bshad sgrub sogs chos srid dge mtshan spel ba'i byin 'bebs gsol 'debs pad+ma r'a ga'i kyo ba zhes bya ba</tib>

<vol>6651</vol>
<tib># khrus chog 'chi med tshe'i dngos grub bde legs kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17b</p>
<col>@017a * (ces pa 'di ni ^sku 'bum byams pa gling zhes mtshan yongs su grags pa 'di nyid kyi gso rigs grwa tshang gi bla zur @017b lung dang rigs pa'i mdzod 'dzin yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po mtshan ngag dbang bstan pa zhes pas de nyid kyis rin chen gnyis pa'i mandal mdzod btags dang bcas ste 'di lta bu'i bla med lugs kyi tshe dpag med dang 'brel ba'i khrus dbang khyer bde ba zhig dgos zhes gsung nan tan du stsal ba la brten nas ^thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i gsung la gzhi byas te sh'akya'i dge slong chu bzang hus thog thus sku 'bum byams pa gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni nye gnas rabs byams pa ngag dbang nor bus bgyi pa 'dis kyang bstan pa dang sems can la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig par sa khyi lo'i che shos sman pa bla ma zur pas bsgrub pa la brten nas rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>skyabs mgon chen po'i bka' rtsom zhabs brtan tshogs chen du tshugs gras rnams</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@002b (ces pa 'di ni mdzong ba @003a * mer khan pa dza sag bla ma blo bzang mkhas mchog dang bskyed ma blo bzang bstan 'dzin chos 'jom yongs 'dzin rje zhal snga nas blo bzang dge legs sngags chen zhal snga nas blo bzang tshul khrims dkyil khang zhal snga nas blo bzang bstan 'dzin shar rtse zhal snga nas ye shes bkra shis thos bsam gling zhal snga nas blo bzang bkra shis dge skos chen mo drung ram pa blo bzang rig grol tshogs chen dang gsang sngags rgyud pa grwa tshang gis las mtshan pa nye 'khor ba na dam pas tshan pa sogs kyis nan gyis bskul ba ltar ^sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang dpal ldan bstan pa'i nyi ma phyogs las rnam rgyal gyis chu mo glang po'i rgyal zla'i yar tshes bcu gsum la gzims chung bka' bdams pho brang du sbyar ba'o dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor rab gnas byed tshul byin rlabs kyi rol mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@012b ('chi ba med pa'i cha tshe ring dpal 'byor @013a * bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa'i gur khang zhes bya ba 'di yang grub chen thams mkhas chos dbyings dbang phyug au rgyan pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi gsung 'bum las kyi r'a ro kha 'byed du mdzad pa'o) rgya rgya rgya aithi bkra shis 'bar gyur cig  dge'o "</col>

<item>

<col>@003b (ces pa 'di ni grub chen dpon ston skyer snang ba'i gdams ngag yin par grags kyang tshig la 'brel med don gzhan mang po yod pa la gzhan gyi bsro bslad zhugs snyam nas dbyangs can bzhad pa'i blo gsal gyis cung zad tshig zur bcos nas bgyis 'dis 'gro la phan thogs par gyur cig  )dge'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>6667</vol>
<tib>no title [@001b 'phags pa 'jam dpal nag po la phyag 'tshal lo rgya nag mi kha ngan pa cod rgya nag thams cad mi mthun bzlog rgya nag mgo po gcod par byed]"</tib>
<p>1b-2b</p>
<col>@002a * (ces pa 'di ni snyigs dus rgya nag byad kha rims nad kha mchu mi @002b kha dang ltas ngan pa dang thams cad zhi bar gyur ro ces pa 'di ni khal kha'i aer te ni no yon hu thug thu 'jam dpal rgya mtsho bskul ba'i ngor ^ 'dus 'khor pandi ta sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang ngag dbang bstan 'dzin mdzad pa'o )dge'o "</col>

<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma 'gro ba 'gugs shing 'phongs sel ma la mandal bzhi mchod kyi sgo nas gsol ba gdab tshul gyi cho ga kun tu 'khyer bde ba</tib>
<p>1a-19a</p>
<col>@018a * (ces rje btsun @018b sgrol ma 'gro ba 'gugs shing 'phongs sel ma la mandal bzhi mchod kyi sgo nas gsol gdab tshul gyi cho ga kun tu 'khyer bde ba 'di ni lung dang rtogs pas mngon par mtho ba'i dus 'khor dge bskul ba blo bzang tshe ring gis 'di lta bu zhig dgos ^ zhes nan tan du bskul ba ltar ^ bsod nams rgya mtshos sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson rnam dpyod dang ldan chos mthun gyi slob bu dbu mdzad blo bzang @019a * rdo rjes bgyis pa dge legs 'phel dge'o bkra shis par 'gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>

<col>@038a * (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi zhi rgyas dbang gsum. gyi sbyin bsreg gi cho ga ye shes me 'od ces bya ba 'di ni lha 'di nyid yi dam du byed pa dag gis bsnyen pa'i kha bskong dang rang bzhin gyi rim 'gro sogs la sbyin bsreg sgrub dgos pa'i skabs du mar yig cha gzhan mang po la ltos mi dgos pa'i tshig cho ga lag len du sgril ba zhig byung na legs pa 'dug bsam rang nyid kyis 'dri 'dun yod thogs chos sde bkra shis chos gling gi khri ba zhwa dmar rab 'byams pa chos snyan grags kyis kyang bskul ba la brten nas gsang ba spyi'i cho ga snye ma'i dgongs pa bzhin khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i bka' srol dang mthun par ku s'a li ^ dharma badzra gyis 'phar ba zhes pa lcags mo glang gi lo'i rgyal zla ba'i yar tshes la bla brang bkra shis 'od 'bar gyi gzims chung bde chen phug tu sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang kun dga' bgyis pa'o sarba mangga lam bkra shis par gyur cig  0"</col>

<tib>kha 'bar ma'i cho ga mdor bsdus shing go bde bar brjod pa'i mi mthun yul las rgyal ba'i rdo rje'i go cha zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-30a</p>
<col>@002b (ces la 'bar ma'i cho ga mdor bsdus shing go bde bar spyod pa mi mthun yul las rgyal bar byed pa'i rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma dam pa don gyi gnas lnga rig pa'i ^ dza ya pandi ta chen po'i gsung gi bdud rtsis yun ring du 'tsho ba'i bka' 'bang snyoms las bkra shis rnam rgyal gyis pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa chen pos mdzad pa'i cho gas gzhi byas der ma gsal ba rnams pan chen na bza' pa dang @003a * bsod nams ye shes dpa' bo mdzad pa'i 'bar ma'i gtor chog dang gzhan yang bla ma rnams kyi gsungs dang mthong pa brgyud pa'i man ngag gis brgyan te rang brjed cing byang du bkod pa 'dis kyang rgyal ba bstan pa spyi dang khyad par du yang khams gsum bla ma btsong kha pa mkhyen po'i ring lugs phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yung ring du gnas par gyur cig  shu bham mastu sarba dza ga tam sarba mangga lam</col>

<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor las 'chi ka ma'i sems can la phan thabs bya tshul nyams thag dbugs 'byin zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * (ces 'chi ka ma'i sems can la phan thabs bya tshul nyams thag dbugs 'byin zhes bya ba 'di ni deng dus snyigs mar gyur ba'i dbang gis phal ba rnams lta ci 'grel mang po'i 'dren por rlom pa 'ga' zhig kyang 'chi ka'i sems can gyis sngas mgor slebs pa na byin rten myang du 'jug pa las phan pa'i thabs gzhan mdzad mi mkhyen pa mang po mthong bas rkyen byas mchog dman thams can kyis lag tu blang bde ba 'di 'dra zhig bris na 'ga' zhig la phan par 'gyur ba srid snyam nas ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis mo tog ltu ma ra'i bsti gnas su sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bikshu wa gindra sha sa na wa rtas bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>



</list>
